[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/gzungs 'dus e bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D846}]@##/_/spyan 'dren rgyud gsum pa/_bla ma'i bla ma bla med dkon mchog gsum/_/che ba'i che mchog dbang mchog dam pa la/_/gus pas phyag 'tshal dang bas 
[\[1b.2\]]skyabs su mchi/_/gnam sa'i mnga' bdag skye dgu'i longs spyod gzhi/_/bstan pa dam pa chos kyi mgon mdzad pa/_/tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen yul 'khor srung /_/'phags 
[\[1b.3\]]skyes mig mi bzang dang lus ngan bo/_/'jig rten skyong ba dbang po me lha dang /_/gshin rje bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha/_/rnam thos bu dang dbang bdag sa yi lha/_/nyi zla gza' 
[\[1b.4\]]skar phyogs kyi glang po rnams/_/blon po sde dpon lha mo phyogs mtshams srung /_/btsun mo sras bcas so so'i 'khor kun dang /_/lha yi sde dpon chen por mtshan grags pa/_/
[\[1b.5\]]khyab 'jug tshogs bdag nan+ti karti ka/_/nag po chen po stobs chen stobs po che/_/gnod 'dzin pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang /_/dung dang dung chen gang po shin tu gang /_/mgrin bzang 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]gang ba bzang po nor bu bzang /_/bum rna dril rna rna gsum rna bo che/_/yang dag shes dang yang dag rgyal ba dang /_/rgyal ba'i khyu mchog 'brog gnas gangs la gnas/_/bde ri lngas rtsen lnga len tshigs lnga ser/_/mgrin bcu rnam 
[\[2a.2\]]'jigs 'brug sgra nam mkha'i dbyangs/_/stong gsum rgya mtsho dga' bo bsnyen dga' bo/_/ma dros gzi can nor rgyas gdon la 'jebs/_/drang srong rig 'dzin char sprin lo tog lha/_/lam lha nyin mtshan dus mtshams tshes grangs yud/_/ha nu man ta la 
[\[2a.3\]]sogs mthu chen dang /_/tshig dbang lha mo sgra dbyangs dbyangs can dang /_/be'u 'dra dpal gyi lha mo 'od zer can/_/dkar sham brjod skyob gang gA ya mu na/_/sras 'phan dung can ri mkhar nag mo dang /_/ma bdun sring mo bdun dang sring mo bzhi/_/nag mo 
[\[2a.4\]]chen mo ral pa gcig la sogs/_/lha mo chen mo gnod sbyin chen mo dang /_/srin mo chen mo sha za chen mo dang /_/gzhon nu'i sku 'tsho rdzu 'phrul dbang gis 'phags/_/slag chen brjid pa lha dmag g.yul du bstod/_/rmad grags chen po'i dge bsnyen 
[\[2a.5\]]chen po dang /_/lha sras gzhon nu klu sras gzhon nu dang /_/rig 'dzin gzhon nu drang srong gzhon nu dang /_/bi k+Shus bsten pa'i gzhon nu lnga brgya spun/_/gnod sbyin gzhon nu ti ra ka la sogs/_/gzi brjid chen po'i gzhon sde thams cad dang /_/skye dgu'i 
[\[2a.6\]]bdag po la sogs lha dang klu/_/gnod sbyin dri za lto 'phye lha ma yin/_/gser 'dab grul bum srin po mi'am ci/_/'byung po sha za yul bdag 'dre la sogs/_/cang shes snying rje'i lam du zhugs dgu dang /_/rig pa'i lcags kyus zin pa kun 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gson cig/_/gang gi ming la'ang bkra shis dpal 'bar ba/_/yi ge gnyis 'brel dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan/_/skyes bu gang zhig nyan tam 'don pa yang /_/gzha' gsang yun gyi chu srid 'thob 'gyur na/_/yon tan phun sum dpag yas dkon mchog la/_/
[\[2b.2\]]bsnyen bkur mnyes byed bka' la gus pa dang /_/chos thos nyams su len pa ci zhig smos/_/de bas gsung rab dpag bsam rgyas pa yi/_/lha yi longs spyod tshal du kun gshegs te/_/chos rje nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka'/_/bdud sde lta min g.yul 
[\[2b.3\]]las rgyal byed pa/_/rin chen 'od mchog lha dbang gtsug gi rgyan/_/bag yod dad pa'i spyi bos blang bar mdzod/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod tshur shog_/bdag dang sems can kun kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bgyis la/_sems can ma rgal bas ma 'jigs 
[\[2b.4\]]par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs btsal bas mi ngoms pa la sems zhog shig_/mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang ma gtang shig_/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku yang ma dor cig_/'dod chags dang bral ba'ang thob par gyis shig_/
[\[2b.5\]]chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang btsal bar gyis shig_/chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig_/zhing gi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur yang shes par gyis 
[\[2b.6\]]shig_/sems can yongs su smin par bya bas ma skyo shig_/bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma spong shig_/mngon par shes pa la yang rnam par 'phrul par gyis shig_/chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yo shig_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang ma gtang shig_/
[\[2b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang 'byung bar gyis shig_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig_/chos nyid brjod du med pa las kyang 'da' bar ma byed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi brlabs kyang yongs 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]su ston cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang ma dor cig_/skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang snang bar gyis shig_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po yang yongs su ston cig ces/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni lta ba'i chos zung dang snel zhir sgrub pa mngon 
[\[3a.2\]]par bsgrub pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yang dag phul gyi chos bcu pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang byung gi phrin las gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa med par 
[\[3a.3\]]bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/lha yi rgyal po dbang chen mchog sbyin gtso/_/dpa' bo 'jigs med 'jig rten kun la grags/_/shes rab 'od gsal zla ba nya ba'i zhal/_/skyes mchog smon lam phrin las gcig pa'i mched/_/tshangs pa 
[\[3a.4\]]brgya byin 'jig rten skyong la sogs/_/rdo rje ting 'dzin ri rab srub shing dang /_/snying rje brtson 'grus klu yi srub thag gis/_/shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i bcud/_/dam chos bdud rtsi'i mgron du gshegs kun la/_/chos bsgrags bsod nams 
[\[3a.5\]]dbyig kyang spyir 'bul gyis/_/srin dmag lha min g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_/lha yi rgyal srid dbu rmog btsan par bsngo/_/gzi byin g.yog 'khor longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_/mthu rtsal go 'phang khyad par thob par bsngo/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon shes pha rol phyin la 
[\[3a.6\]]sogs/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun rdzogs pa dang /_/dge ba'i phrin las dgongs dgu grub par bsngo/_/dam chos bdud rtsi'i bde bas lus khyab ste/_/sdug bsngal gnod pa'i rgyud las grol bar bsngo/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bka' drin byams pa'i gnyen/_/
[\[3a.7\]]bdag cag nyon mongs mtshon gyis rmas pa rnams/_/thugs rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bskyang ba dang /_/gang gis gang la spyi bos mthu skyed cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung bar gsol/_/ma 'os 'khrul pa'i nongs pa mchis so 'tshal/_/dus rig 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rgyud mkhyen kun la bzod par gsol/_/lha tshogs chos kyi sbyin pa'i bkra shis kyis/_/phun sum tshogs 'dzin dam chos rgyas par smon/_/rgyud gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D846a}]rgyud gsum pa/_tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen lha dang klu/_/gnod sbyin dri za lto 
[\[3b.2\]]'phye lha ma yin/_/gser 'dab grul bum mi'am ci la sogs/_/sems can gang dag bde gshegs sras rnams dang /_/nor bdun phun sum dpal bzhed kun gson cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bsam mi 
[\[3b.3\]]khyab/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/dkon mchog bsam mi khyab la mngon dad pa'i/_/rnam smin bla na med pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bgrang bar yang /_/dkon mchog mtshan thos tsam yang rnyed dka' bas/_/brgya lam 
[\[3b.4\]]lan cig khom ldan lus rnyed rnams/_/rdzu 'phrul dad pa'i shugs kyis 'dir gshegs te/_/rnam par grol ba'i rin chen sna tshogs gling /_/zab mo rgyal ba'i bka' la kun gson cig_/bsngo ba gang dag dam chos lhur len 'dir 'dus pa/_/lha klu gnod sbyin 
[\[3b.5\]]la sogs mthu chen rnams/_/chos kyi bsod nams shas kyang khyed bzhes te/_/gzi byin 'khor 'phel dgongs pa grub par bsngo/_/gsung rab bdud rtsi'i rjes su bsgrub mdzod la/_/gang la ci rigs so sor dpal bskyed cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[3b.6\]]bstan pa bsrung bar gsol/_/rgyud gsum pa rdzogs so//[ {D847}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+nolka nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa 
[\[3b.7\]]chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]chos yongs su rdzogs pa/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/_ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta 
[\[4a.2\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[4a.3\]]dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang /_byang 
[\[4a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang /_byang chub 
[\[4a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang /_byang chub 
[\[4a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na 
[\[4a.7\]]rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan+dan snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya 
[\[4b.2\]]mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 
[\[4b.3\]]brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/_
[\[4b.4\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung ba/_dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral ba/_yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang 
[\[4b.5\]]ldan pa/_khams gsum la ma chags pa/_g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[4b.6\]]rtogs par khong du chud pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/_mtshan 
[\[4b.7\]]ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha' 
[\[5a.2\]]dang mtshungs pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_ma spros pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa ste de ltar rtogs par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos 
[\[5a.3\]]kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/_dngos po 
[\[5a.4\]]gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni 
[\[5a.5\]]tshad med de de ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi 
[\[5a.6\]]dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[5a.7\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ci skad smras pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de 
[\[5b.2\]]nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[5b.3\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang /_'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs 
[\[5b.4\]]te 'dug nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub 
[\[5b.5\]]sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[5b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[5b.7\]]gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po 'di la dris shig 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dang /_'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na bdag gis 
[\[6a.2\]]skyes bu dam pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 
[\[6a.3\]]skal ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun du bsten pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bgyi'o/_/
[\[6a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras te/_'on kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la dris shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[6a.5\]]la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/_theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[6a.6\]]kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po yin gyis bdag la ma gsung shig_/yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[6a.7\]]kun du bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bzang pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na dris shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya 
[\[6b.2\]]ba'i gzhi'i don gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[6b.3\]]don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma spros pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i 
[\[6b.4\]]don ni dor ba med pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don te/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal 
[\[6b.5\]]ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/_'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes ji skad bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan du med pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[6b.6\]]bstan du med na ci zhig bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal bstan du med pa ni btags te bstan to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[6b.7\]]bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal btags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs/_dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na theg pa gsum 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]po dag ji ltar bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni dngos po med 
[\[7a.2\]]pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/_gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/_phung po lnga dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/_'on te spros pa med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_
[\[7a.3\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/_spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar byang chub dang /_spros pa dang bcas pa dang /_spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[7a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[7a.5\]]chos bstan pa 'di lta bu ni rnam pa 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[7a.6\]]'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_
[\[7a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan 
[\[7b.2\]]yang 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa yin no/_/'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no/_/de nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi 
[\[7b.3\]]khyab pa lags te/_de la yi ge mi dmigs/_tshig 'bru mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang /_don kyang mi snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[7b.4\]]gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gang lags/_rnam pa gang lags/_rtags gang lags/_mtshan ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/_bsnyad 
[\[7b.5\]]du med pa ste/_brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/_de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/_de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni 
[\[7b.6\]]chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[7b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/_byang chub 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom 
[\[8a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/_'on kyang nyan 
[\[8a.3\]]thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa la lan gdab pa'am/_spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[8a.4\]]bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[8a.5\]]gyur pas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/_smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/_smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis 
[\[8a.6\]]smras pa/_'o na ci khyod slob pa'am/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gal te btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo 
[\[8a.7\]]yang ma yin/_slob pa yang ma yin/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do/_/'jam 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gyis btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos pos ni ci yang 'thob par mi 'gyur/_mngon par rtogs par mi 
[\[8b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta 
[\[8b.3\]]bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/_/rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ba lang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar 
[\[8b.4\]]byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/_kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/_glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga la nus/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[8b.5\]]lta ste/_dper na mi dmus long gis shul du mchi ba'am/_grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thogs na khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rngo lta ga la thogs te/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du glang po che chen po lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang 
[\[8b.6\]]mtshungs par mthong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/_da ci bgyir yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig_/
[\[8b.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 
[\[9a.2\]]'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[9a.3\]]pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag go/_/phyogs gcig ji 
[\[9a.4\]]lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs 
[\[9a.5\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang /_sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas 'di lta ste chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang /_sangs 
[\[9a.6\]]rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol ba dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang /_
[\[9a.7\]]kun du sbyor bar bya ba dang /_skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun par 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob kyis rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las brtsams te/_
[\[9b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa dang /_chod pa med 
[\[9b.3\]]pa dang /_brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_zhum pa med pa dang /_'phrogs pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[9b.4\]]ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems 
[\[9b.5\]]dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/_de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi 
[\[9b.6\]]mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba 
[\[9b.7\]]yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gang dag 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin/_gang las bsams te de skad smra/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[10a.2\]]sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang 
[\[10a.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_de dag ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems dang po bskyed 
[\[10a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang /_las dang po pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa dang /_skye bar skyes pa dang /_sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rgyal tshab 
[\[10a.5\]]dang /_dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/_de dag ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs 
[\[10a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[10a.7\]]chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba'am/_mdzes pa'am/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'am/_rgya che ba'am/_gzi brjid che ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'am/_kun rjod pa'i rnam par 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]'phrul pa'am/_rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/_sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod cing thog ma nyid du bla na med pa 
[\[10b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /_'das pa dang ma 
[\[10b.3\]]'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang /_khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang /_mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma 
[\[10b.4\]]yin pa shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_lha'i mig 
[\[10b.5\]]gi shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa ste/_bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems 
[\[10b.6\]]dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang /_mchog tu bya ba dang /_zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /_sangs 
[\[10b.7\]]rgyas dpag tu med pa dang /_phrad pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor du bya ba dang /_'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob 
[\[11a.2\]]pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub 
[\[11a.3\]]sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phan par bya ba'i sems dang /_bde bar bya ba'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_mnyen pa'i sems dang /_sdug pa'i sems 
[\[11a.4\]]dang /_phan gdags pa'i sems dang /_kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang /_snyoms pa'i sems dang /_slob dpon gyi sems dang /_ston pa'i sems te/_sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[11a.5\]]dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung mnod pa dang /_kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mang du thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar par bya'o/_/rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar 
[\[11a.6\]]bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa 
[\[11a.7\]]la sbyar bar bya'o/_/don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thob pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[11b.2\]]sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa 
[\[11b.3\]]rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /_bdag med pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /_
[\[11b.4\]]dbugs 'byin pa med pa nyid dang /_gnas med pa nyid dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang /_rtsol ba med pa nyid dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed 
[\[11b.5\]]de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[11b.6\]]khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[11b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags 
[\[12a.2\]]par skyes pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos nyid las phyir mi zlogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang /_chos nges par sems pa dang /_sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_zhing la 
[\[12a.3\]]rnam par dpyod pa dang /_'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_las la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/_yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po 
[\[12a.4\]]de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa 
[\[12a.5\]]la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la 
[\[12a.6\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub 
[\[12a.7\]]pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma byon pa'i sangs 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam 
[\[12b.2\]]par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[12b.3\]]sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[12b.4\]]sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snying 
[\[12b.5\]]brtse bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad gdul 
[\[12b.6\]]bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas 
[\[12b.7\]]bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can mtha' yas pa dang /_sems can dpag tu med pa dang /_sems can grangs med pa dang /_sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can mtshungs pa med pa dang /_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sems can gzhal du med pa dang /_sems can stong pa nyid dang /_sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /_sems can med pa nyid dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen 
[\[13a.2\]]pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[13a.3\]]dag de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thos na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[13a.4\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_chos kyi bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa'am/_
[\[13a.5\]]bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/_sems 
[\[13a.6\]]can gyi khams rgya chung zhes 'chad pa'am/_sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe'am/_sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe'am/_sems 
[\[13a.7\]]can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/_chos kyi dbyings rgya chung zhe'am/_chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/_'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am/_mi 'jig ce'am/_chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/_chos kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste sangs 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang 
[\[13b.2\]]dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa nyid dang /_med pa nyid dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa nyid dang /_dben 
[\[13b.3\]]pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /_sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /_rmi lam lta bu nyid dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i 
[\[13b.4\]]chos can du gyur cing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[13b.5\]]ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[13b.6\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas yod do zhe'am med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[13b.7\]]yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe'am nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]byon to zhe'am byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am/_da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am mi zad do zhes bya ba dang /_dus gsum po dag 
[\[14a.2\]]mtshan nyid gcig ce'am mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 
[\[14a.3\]]chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang /_tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang /_yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang /_don la yi ge sgro 
[\[14a.4\]]btags pa dang /_dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang /_dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid 
[\[14a.5\]]med pa sgro btags pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i 
[\[14a.6\]]gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam 
[\[14a.7\]]par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ldan pa yin/_yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/_sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par sgrub pa yin/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/_sems can gyi 
[\[14b.2\]]khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa 
[\[14b.3\]]myur ba yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[14b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba 
[\[14b.5\]]dang /_dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang /_yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang /_sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang /_sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 
[\[14b.6\]]shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing /_gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag 
[\[14b.7\]]pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_chos nyid 
[\[15a.2\]]rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_
[\[15a.3\]]kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/_bcu gang 
[\[15a.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kun du spyad pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang 
[\[15a.5\]]bskur ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams 
[\[15a.6\]]cad la sgrib pa med par bsgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[15a.7\]]ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med 
[\[15b.2\]]pa yongs su sbyong ba byed pa mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig 
[\[15b.3\]]gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/_sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud 
[\[15b.4\]]pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man chad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par mi nus/_ngag gi las shes par mi nus/_yid kyi las shes 
[\[15b.5\]]par mi nus/_rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/_rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/_'das pa'i dus la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus shing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus/_blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/_sems kyi yul shes par 
[\[15b.6\]]mi nus/_ye shes kyi spyod yul shes par mi nus te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang 
[\[15b.7\]]dag par brjod pa mdzad de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus gsum shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rgyas par dgang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang /_chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[16a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/_/byang chub 
[\[16a.3\]]sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[16a.4\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg go_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/
[\[16a.5\]]chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang 
[\[16a.6\]]mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i pad+ma'i sprin gyi char dang /_lha'i rgyan phreng gi sprin gyi 
[\[16a.7\]]char dang /_lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo /_/lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo /_/lha'i nga ro yang grag go/_/gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do/_/tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol 
[\[16b.2\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/_phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[16b.3\]]sras bdag cag kyang ming chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas 'dir phyin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag 
[\[16b.4\]]thams cad du chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/_'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te/_lhag chad med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to/_/
[\[16b.5\]]bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[16b.6\]]phyin par gyur to//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas de'i 
[\[16b.7\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/_/mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa/_/bsnyen dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/do zla 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang /_/kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang /_/sdug bsngal bzod rlag 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[17a.2\]]kun du bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang /_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang /_/gzhan min dngos 
[\[17a.3\]]por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/_/dge dang mi dge'i las rnams gang yod pa/_/de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/ting 
[\[17a.4\]]'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang /_/de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/_/de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/_/ci 'dra ci 'dra 
[\[17a.5\]]de yi de dang der/_/rim pa da dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang /_/lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum nas/_/bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du 
[\[17a.6\]]brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/_/gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi/_/khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems de 'jog_/chos 'dir kun du 'gro bar 
[\[17a.7\]]gang gyur cing /_/dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa/_/yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_/sems can ji ltar sa las 'byung 'gyur zhes/_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na/_/sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang /_/sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan 
[\[17b.2\]]pa sems 'di 'jog_/ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa/_/kun du sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i/_/nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang /_/
[\[17b.3\]]ngag lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa/_/brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/_/stong pa mi g.yo rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/_/don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[17b.4\]]byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang /_/rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'od zer rtse mo re las 'od 
[\[17b.5\]]zer rnams/_/de bzhin phyogs bcu kun du rab tu 'gyed/_/de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa/_/de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te/_/sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs 
[\[17b.6\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/_/gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas/_/chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/
[\[17b.7\]]rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa/_/skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed/_/ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag_/gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]cing /_/phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du/_/ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jigs pa rnams/_/bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya 
[\[18a.2\]]ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang /_/ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/brjod 
[\[18a.3\]]du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/_/skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/skra yis bcings nas ma 
[\[18a.4\]]lus srang la 'debs/_/rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan 
[\[18a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba/_/skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing /_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/'jig rten gsum 
[\[18a.6\]]po ma lus rtogs par byed/_/sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes/_/lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/zhing rnams kun du brjod dang 'dra bar yang /_/skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar 
[\[18a.7\]]byed/_/rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhing rang byung gi/_/chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams/_/rnam pa kun du mngon par sprul byed cing /_/yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs 
[\[18b.2\]]rgyas rnams/_/ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/_/tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bskal ba zad kyi de la nyams pa med/_/tshig 
[\[18b.3\]]rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog 
[\[18b.4\]]byed/_/phyogs rnams kun du 'gro yang lus kyis sam/_/ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa med/_/dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog_/byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/_/
[\[18b.5\]]gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su rgyu byed cing /_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten tha dad par/_/'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba/_/gang yang rung ba dam 
[\[18b.6\]]pa sgrog par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/byang chub don du srid par spyad spyod tshe/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyor gang yin pa/_/de yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/chos mchog 
[\[18b.7\]]chos rab phul du phyin pa dang /_/khyad par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad gyur ci 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la 
[\[19a.2\]]ston par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang /_/de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa dag_/de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed/_/'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/_/'khor 
[\[19a.3\]]ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang /_/dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/_/shin du sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang /_/ngan song sa rnams dag tu 
[\[19a.4\]]gnod gyur pa'i/_/gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya/_/gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa/_/de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar bstan/_/bslab pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges 
[\[19a.5\]]byas pa/_/ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin/_/nad bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/_/de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa/_/'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no/_/phan pa thob byed sems 
[\[19a.6\]]dang rab dang bde/_/gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang /_/kun du bsrung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems/_/slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/_/de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyur pa de/_/lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar 
[\[19a.7\]]bya/_/mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug_/dben par gyur nas dge bshes sten du gzhug_/dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya/_/dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya/_/dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya/_/'jigs 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa med nas don la brtson par bya/_/don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya/_/chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya/_/rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya/_/'di ni dang po'i 
[\[19b.2\]]las can brjod pa ste/_/byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/_/'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan la rab tu 
[\[19b.3\]]sbyor/_/mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang /_/bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang /_/de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang /_/mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang /_/'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par/_/byang chub 
[\[19b.4\]]sems dpa' de ltar rtog par byed/_/sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang /_/brtag par bya phyir de ni gzengs yang bstod/_/'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu med ces/_/de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug par bya/_/'di nas dang chu dang de bzhin 
[\[19b.5\]]me/_/rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang /_/phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/_/de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug_/rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba/_/de ni sangs 
[\[19b.6\]]rgyas sras po sbyor byed la/_/phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/_/bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed/_/blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos po rtogs/_/dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes/_/
[\[19b.7\]]de ni rang gi sa las yongs mi ldog_/sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye/_/rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan/_/sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod/_/las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang /_/rnam par smin dang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]'khor dang mya ngan 'das/_/rnam par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes/_/de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar brjod/_/thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang /_/ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas/_/
[\[20a.2\]]grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang /_/rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba/_/sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni/_/dus gsum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pa shes/_/nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed mi byed/_/de ni dus gsum tha 
[\[20a.3\]]dad med par 'jug_/gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste/_/'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de/_/byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/_/sbyor 
[\[20a.4\]]ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/_/bsod nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed/_/de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang /_/'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang /_/phan par 'dod 
[\[20a.5\]]dang bde ba thob byed dang /_/snying brtse ba dang skye dgu dgrol 'gyur byed/_/'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/'dren par byed cing rab tu dang bar byed/_/sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sems 
[\[20a.6\]]kyis mthu yang che/_/'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma med pa dang /_/de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang /_/mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang /_/stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[20a.7\]]lnga pa ste/_/sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang snying brtse ldan/_/de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/_/yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan/_/de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang /_/chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med/_/shin tu blo ldan rtog 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bral rnam rtog med/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang /_/sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes/_/thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur 
[\[20b.2\]]ba med/_/sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag gam/_/gdul sla zhe'am gdul bar dka' zhe'am/_/chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe'am/_/'jig par 'gyur zhe'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe'am/_/chos dbyings yod ce'am med ces 
[\[20b.3\]]thos gyur kyang /_/dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/_/nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de/_/sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin du nges/_/mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang /_/dngos med rang bzhin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing 
[\[20b.4\]]dben pa dang /_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi/_/chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed/_/de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod/_/'byung 
[\[20b.5\]]ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das she'am/_/ma byon ce'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am/_/byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam/_/de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med/_/gcig dang tha dad rnam pa 
[\[20b.6\]]mang po dang /_/don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa/_/thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed/_/mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang /_/mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang /_/
[\[20b.7\]]rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams/_/thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed/_/gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang /_/'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing /_/ji ltar 'dod 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston/_/pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtog byed cing /_/de dag rnams kyi mos pa spyod par byed/_/sems can spyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang /_/zhing rnams 'jig dang chags pa rnams kyang shes/_/ji ltar 
[\[21a.2\]]'dod sbyin myur du mngon shes thob/_/phyogs rnams kun du yid ni 'jug par byed/_/bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang /_/de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba med/_/yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang /_/de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam 
[\[21a.3\]]dpyod dang /_/ji ltar skad cig grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba/_/zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya/_/de ni dri ba grangs med 'dre bar byed/_/lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston/_/de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byam klas dang /_/skad cig la yang sangs rgyas grangs 
[\[21a.4\]]med brjod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa/_/sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes/_/de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang /_/spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang /_/tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang /_/'jig rten 
[\[21a.5\]]rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang /_/brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag_/ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin/_/pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshang 'byin te/_/der yang ji ltar kun du spyad pa dang /_/gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang /_/pho 
[\[21a.6\]]brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang /_/dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang /_/byin gyi rlabs dang gzhan gnon ci 'dra dang /_/chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste/_/'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin/_/de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/_/
[\[21a.7\]]ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med/_/tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na/_/tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs/_/dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste/_/thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/_/skra thigs 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung /_/'dir ni bsam pa bgrang bas rtogs ma yin/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste/_/'di na sems can la las zhing rnams kun/_/phra rab rdul du rlags nas ma lus 'grang /_/grangs med 'di snyed cig 
[\[21b.2\]]ces gcod byed pa/_/de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes/_/'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang /_/rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi/_/sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de skye/_/
[\[21b.3\]]thog mar byang chub sems shes gang brjod pa/_/de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de/_/'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na/_/de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 
[\[21b.4\]]blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de 
[\[21b.5\]]dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag ni nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[21b.6\]]chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/_
[\[21b.7\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]kyang ci dgos/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/_bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas 
[\[22a.2\]]bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur par yang ma bas kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so/_/
[\[22a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas brtan de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa 
[\[22a.4\]]ti'i bu song la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig_/chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der sgrogs shig_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[22a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skam pas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di'i skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig_/
[\[22a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig_/khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/
[\[22a.7\]]de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/_bcom 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na yang bcom ldan 
[\[22b.2\]]'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_de 
[\[22b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_rigs kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[22b.4\]]phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[22b.5\]]gyur pa la chos bshad par gsol ba thob shig_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/_nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan 
[\[22b.6\]]pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 
[\[22b.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/_kho bos ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so/_/'jam 
[\[23a.2\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_khyod snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod kyis shod cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_stong 
[\[23a.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal 
[\[23a.4\]]po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/chos 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus 
[\[23a.5\]]par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur to/_/dge slong gi 'khor dang /_dge slong ma'i 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang /_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang /_mtha' bral gyi 'khor 
[\[23a.6\]]dang /_dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang /_'phrul dga'i 'khor dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang /_tshangs pa'i 'khor dang /_de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par 
[\[23a.7\]]gyur te/_'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang 
[\[23b.2\]]ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang /_grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to/_/khams kyi
