[\[45b.7\]]bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/_/spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/_/mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/_/
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/_/spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag_/byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/_/sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang /_/sil snyan 
[\[46a.2\]]bsgrags shing spos kyis bdugs pa yis/_/pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/_/sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing /_/me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod/_/des na sna tshogs bkod pa 
[\[46a.3\]]grub par gyur/_/shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sa rnams lag 'thil bzhin du gnas par byed/_/mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/_/des na shin tu dang ba'i 'od grub bo/_/sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/spos kyi char 'bebs sprin 
[\[46a.4\]]rnams kun tu gnas/_/mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas/_/sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob/_/lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/gcer bu gos yong rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag_/sbyin pa byas pas 
[\[46a.5\]]lhab lhub bkod pa grub/_/ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/_/zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/_/byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/_/nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dbul po 
[\[46a.6\]]dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/_/dkon mchog gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa/_/dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo/_/mig rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong /_/rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i 
[\[46a.7\]]mchod rten la/_/mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/_/rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer grub/_/sna rnam sbyong ba'i 'od 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]zer rab gtong zhing /_/sngon chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/spos rab phul pas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/_/lce rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod/_/mi snyan brlang 
[\[46b.2\]]bar smra ba rnam spangs te/_/'jam par smras pas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/_/lus rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/lus btud byas pas lus rnam sbyong ba thob/_/sems 
[\[46b.3\]]rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na/_/sems rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/_/gzugs rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku 
[\[46b.4\]]mthong ste/_/sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang /_/mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo/_/sgra rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sgra ni sgra mi stong par rab tu shes/_/rkyen las byung bas brag ca 'dra'o zhes/_/sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo/_/
[\[46b.5\]]dri rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/_/spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag_/khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/_/ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/sangs 
[\[46b.6\]]rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/_/ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/_/reg rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/_/phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal 'gyur/_/bcos 
[\[46b.7\]]bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste/_/me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang /_/phreng ba bla re phul ba'i 'od de yin/_/chos rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]kyi/_/spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/_/byung ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/_/rkyen las byung ba ma skyes ngo bo nyid/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/_/chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes/_/brjod pas chos 
[\[47a.2\]]rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/_/'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/_/drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/_/'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste/_/kun kyang las sbyor tha dad tshul can no/_/ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas/_/'od zer gang gA'i bye ma 
[\[47a.3\]]snyed 'byung ba/_/ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i/_/yon tan de grogs sngon chad gang gyur pa/_/de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/_/drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'di 
[\[47a.4\]]'dra'o/_/de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/_/rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang /_/gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/_/de dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes/_/gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang /_/gang dag yang 
[\[47a.5\]]yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'dun te don gnyer ba/_/de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/_/dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang /_/de med ma yin 'jig rten dag tu 'char/_/mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/_/kun kyang 
[\[47a.6\]]rang rang so so'i las la 'jug_/de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/_/rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing /_/mos nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/_/blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/_/dper rgyan nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang /_/
[\[47a.7\]]bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos/_/de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi/_/phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med/_/de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag mod/_/de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing /_/mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/_/gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/_/dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na/_/bdag ni yon tan cher 'gyur mi 'gyur zhes/_/de dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do/_/de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul 
[\[47b.2\]]ba/_/ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par grub byed cing /_/phyogs bcu kun du do zla med rnams kyi/_/zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/_/'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa/_/stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/_/skyil krung bcas pa'i lus 
[\[47b.3\]]kyis kun khyab ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/_/'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing /_/sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor/_/de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas/_/drang 
[\[47b.4\]]srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/_/yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa/_/de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing /_/kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/_/gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/_/skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin 
[\[47b.5\]]te/_/rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/_/skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/_/de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing /_/zhabs 'bring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/_/de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun du ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam 
[\[47b.6\]]par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/_/ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing /_/kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldang bar yang /_/phyogs bcu kun du rang gi lus ston to/_/de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[47b.7\]]nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang /_/nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang /_/de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug_/gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la/_/ye shes yon tan phyug 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]po gzhan nas ldang /_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/_/grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/_/de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/_/zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas 
[\[48a.2\]]par snang /_/phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/_/dpa' bo nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par/_/rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/_/mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang /_/nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/_/grangs 
[\[48a.3\]]med ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas/_/de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/_/zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang /_/phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/_/dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par/_/rnam par ldang zhing mngon 
[\[48a.4\]]sum rgyal kun la/_/mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang /_/de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/_/phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan pa 'jug_/kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing /_/'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang /_/
[\[48a.5\]]de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/_/de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/_/gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/_/mig ni 
[\[48a.6\]]ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/sgra 
[\[48a.7\]]dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/_/sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldan/_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs/_/dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/
[\[48b.2\]]sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan/_/ro mchog rnams la mnyam 
[\[48b.3\]]par bzhag gyur cing /_/lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang du lhar 
[\[48b.4\]]bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la zhugs/_/reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnams par ldang /_/
[\[48b.5\]]de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/_/chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/_/chos lam rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/sems ni 
[\[48b.6\]]ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang /_/lang tsho shugs gnas rnams la mnyam 
[\[48b.7\]]bzhag cing /_/rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang /_/rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang /_/dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rnam par ldang /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/dge slong ma yi lus las rnam par ldang /_/dge slong ma yi lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang /_/dge slong mang thos lus 
[\[49a.2\]]la mnyam bzhag cing /_/slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang /_/slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang /_/rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las 
[\[49a.3\]]rnam par ldang /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam bzhag cing /_/lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang /_/lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam bzhag cing /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang /_/rdzu 'phrul klu yi lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[49a.4\]]'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par ldang /_/'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang /_/'byung po kun gyi lus la mnyam bzhag cing /_/spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang /_/spu sgo gcig 
[\[49a.5\]]la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/spu sgo thams cad nas ni rnam par ldang /_/spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang /_/skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing /_/skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par 
[\[49a.6\]]ldang /_/skra rtse kun gyi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing /_/phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang /_/rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang /_/rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho'i 
[\[49a.7\]]rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang /_/rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing /_/nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang /_/shing tog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur nas/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang /_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi chu klung rnams las ldang /_/rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid chen po me yi lam nas ldang /_/me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/
[\[49b.2\]]rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang /_/sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang /_/lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam bzhag cing /_/dran ldan de dag mkha' 
[\[49b.3\]]las rnam par ldang /_/yon tan bsam yas bsags pa de dag gi/_/ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/_/rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/_/bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod/_/'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/
[\[49b.4\]]rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/_/klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang /_/bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/_/de dag 'dra ba'i dpe zla cang med de/_/mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe 
[\[49b.5\]]rnams kyis/_/bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur/_/rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi/_/nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/_/mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig gyur te/_/mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/_/
[\[49b.6\]]smad nas me 'bar stod nas chu yi rgyun/_/stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun/_/'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang /_/lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab/_/de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing /_/byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal 'dor yang /_/
[\[49b.7\]]lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed/_/nyi zla mkha' la rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dngo dag dang /_/mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang /_/rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]brnyan ston/_/de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun du ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang /_/dang ba'i 
[\[50a.2\]]mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag_/de dag so so rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong /_/ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang /_/go gyon bzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong /_/gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang /_/de dang de dag de 
[\[50a.3\]]ltar chu las mthong /_/'on kyang chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/_/sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyi/_/sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te/_/rang gi 
[\[50a.4\]]skad kyis skad kun tshim par byed/_/sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang /_/skad rnams kun gyi sgra yi tshul mkhas na/_/gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed/_/tum bu ru yi chung ma 
[\[50a.5\]]dbyangs ldan ma/_/tshangs pa'i bu mo yid las byung ba de/_/bden dang dam bcas mi 'tshe dga' rnams kyi/_/sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste/_/dbyangs ldan chags can zhe sdang can de yang /_/brtul zhugs grub mthun dbyangs kyi yan 
[\[50a.6\]]lag gi/_/yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/_/ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed/_/rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston par byed/_/nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo 
[\[50a.7\]]brgya dang /_/khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/_/'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang /_/sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/_/bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa/_/spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]mi byed/_/lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na/_/de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhin bcas shing /_/theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer/_/'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de 
[\[50b.2\]]dag kyang /_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams/_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/_/rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang po sa srung bu/_/dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de/_/mgo bo 
[\[50b.3\]]sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul cing /_/mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/_/mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang /_/rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/rdzing re la yang pad+ma sna tshogs pa/_/rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/
[\[50b.4\]]pad+ma re re'ang lha yi bu mo dag_/sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/_/glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te/_/lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing 'dre bar byed/_/
[\[50b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang mthun/_/glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang /_/glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang /_/'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/_/shes rab thabs kyi stobs la sbyangs pa rnams/_/ting 'dzin brgya 
[\[50b.6\]]yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed/_/sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'phrul te/_/rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing /_/rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston/_/ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/_/sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang /_/
[\[50b.7\]]'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/_/'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'joms pa/_/rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed/_/brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste/_/lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa/_/de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/_/lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/_/brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/_/de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/_/lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos gyur/_/'jigs 
[\[51a.2\]]par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/_/rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing /_/lus la go bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i/_/brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/_/de yang bsod nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis/_/lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul 
[\[51a.3\]]byed na/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa/_/bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul/_/lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/_/lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa/_/lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/_/rnga de nam mkha' las ni 
[\[51a.4\]]sgra sgrogs te/_/'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min/_/tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra/_/srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs/_/bag med thams cad dgrar bcas mya ngan can/_/'chi 
[\[51a.5\]]ba'i lam yin mi 'chi lam ma yin/_/ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa/_/de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin/_/sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin/_/skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad/_/'dod pa'i yon tan rnams 
[\[51a.6\]]kyi yul la rmongs/_/chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul/_/rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang /_/lha yi 'dun sa chos bzang 'dug nas su/_/gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral mthun pa/_/chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod/_/
[\[51a.7\]]rnga de gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang /_/de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/_/bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston rnams/_/'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed/_/lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i rnga yi sgra/_/lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/_/rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing /_/skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur/_/lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams/_/'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod 
[\[51b.2\]]la 'byer/_/de ltar sgra skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/_/'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po/_/nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/_/zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar byed/_/dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/_/dbang po'i sprul pas 
[\[51b.3\]]kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/_/gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/_/gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/_/lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang yang /_/chos bzang 'dun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug_/lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing /_/
[\[51b.4\]]brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul/_/brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang /_/sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/_/'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/_/bdud kyi dkrugs ma 
[\[51b.5\]]'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/_/de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong /_/las dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis/_/so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings/_/chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang /_/'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed 
[\[51b.6\]]na/_/dbang bcu dbang thob rnams lta ci smos te/_/'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi 'jog_/stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang /_/stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/_/de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing /_/tshangs pa'i 
[\[51b.7\]]sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs/_/tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/_/bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/_/'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi/_/bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi 'phrul/_/dbang phyug chen po'i shes 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/_/rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba/_/skad cig gcig la thams cad 'grang ba byed/_/thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na/_/bslab pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te/_/byang chub bla med 
[\[52a.2\]]ye shes thob pa rnams/_/ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes/_/sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung /_/rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang /_/rin 
[\[52a.3\]]chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa'ang byung /_/rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang kun du 'bab/_/rlung gis sprin kyang rab tu zhi bar byed/_/'jig rten lo tog 'phel ba'ang rlung byed de/_/rlung ni 'gro ba kun la phan pa skyed/_/rlung de pha rol phyin la ma bslabs shing /_/
[\[52a.4\]]sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs kyang /_/'jig rten rnam smin bsam yas ston byed na/_/dam pa thob rnams ci phyir ston mi byed/_/rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/_/bya skad [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skad dang skyes pa dang /_/bud med bu mo khye'u skad ci snyed 
[\[52a.5\]]pa/_/kun gyi sgra snyan sems can rnams la sgrogs/_/de ltar sgra snyan rang bzhin med shes nas/_/sgrib pa med pa'i spobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/'gro ba kun la sgra snyan brjod byas nas/_/yid 'ong sgra yis 'jig rten mgu bar byed/_/rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi 
[\[52a.6\]]chos/_/'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs pas rgya mtsho ste/_/chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad/_/chu rnams bzung bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/_/de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgya 'dra ste/_/bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par thar rnams dang /_/shes rab ye shes yon 
[\[52a.7\]]tan kun mi zad/_/bsod nams yon tan sogs pas ngoms pa med/_/rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse ba na/_/sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/_/gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas 'gengs te/_/de dag kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang /_/de ni dbang 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sgyur gnas su 'dzam gling gi/_/gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrub/_/'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/_/dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog_/'thab bral gnas su mthon mthing baiDUr+ya/_/sum cu rtsa gsum rdo yi snying po 'dra/_/
[\[52b.2\]]skyong ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/_/rgya mtshor rdo rje mi phyed mkhregs 'dra ba/_/mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'khrigs lta bu/_/klu yi gnas su pad+ma'i mdog 'dra ba/_/gsang ba'i gnas su dad pa bya gar mdog_/lha min gnas su ri brag mdog 'dra ba/_/
[\[52b.3\]]byang du gser gyi 'od zer mdog ston te/_/gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogs bkod pa ston/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste/_/gang na ci mtho sprin rnams de bzhin no/_/dbang sgyur gnas su gser sprin nges bstan nas/_/nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/_/
[\[52b.4\]]'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang /_/dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog 'dra/_/'thab bral gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog_/sum cu rtsa gsum gser gyi 'od zer 'dra/_/skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog_/rgya mtshor mu 
[\[52b.5\]]tig dmar po'i mdo 'dra bkod/_/mi ci gnas su mthon mthing baiDUr+ya/_/klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog_/gsang ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog 'dra ba/_/lha min gnas su rdo yi snying po 'dra/_/byang du nor bu skar mdog kha dog 'dra/_/gling 
[\[52b.6\]]gzhan rnams su'ang bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan/_/'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu 'bar/_/sprin gyi mtshan nyid mthun pa'i glog kyang 'gyed/_/de ni dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs sgra sgrogs/_/'phrul dga'i gnas su rnga sgra sgrog par byed/_/dga' ldan 
[\[52b.7\]]gnas su sil snyan rol mo'i sgra/_/'thab bral gnas su lha yi bu mo'i sgra/_/sum cu gsum du mi ci mang po'i skad/_/skyong ba'i gnas su dri za'i skad du ste/_/rgya mtshor ri 'thab sgra skad 'dra ba'o/_/mi ci gnas su gling bu kun la sgra/_/klu yi gnas su 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ka la ping ka'i sgra/_/gsang ba'i gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/_/lha min gnas su lha yi rdza rnga'i sgra/_/mi yi gnas su rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra/_/de ni dbang sgyur gnas su lha spos zhim/_/me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i char yang 'bebs/_/'phrul dgar 
[\[53a.2\]]zla ba zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dra ba yi/_/me tog man dAr phreng dang byug pa 'bebs/_/dga' ldan gnas su nor bu chen po'i mdog_/rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/gtsug gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang /_/gser mdog 'dra ba'i dar la'i char yang 'bebs/_/rgyal mtshan 
[\[53a.3\]]gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang /_/phreng ba rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa dang /_/mu tig dmar dang gser dang dar la dang /_/sil snyan yid 'ong 'thab bral gnas su 'bebs/_/sum cu gsum du yid bzhin nor bu mchog_/skyong ba'i gnas su tsan+dan snying po'i mchog_/
[\[53a.4\]]gur gum sil ma lha shing ta ma la/_/spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog rab tu 'bebs/_/skyong ba'i gnas su klu yi dbang po de/_/nyam stobs skye ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/_/kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang /_/de min rin chen bsam yas char yang 'bebs/_/de ni rgya 
[\[53a.5\]]mtsho chen por rgyun du yang /_/char rgyun mi 'chad gnya' shing tsam dag dang /_/rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa/_/rin chen bkod pa mtha' yas char yang 'bebs/_/mi ci gnas su rgyan phreng sna tshogs dang /_/pad+ma ut+pal ras dang rin chen dang /_/me tog 
[\[53a.6\]]bar sha ma li phye ma spos/_/pi bang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rnga 'bebs/_/klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/_/gsang bar nor bu rin chen skar mdog 'dra/_/lha min gnas su ral gri mda' chen dang /_/dgrar 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char ba 'bebs/_/byang du de ni rgyal phreng 
[\[53a.7\]]rin chen dang /_/me tog bar sha ma li tsam pa'i phreng /_/ku ran gtsang dang a ti mug ta 'bebs/_/gling gzhan rnams su'ang sna tshogs char pa 'bebs/_/'dzam bu'i gling du chu gsal dang ba yi/_/char rnams chos bzhin phra ba'i rgyun du 'bebs/_/me tog 'bras bu sman dang 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]spos dang shing /_/lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnams su skyed/_/de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang /_/gnas nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/_/klu yi rnam 'phrul de ltar bsam mi khyab/_/rgya 
[\[53b.2\]]mtsho'i chu na gnas pa de ltar yang /_/klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug_/rnam 'phrul bsam yas ci phyir ston mi byed/_/bag tsam smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis/_/skyes chen de dag rnams kyi brjod pa 
[\[53b.3\]]byas/_/dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral/_/de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro/_/blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan/_/ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/_/ye shes mchog ldan khyad par blo can gyi/_/rnam thar mchog rnams 'di lta rnams kyis 
[\[53b.4\]]bshad/_/rnam thar dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas/_/yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog byed pa/_/de dag ngo mtshar rmad byung chos ldan te/_/de dag dga' byed mi yi 'jig rten na/_/'di 'dra'i chos 'dir gang dag dad gyur pa/_/sems can so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na 
[\[53b.5\]]dkon/_/gang dag dge bsags bsod nams byas gyur ba/_/de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dad/_/gang dag nyan thos theg pa'ang yid ches pa'i/_/mi dag mi yi 'jig rten rnams na nyung /_/de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung /_/theg pa chen por de dag de bas nyung /_/
[\[53b.6\]]theg pa che la zhugs pa de dkon te/_/gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang rab dkon na/_/'jug cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te/_/gang dag de bzhin sgrub pa smos ci dgos/_/gang dag stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/phyi ma'i bskal par mgo bos 'deg byed kyang /_/chos 
[\[53b.7\]]'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/_/la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can la/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal bar bsnyen bkur kyang /_/chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/_/bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/_/la las zhing bcu ri 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/lag pa'i mthil du bskal par mkhar 'dzin kyang /_/chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/_/la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/_/dge ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur 
[\[54a.2\]]kyang /_/chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/_/bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/_/la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur bas/_/gang gis chos kyi le'u 'di gzung byas pa/_/bsod nams de ni de bas khyad 
[\[54a.3\]]par 'phags/_/rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan pa'i tshe/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/_/bdud kyi gnas rnams mog mog byas gyur cing /_/sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/_/de dag kun gyis mngon 
[\[54a.4\]]par zhal bstan te/_/phyag [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]dzad nas yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/bzang po dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/_/phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/_/rnam thar 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs/_/khyod kyis legs bstan rjes su nged dgyes zhes/_/
[\[54a.5\]]sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang /_mi dang 
[\[54a.6\]]mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas 'di legs par bka' stsal to/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di mdzad do/_/chos bstan pa 'di sngon ma thos so/_/sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnyed 
[\[54a.7\]]par 'gyur ba de dag ni shin tu dkon te/_sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]'jig rten la mchod rten lta bur 'gyur te/_de dag ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/_/rab tu byung ba rnams sam/_khyim na gnas pa rnams sam/_de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam/_blon po chen po rnams sam/_khyim bdag rnams kyis 
[\[54b.2\]]gtse bar mi nus so zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/_'on kyang de bzhin 
[\[54b.3\]]gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di lta bu ni 'jig rten du byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[54b.4\]]dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[54b.5\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te/_slan chad mi bskyud par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa kun tu bzang po 
[\[54b.6\]]dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[54b.7\]]'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]{D848}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dz+nyA no lko nA ma d+hA ra NI sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha nI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[55a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la 
[\[55a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 
[\[55a.4\]]kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis de bzhin 
[\[55a.5\]]gshegs pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas/_de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa rnams dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[55a.6\]]brtsegs pa dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa yang mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig sems te/_ji ltar byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[55a.7\]]'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang /_mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa thob par 'gyur 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de 
[\[55b.2\]]dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/_s+yAd+Ya the dan/_tsak+Shurda da/_tsak+Shu sh+shu b+ha d+hu la me thA ka la t+tha/_it+ti t+than+sa sU raT+Ta/_sU raT+Ta/_sud+thA ya/_it+than+sA/_be lA be lA pA Ni tsa ru mUrti ni/_A ra Ni/_A ra Ni/_kA la pA Ni/_kA la pA Ni/_
[\[55b.3\]]tu ru du si/_tu ru du si/_d+ha su te/_d+ha su ti/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ra d+hu ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ra/_kA la kA la/_sat+thA sa/_gI la gI la/_gI la ba ya/_gI la ba ya/_d+hu su d+hu su/_sun+d+hu sun+d+hu/_sat+thA su/_at+thA su/_e thA su/_e thA 
[\[55b.4\]]sA pA ni/_yu tsu re d+he/_su d+ha re/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_kurma kurma/_kurma pA Ni/_kurma bA Ni/_ke lu ke lu/_ke la pA Ni/_ke la pA Ni/_karkA ri/_karkA ri/_la ru bud+d+he/_d+hu ru d+he/_d+hu ru d+he/_ma hA d+hu ru d+he/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri 
[\[55b.5\]]ki ri/_bi hu si/_bi hu si/_d+ha su d+ha su/_ha su ha su/_ha su pa ni swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can ngan 
[\[55b.6\]]song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dag u dum bA ra'i me tog ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/
[\[55b.7\]]rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_'di dag ni 'chang ba'am klog pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskal par gnas pa/_mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa/_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa 
[\[56a.2\]]gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/_de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa kha brgyar 'gyes par 'gyur la/_sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar bar 'gyur na 'dzam 
[\[56a.3\]]bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/_gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag gis ni bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang /_zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa 
[\[56a.4\]]yin no snyam du shes pa kho nar bya ste/_'di la som nyi'am yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hu na Ti/_d+hu na Ti/_ma hA d+hu na Ti/_su ru su ru swA hA/_shu kla bi sho d+ha ni/_ta ra ta ra swA hA/_dz+yo tiSh+tha dI pe/_tu ru tu ru swA hA/_pad+ma mA li ni/_
[\[56a.5\]]sat+ya ta ra bud+d+hi/_hu ru hu ru swA hA/_sat+ya bud+d+hi/_sat+ya a ba lo ki ni/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri swA hA/_d+ha ra na bu Ti/_a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_lak+Sha Ni tsi te/_d+hU ma pa ri ha re/_hu ru hu ru/_khu ru khu ru swA hA/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_mA d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra yan+ti ye 
[\[56a.6\]]swA hA/_su pra ti/_su ma ti/_a pra ti ha ta/_bud+d+hi/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra yan+ti ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[56a.7\]]bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/swA hA/_'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]{D849}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nya na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[56b.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med za sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang 
[\[56b.3\]]po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[56b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_tshe 'dzin cing mthar phyin par gzhes te/_sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig_/
[\[56b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/_de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya 
[\[56b.6\]]ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_ming tsam yang nyan tam klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe 
[\[56b.7\]]yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag tshe zad 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]kar mtshan 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/_yi ger 'dri 'am 
[\[58a.2\]]yi ger 'drir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni 'di dag go/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a ba ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu 
[\[58a.3\]]N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam 
[\[58a.4\]]klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a ba ri 
[\[58a.5\]]mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA 
[\[58a.6\]]hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_
[\[58a.7\]]tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ti pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro 
[\[58b.2\]]ba tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga 
[\[58b.3\]]ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya tha/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi 
[\[58b.4\]]shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha 
[\[58b.5\]]te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa 
[\[58b.6\]]gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta 
[\[58b.7\]]pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga 
[\[59a.2\]]te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga pa te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga 
[\[59a.3\]]tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa 
[\[59a.4\]]lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a 
[\[59a.5\]]pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe 
[\[59a.6\]]dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M 
[\[59a.7\]]sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he 
[\[59b.2\]]ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/_de nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur 
[\[59b.3\]]te/_gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na 
[\[59b.4\]]saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo 
[\[59b.5\]]b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+ha ba bi 
[\[59b.6\]]shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA ri swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'dir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA 
[\[59b.7\]]dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha he saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[60a.2\]]o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i sdig pa'i phung bo ri 
[\[60a.3\]]rab tsam yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA 
[\[60a.4\]]ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang /_gnod sbyin dang srin pos glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[60a.5\]]o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA 
[\[60a.6\]]ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du chos ston pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[60a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis ma za shig_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[60b.2\]]de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a 
[\[60b.3\]]pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[60b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M 
[\[60b.5\]]sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gang 
[\[60b.6\]]dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA 
[\[60b.7\]]ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]'jug na de bud med kyi lus su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta 
[\[61a.2\]]pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te sA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swa hA/_gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kAr+ShA pa Na 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin na des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun 
[\[61a.3\]]gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta bu N+ye a pa ri ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi 
[\[61a.4\]]te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos mtha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA 
[\[61a.5\]]na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di 
[\[61a.6\]]lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob dang log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srung dang shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i 
[\[61a.7\]]tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/_tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste dper na rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar 
[\[61b.2\]]nus kyi/_tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta 
[\[61b.3\]]pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni 
[\[61b.4\]]bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa 
[\[61b.5\]]mut+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_bsti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa 
[\[61b.6\]]dang mchod pa byas pa yin no/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga 
[\[61b.7\]]te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ges sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mi yi seng ges tshul khrims stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ges bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug 
[\[62a.2\]]pa na/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ges brtson 'grus stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan stobs kyis 
[\[62a.3\]]sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ges bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ges shes rab stobs rtogs te/_/snying 
[\[62a.4\]]rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/_
[\[62a.5\]]o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te swa b+hA ba pi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas 
[\[62a.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D850}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA pa ri mi tA yur+dz+nyA na hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_
[\[62a.7\]]'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/_dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[62b.2\]]'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/_/de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/_/su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/_/de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong /_/de na 
[\[62b.3\]]bud med yod ma yin/_/mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/_/rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang /_/chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/_/sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni/_/de dag mod la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[62b.4\]]phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la dad byas na/_/rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[62b.5\]]rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya brgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/_rgyal rigs su skyes so/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[62b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i btsun mo ni rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de 
[\[62b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul dang 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ldan pa'i mchog dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/lhas byin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bzhin 
[\[63a.2\]]gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/_/dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/_zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma 
[\[63a.3\]]yengs par sgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/_/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas 
[\[63a.4\]]la/_sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bsams na zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[63a.5\]]cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/_de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i 
[\[63a.6\]]gzungs de gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_sha ba le/_a ba le/_sa ma dza le/_nirde she/_nirdzA te/_ni ruk+te/_nirmu khe/_dz+wa la pa ri ts+tshe da ni/_su kha ba ti nirde she/_a mr-i te/_A yurgarba nir+hA Ti/_a mr-i te A yuHpra sA d+ha ne/_nir bud+d+hi A kA ka nirde she/_A kA sha nirdzA te/_A kA sha ni ra ku sha le/_A kA sha 
[\[63a.7\]]nirdar+sha ne/_A kA sha a d+hiSh+thA ne/_su kha ba ti a d+hiSh+thA ne/_rU pa nirde she/_tsa twA ri d+harma pra sA d+ha ne/_tsa twA ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/_tsa twA ri mArga b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha ni/_ba la bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ne/_d+harmA ts+tshe da ne/_ku sha le/_ku sha la ni rde she/_ku sha la pra tiSh+thA ne/_bud d+hA ku sha le/_bi shud+d+ha pra b+ha sa d+harma ka ra Ne/_nirdza 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]ti/_nirbu d+d+he/_bi ma le/_bi ra dze/_rA dza se/_ra sA gre/_ra sA gra ba le/_ra sA gra/_a d+hiSh+thi te/_ku le pra ti ku le/_bi ku le/_dAn+te su dAn+ta tsit+te/_su pra shAn+ta tsit+te/_su pra tiSh+thi te/_su le su mu khI/_d+harme tsa d+harme ba le tsa ba le/_a nu sha a ba le/_bud+d+ha A kA sha gu Ne/_bud+d+ha/_A kA sha ni ra gu Ne/_a mr-i ta 
[\[63b.2\]]dun+du b+hiHswa re swA hA/_dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des/_gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang 
[\[63b.3\]]spos kyis mchod pa bya'o/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i pad+ma'i gnas dang /_byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o/_/de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par bya ste/_'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 
[\[63b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/_rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[63b.5\]]pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/_/g.yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/_/g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to/_/dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos 
[\[63b.6\]]pa dang dad pa dang gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/_gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen pha'am dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[63b.7\]]pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_sngon gyi las kyi 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[64a.2\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pu N+ya sam+b+ha wa dang /_lo ts+tsha ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[64a.3\]{D851}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA pa ri mi ta gu NA nu shAn+sa nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a mi ta b+ha ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_
[\[64a.4\]]saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a mi te/_a mi tot+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be a mi ta bi krAn+te/_a mi ta ga mi ni/_ga ga na kIrti ka re/_sarba kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_lan cig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 
[\[64a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 
[\[64a.6\]]'bum bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 
[\[64a.7\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no/_/'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[64b\]]
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]{D852}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sap+ta [(]pu[,]bu[)]d+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[65a.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang /_ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[65a.3\]]chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_mtha' yas me tog dang /_kun nas me tog dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu 
[\[65a.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas/_brdol zhing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla 
[\[65a.5\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /_
[\[65a.6\]]dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/
[\[65a.7\]]cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]kyis bstan du gsol/_bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bdun sprul ba mdzad de/_de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo /_/bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[65b.2\]]pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[65b.3\]]o~M ha la ha la/_hi la hi lA ya/_na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/_na mo na maHswA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 
[\[65b.4\]]'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[65b.5\]]zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon 
[\[65b.6\]]btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/_/mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_shu ti dang /_nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar 
[\[65b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/_sarba b+hU tA nAM/_ts+tshin+da ya/_kI la ya/_ba ra bid+yA nAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[66a.2\]]dang /_bsgom nyes pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i 
[\[66a.3\]]snying po 'di nyin mtshan gsum yid la byed na/_de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66a.4\]]pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/_/chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/_/skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo /_/
[\[66a.5\]]byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams 
[\[66a.6\]]cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ku lo t+hA d+ha 
[\[66a.7\]]nA nAM ku ru sarba gra hA NAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal ba bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis mi tshugs/_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/_rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing /_chu dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba 
[\[66b.2\]]dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa 
[\[66b.3\]]brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/_/'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod 
[\[66b.4\]]pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/_/mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/_/dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rA dzA nAM rA dzA mA tram+bA ba shI 
[\[66b.5\]]ka ra tu kA me na/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang /_nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sdig pa ji snyed pa 
[\[66b.6\]]thams cad sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang /_bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang /_na la dang /_khre dang /_shi ri sha dang /_rgya spos dang /_gum kum dang /_gla sgang dang /_in+d+ra ba ru Na dang /_byang chub kyi shing dang /_a mra'i 
[\[66b.7\]]mgo thogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/_zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/_/dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/_/gdon dang srung ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[67a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo 
[\[67a.3\]]bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_na maHkra kuts+tshan+dA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_oM ka Ta ka Ta/_ka Tha ka Tha/_ki Ti ki Ti/_ki Thi ki Thi/_ki TA ba ya na maHswA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[67a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel zhes bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/blangs shing bzung ste/_kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma 
[\[67a.5\]]dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'byong bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[67a.6\]]lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la 
[\[67a.7\]]yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_bcings pa thams cad las thar par bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu nor yang 'phel par 'gyur/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste de 
[\[67b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la
