[\[67b.3\]]ci smos pa de thams cad ston to/_/tshe'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po 
[\[67b.4\]]thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samya k+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sa ra sa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_si ri si ri/_si rA 
[\[67b.5\]]ya/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu ma d+hu mA ya/_na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam 
[\[67b.6\]]mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_me dang chu dang lce 'babs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 
[\[67b.7\]]'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la bza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/_/mdze dang skrangs nad dang mchin skran 
[\[68a.2\]]la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa 
[\[68a.3\]]brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de 
[\[68a.4\]]las thams cad ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' 
[\[68a.5\]]stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_o~M ha ra ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ha ha ha/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_sid+d+h+yan tu man+t+ra pA da swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[68a.6\]]chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha' snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig_/kun chub par gyis 
[\[68a.7\]]shig_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_nyin mo'am/_mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byas na mdor na rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mdze dang sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/_bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas 
[\[68b.2\]]la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/_/thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[68b.3\]]la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_/g+hu me g+hu me/_ma hA g+hu me/_ta le te le/_ma hA ta le/_tsa le tsa le/_ma hA tsa le/_d+hu re d+hu re/_ma hA d+hu re/_ti ri ti ri/_ma 
[\[68b.4\]]hA ti ri/_ki li ki li/_ma hA ki li/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA tsu ru/_mi li mi li/_ma hA mi li/_ti li ti li/_ma hA ti li/_d+hu me d+hu me/_ma hA d+hu me/_tsa le tsa le/_ma hA tsa le/_khi ri khi ri/_ma hA khi ri/_tsi li tsi li/_ma hA tsi li swA hA/_de nas 
[\[68b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/_/sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas bya'o/_/
[\[68b.6\]]dug spon chus bya'o/_/las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/_/khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/_/cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i 
[\[68b.7\]]snying po yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]{D853}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dwA da sha bud+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU traM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[69a.2\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri 
[\[69a.3\]]nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye 
[\[69a.4\]]ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel 
[\[69a.5\]]rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab 
[\[69a.6\]]sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/su rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[69a.7\]]bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/_/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po 
[\[69b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[69b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma 
[\[69b.4\]]gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs de 
[\[69b.5\]]nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/tshig gdon to/_/phyag bya'o/_/lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[69b.6\]]rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/yid la bya'o/_/nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me 
[\[69b.7\]]tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang shar gyi phyogs 
[\[70a.2\]]mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/steng gi phyogs 
[\[70a.3\]]kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[70a.4\]]bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[70a.5\]]rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/'on kyang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[70a.6\]]ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/bsam 
[\[70a.7\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yongs su 'dzin to/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun du mdzes pa dang /_de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[70b.2\]]ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du/_/mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang /_/'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang /_/'byor ba 
[\[70b.3\]]chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a khe ma khe/_sa man+ta mu khe/_sau ti yuk+te/_ni ruk+te/_pra b+he/_sa ma yo ge/_tsit+ta tsit+te/_a khe/_ma khe/_ma da ne/_bi brte/_sa man+ta gu Ni/_
[\[70b.4\]]sat+yA ra me/_yuk+te pra yuk+te/_hi li mi li/_ma sa le/_A na le/_tsa me/_a tsi ti/_tso tse a ra he/_ba huts+tsho/_mA yu gra he/_he ma ba ti/_dz+yo ti ba ti/_d+harma tsit+te/_ts+yu ta pad+ke/_a bi k+She be/_ra d+h+r-i k+Sha me/_skan+d+ha bi g+ha k+te/_sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[70b.5\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/gzungs 'di dag ni gzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/bye ba drug cu'i 
[\[70b.6\]]drang srong rnams/_/de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/_/skye ba dag ni kun du yang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/_/cung zad dge ba gang yin pa/_/don rnams thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[70b.7\]]rnams ni mngon sum mthong /_/gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/_/mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang /_/mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin mi nyams/_/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/_/mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/_/ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni/_/bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog_/de dag de la mngon par 'gyur/_/byang chub rab tu de 
[\[71a.2\]]'tshang rgya/_/zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag_/gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi/_/mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/_/bsod nams phung po de ches mang /_/rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod 
[\[71a.3\]]pa'i tshe/_/mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/dad pa bla na med pa 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing /_/mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba 
[\[71a.4\]]mnyes byed de/_/mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni/_/mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su/_/byang chub myur du 'tshang 
[\[71a.5\]]yang rgya/_/nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/_/gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/_/rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/_/skye ba gang dang 
[\[71a.6\]]gar skyes par/_/de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/de la bskal pa du mar 
[\[71a.7\]]ni/_/lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub myur du mtshang yang rgya/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/_/g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'dzin byed pa/_/lha dang dri za klu dbang dang /_/mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/_/rtag tu de la srung bar byed/_/gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun la sbyin par byed/_/dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna 
[\[71b.2\]]med/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por/_/lha yi tsan+dan dmar po dang /_/shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi/_/spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rtag tu 
[\[71b.3\]]chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab/_/bye ba stong phrag mang yod las/_/'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de ni pha ma spun sdug dang /_/skye bo dag gi tshogs 
[\[71b.4\]]rnams dang /_/'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo /_/drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan/_/bud med kyis ni gzung byas na/_/bud med lus la ma chags nas/_/skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/_/mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas/_/bla med byang chub thob 'gyur 
[\[71b.5\]]te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/'dod pa zhi bzhin mya ngan 'da'/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/_/dug dang me dang rgyal po dang /_/g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin 
[\[71b.6\]]pa/_/de yi sems la nams kyang ni/_/dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi/_/bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/_/mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/_/zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[71b.7\]]sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas/_/'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/_/de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/_/lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas/_/de ni shin tu yi rangs te/_/rgyal 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ba'i bstan la the tshom med/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/_/zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te/_/thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de nas pha rol phyin sa dang /_/mi 'jigs pa dang 
[\[72a.2\]]stobs rnams dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/_/ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/_/gang gi zhing du 'dod gyur pa/_/der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/_/byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/skyes pa'am 
[\[72a.3\]]ni bud med gang /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/_/yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du gsung /_/bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni/_/yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/de 
[\[72a.4\]]dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/_/sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/_/mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang /_/gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing /_/thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/_/
[\[72a.5\]]de dang de dag shes rab che/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po de dag gi/_/'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas/_/bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la/_/shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[72a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[72a.7\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D854}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud+d+ha hr-i da yaM nA ma d+hA ra NI d+harma bi par+yA ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 
[\[72b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi g.ye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/_/ye 
[\[72b.3\]]shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/_sngon sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa/_
[\[72b.4\]]kun nas 'od kyi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dbus na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa/_thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_thams 
[\[72b.5\]]cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag skye bo 
[\[72b.6\]]mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[72b.7\]]snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya char yang dag par rab tu ston tam/_dad dam/_lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_chos thams cad 'dzin pa 
[\[73a.2\]]dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral 
[\[73a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[73a.4\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma 
[\[73a.5\]]yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_de la bdud sdig 
[\[73a.6\]]can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la dngang bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di dag ni sangs 
[\[73a.7\]]rgyas kyi tshig go/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he su bud+d+he/_ma hA bud+d+he/_i ha bud+d+he/_ta tra bud+d+he/_bud+d+he 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bud+d+he/_bud+d+ha ma ti/_bud+d+he/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a nu ma ti/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a nu dz+nyA na te/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_sangs rgyas rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/_chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/_gcig tu 
[\[73b.2\]]yid la bya ba ni mdor na sgom pa'o/_/gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_shud+d+he/_su shud+d+he/_su shud+d+he/_sho d+ha ni/_saM sho d+ha ni/_
[\[73b.3\]]saM sho d+ha ni/_ni rma le/_ma la a pa ga te/_ga ti sa ma ti kran+ti/_kra me sa ma sa re/_sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho ke/_bi sho ka/_sho ka sha ma ni/_shAn+te/_u pa shAn+te/_pra shAn+te/_a ba b+hA se/_sarba pu N+ya pa ri maN+Di te/_sarba d+harma pra ti maN+Di te/_ha ra ha ra/_ma 
[\[73b.4\]]la ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_saM tsa ra/_tsa la tsa la saM tsa la/_ta la ta la/_ma ta la/_sa ma ta la/_ri Ne ri Ne/_su ri Ne/_sa ma ri Ne/_ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/_lo ka d+ha ri Ne/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_Da ra Da ra/_ro d+ha ro d+ha/_ma hA bi dza ya/_bA hi ni/_ha na ha na/_
[\[73b.5\]]sarba bud+d+he/_hri phre shi/_tra si/_sarba dz+nyA pa the/_sarba dz+nyA pA ra mi te/_ma hA pra ti b+ha na/_saM phan+ne/_sa man+ta/_A lo ke bud+d+ha/_bi Sha ye/_bud+d+ha/_pra ti maN+Di te/_b+ha ga ba te/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_pra sa ra sarba 
[\[73b.6\]]sho ka a pa ga te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang /_tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa yang g.yos/_
[\[73b.7\]]rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to/_/bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skrag nas/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go/_/sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[74a.2\]]lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/_/lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor nas/_gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su 
[\[74a.3\]]dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi/_/gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi/_/
[\[74a.4\]]skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos/_/rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang /_rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi/_/lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non/_/de tshe lha 
[\[74a.5\]]rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas/_/'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man dA 'thor/_/gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dad gzhan rnams kyi/_/se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang /_/phye ma dag dang byug pa gos 
[\[74a.6\]]rnams dang /_/rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/_/brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang /_thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms 
[\[74a.7\]]pa'i rgyan dang /_chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i rgyan dang /_ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang /_rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang /_gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/_brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi 
[\[74b.2\]]phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/gzungs kyi gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya 
[\[74b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob po/_/nad thams cad dang /_na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par bya'o/_/bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan 
[\[74b.4\]]thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs 
[\[74b.5\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[74b.6\]{D855}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud+d+ha hr-i da yaM nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[74b.7\]]ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po dka' thub 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi bsdu ba dang rjes su gzung ba dang 
[\[75a.2\]]kun du rjes su gzung ba dang khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_don thams cad dang chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya 
[\[75a.3\]]ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/_/'chad do/_/de khyed kyis zung la da ltar dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhi rnams la ston cig_/shod cig_/yal bar mi dor bar nges 
[\[75a.4\]]par bstan par bya/_bsgrag par bya'o/_/ji tsam du phongs bar gyur pa rnams dang /_sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya/_bsgrag par bya'o/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste/_de 
[\[75a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[75a.6\]]gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_a ma le/_nirma le/_sarba A kA ra ar+tha pa ri prA p+te/_a sa man+ta sarba kun A kA re t+r+ya d+h+wa/_a saM ga a nA br-i te/_sa man+ta/_da sha di sha/_pa ri pUr+Na dz+nyA ne/_sarba a saM ga daR+sha na prAp+te/_sarba d+harma ma bi sha ta pa ri pUr+Ne/_sarba 
[\[75a.7\]]a kA ra/_a saM ga sa ma n+wi te/_sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta te dze t+r+ya d+h+wa da sha su/_dik+Shu pa ri prAp+ta/_ar+the/_shAn+ta/_prA shAn+ta/_u pe shAn+ta/_sa ma shAn+ta/_bi mok+Sha a nu prA p+te/_su pra ti bud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu/_at+yan+ta su ni sri te/_sarba A kA ra ni sa sa ra Na/_
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]a na ba she Sha bAr ng+ga he/_bi pra muk+ta/_a saM yo ga/_bi pra yo ga/_s+thi te d+harma te/_ga gan sa ma pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha/_nirma le/_a sa man+ta/_t+r+ya d+h+wa a nu ga ta/_su prA b+te pUrbAn+ta/_a pa ran+ta/_ma d+h+ya t+r+ya d+hA sa man+ta a nu prA p+te/_a na pa she Sha/_pa ri 
[\[75b.2\]]dz+nyA pra ha na/_b+ha ba na/_sa k+shad kri ya pa ra ma bar d+ga te/_ya thA bA di ta thA kA ri/_sarba A kA ra saM pan+ne/_sarba A kA ra ma hA mai tri/_ma hA ka ru NA/_sarba A kA ra sa ma sa gra ha a nu prA p+te/_lha'i bu dag 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 
[\[75b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs te/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/_legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[75b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni thos par 'gyur/_kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/_kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur/_slob pa lam la 
[\[75b.5\]]gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/_kun du 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur/_de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur/_mi skye 
[\[75b.6\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[75b.7\]]de dag la yang nges par bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o/_/yal bar mi 'dor/_phyi bshol mi bya/_brjed par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang /_mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi/_bshad par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par 
[\[76a.2\]]bgyi'o/_/des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur/_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang /_phan pa'i 
[\[76a.3\]]dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gyis shig_/'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dbang phyug chen 
[\[76a.4\]]po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[76a.5\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[76a.6\]{D856}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba bud d+hA d+ga ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[76a.7\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]to/_/rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang /_bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rga ba dang na ba dang rgud pa dang 'chi ba'o/_/de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/_'di ltar 'chi 
[\[76b.2\]]bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/_brtsam pa med pa/_gnyen po med pa/_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di 
[\[76b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas/_skye dgu rjes su bzung ba 'di ni deng bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/_
[\[76b.4\]]se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te 'di skad ces/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[76b.5\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig_/des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o/_/sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 
[\[76b.6\]]'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo /_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang steng dang 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/_'di skad ces/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su 
[\[76b.7\]]dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo /_/de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]tshe dang stobs dang kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo /_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
[\[77a.2\]]la snang bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad gsung ngo /_/tad+ya 
[\[77a.3\]]thA/_tsa lA tsa lA tsa le/_bin hi/_swa sti ke/_tsakra/_ang+ga ti/_pra sha man+tu/_sarba ro ga/_a na Te/_ku na Te/_ma hA ku na Te/_tsa re tsa re re/_he ma gi ri/_he ma gau ri/_he ma ni shun+ti/_he ma si si/_kau rbe kaurba be/_he ku ra re/_ku ra re/_
[\[77a.4\]]ku ma ti/_bi Sha sa ma Ne/_shi Shu b+hi/_tsa le tsa le/_bi tsa le/_mA bi lam+ba/_hu mu hu mu swA hA/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas de dag gis smras pa/_hU~M hU~M/_si si swA hA/_de skad 
[\[77a.5\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung 
[\[77a.6\]]bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shwe te/_shwe te/_shwe ta/_le li li/_'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/_mA taM ge mA taM ge/_mA taM gi ni/_shU mA shU mu/_yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/_tsa re tsa re re swA hA/_mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/_ba 
[\[77a.7\]]lim ba pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang /_gang yang 'di klog pa de 
[\[77b.2\]]la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do/_/de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mes ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_dug gis ma yin/_lce 'bab pas ma yin no/_/gang na rgyal ba'i bu dag 
[\[77b.3\]]rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o/_/yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[77b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro/_/su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lags thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[77b.5\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[77b.6\]]'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas 
[\[77b.7\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D857}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsan+dan ang+ga nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[78a.2\]]dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang /_gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[78a.3\]]'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i 
[\[78a.4\]]klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_tsan+dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[78a.5\]]chos kyang ston to/_/gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par gyur pa sha stag ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag des sems can thams cad 
[\[78a.6\]]kyi don gyi phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog pa de dag sdig pa dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang /_de 
[\[78a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te/_ngas kyang khyed rnams la bshad kyis/_sems can thams cad rjes su gzung 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]ba'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/_thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang /_mchod rten 'dral ba/_dge 
[\[78b.2\]]'dun gyi rdzas la rku 'phrog byed pa dang /_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_slob dpon dang mkhan po spang ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis 
[\[78b.3\]]brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams nga la nyon cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba/_byang chub sems 
[\[78b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams la thugs brtse ba dang /_sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[78b.5\]]bshad du gsol/_bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi de dag gzung bar bgyi ste/_sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[78b.6\]]tsi rA te/_ma rI tsI ki/_duR+da me/_dur dAn+te/_du ra nu pra biSh+Te/_tsan+da nAM ga dze/_sa man+ta pa ri sho d+ha ni/_bi shud+d+ha shI le/_tsa ri tra ba ti/_an tse d+ya pra ti b+hA ne/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_b+ha ga ba te/_pA pak+Sha ye/_A shA me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_rigs 
[\[78b.7\]]kyi bu pho dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_ston tam/_kun chub par byed na/_de tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/thos ma thag tu sdig pa las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur 
[\[79a.2\]]pa mthong bar 'gyur/_mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig byas pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur/_skye ba dran par 'gyur/_tshe brjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_khyim bdag chen po skyid pa dag gi nang du skye par 'gyur/_skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79a.3\]]'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa 'di ni grum par 'gyur yang srid/_rgya mtsho ni skams kyang srid/_de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/_rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/_zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srid/_nam mkha' 
[\[79a.4\]]ni lag pa gnyis kyis mnan du rung yang srid/_me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/_'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/_sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa 
[\[79a.5\]]ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid de/_sus kyang bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar mi nus so/_/'di la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 
[\[79a.6\]]'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[79a.7\]]bgyis te/_me tog sil ma gtor la tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/_zla ba tshes pa nas brtsams nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing gos kyang lan gsum du brjes te/_kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing gso sbyong dang ldan pa/_sems can 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]thams cad la sems snyoms pas zla ba nya'i nyin par zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_rtswa bam gyi steng na mchis shing rtswa bam bting ba'i steng du nyal nas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyid cing me tog dri zhim pos lan brgya stong du gtor nas g.yo bar 'gyur/_bdag 
[\[79b.2\]]nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/_gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/_thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 
[\[79b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[79b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar 
[\[79b.5\]]chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D858}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra NI bi d+yA rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/_
[\[79b.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 
[\[79b.7\]]'dun chen po dang /_lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 'das pa na 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang /_'od 
[\[80a.2\]]dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[80a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub 
[\[80a.4\]]sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[80a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[80a.6\]]mjed 'dir btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_stobs dang bde ba dang 
[\[80a.7\]]kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam zhes stun gsol lo/_/'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo /_/'di na mi'am/_mi ma lags pa'am/_'byung po'am/_sha za'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum gyi sde dpon 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]nam/_rgyal po 'am/_blon po chen po'am/_chom rkun nam/_sbrul lam/_srin bu'am/_srin bu lu ta'am/_sbrang bu lcags phye'am/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag 'tshe bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo /_/sems 
[\[80b.2\]]can rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_mdog 
[\[80b.3\]]dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/_'di lta ste/_dz+wa 
[\[80b.4\]]le dz+wa le/_dz+wa le ga te/_huk+ku/_muk+ku/_saM ma te/_ma hA saM ma te/_ma hA dz+wa le/_dz+wa ba la me/_sa he sa he/_ma hA dz+wa le/_uk+ke muk+ke/_sha me/_saM ma te/_ma hA saM ma te/_ma hA sha me swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bo la 
[\[80b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/

[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/_gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi

[\[81a.3\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_gzi brjid dang

[\[81b.1\]]dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[81b.2\]]la yang rgya che rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag

[\[82a.3\]]rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga'

[\[82b.1\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/

[\[82b.6\]]bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_bcing ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas na shing de las lcu gu dang /_lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/_me tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur na/_mir gyur pa lta ci smos/_

[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]dang /_sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/rims rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa dang /_dus tshigs 'gyur ba las byung ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/zhag gcig pa'am/_zhag gnyis pa'am/_zhag

[\[83b.6\]]klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/chu'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/de yid la byas pa de rnams las 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/des dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/_kun dga' bo mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pas gcad 
[\[84a.2\]]pa'i rigs pa ni brdegs pas/_brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/_brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsdigs pas/_bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mig tshugs su bltas pas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gis 
[\[84a.3\]]gang la bsrung ba byas pa'am/_yongs su bskyab pa byas pa'am/_yongs su bzung ba'am/_bcings pa'am/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/_lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang 
[\[84a.4\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi nang na yang ngas ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa 
[\[84a.5\]]thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[84a.6\]]rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang /_bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/_
[\[84a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cad 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de ni 'di lta ste/_da naD+De/_de naD+De/_ma hA naD+De/_dzam+b+ha ne/_stam+b+ha ne/_Ta Te/_Ta Ta ne/_ma hA Ta Ta ne/_kuT+Te/_kuT+Ta ne/_ma hA kuT+Ta ne/_d+harma le/_tsarma le swA 
[\[84b.2\]]hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_bzlas te bton nas 'chang ba de ni sngon gyi las ma gtogs 
[\[84b.3\]]par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/de la ni dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po 
[\[84b.4\]]chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag khyed bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 
[\[84b.5\]]'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/long shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/
[\[84b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/_/
[\[84b.7\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/_/'dzin tam yang na klog byed pa/_/tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/_/de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/_/mi min gang yang rung ba dang /_/gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag_/nams kyang bar chad mi byed do/_/gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/_/'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/_/sdig can bdud 
[\[85a.2\]]de nam du yang /_/bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi/_/pha ma dang ni phu nu dang /_/sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang /_/log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/_/'jigs med gang 
[\[85a.3\]]gis thos gyur nas/_/gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed pa des/_/nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/_/zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur/_/byang 
[\[85a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang /_/bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des/_/zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non/_/phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag_/lus ngan dang ni yul 
[\[85a.5\]]'khor srung /_/mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang /_/gzungs sngags 'di ni rjod byed pa/_/de la rtag tu srung bar byed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[85a.6\]]nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_'phags pa byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[85a.7\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]{D859}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[85b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[85b.3\]]te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang /_bden pa'i smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpas yongs su 
[\[85b.4\]]bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig_/ston cig_/'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi 
[\[85b.5\]]gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas na bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[85b.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang /_theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang /_khyod gzungs yul na 
[\[85b.7\]]mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'das pa zhes mi 'chad/_ma 'ongs pa zhes 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]mi 'chad/_da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/_dngos por mi 'chad/_dngos po med par mi 'chad/_mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma med par mi 'chad/_chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram/_'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[86a.2\]]'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir ston te/_gang 'di gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni gzugs med pa/_bya ba'i lam du gyur pa/_rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/_sangs rgyas kyi lhag 
[\[86a.3\]]par bya ba sgrub pa/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/_sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang 
[\[86a.4\]]la gnas shing /_gzungs de thob na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_dam bca' ba bzang ba dang /_chos la mi gnas pa dang /_bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang /_slob dpon ma mchis 
[\[86a.5\]]pa dang /_rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs 
[\[86a.6\]]rgyas nyid du brjod do/_/shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la bsti stang du byed dam/_bla mar byed dam/_rim gror byed dam/_mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis gzungs 
[\[86a.7\]]'di thos pa dang /_gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'di yin te/_san+d+hA ra NI/_ud d+hA ra NI/_saMpra tiSh+pi ta/_su ta ma/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]su pra tiSh+Thi tA/_bi dza ya ba lA/_sar+b+ba pra ti dz+nyA/_A ro hA dz+nyA na pa ti/_ut+pA da nI/_bi nA ma nI/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/_a b+hi bya hA rA/_shu b+ha ba ti/_a ni shri ta/_ba hu kum+b+ha/_a b+hi ba tsa/_shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos 
[\[86b.2\]]kyi ming rnams te/_'das pa rnams dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang /_legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste/_'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[86b.3\]]bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/_de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 
[\[86b.4\]]'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po grangs med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang /_zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par 
[\[86b.5\]]gzung ba byas pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[86b.6\]]yum yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[86b.7\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D860}]@#/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M mu ni mu ni ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_lan cig 
[\[87a.2\]]bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D861}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 
[\[87a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[87a.4\]]ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_bi ri bi ri/_hu ru hu ru/_bai ro tsa na ra smi sany+tso di te A gats+tsha Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni kA pU ra ya ha shA na/_d+ha ra ya bud+d+he bish+tsa ya na/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/_bton pas 'grub ste/_mtshon cha dang /_me dang /_
[\[87a.5\]]chu dang /_dug dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad 
[\[87a.6\]]mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D862}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[87a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ya rA sa mut+ga te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]{D863}]@#/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs 
[\[87b.2\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcangs par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod sbyin de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad 
[\[87b.3\]]kyis 'jigs pa med do/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_dza yot+ta ra/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_saM bo d+hi ma hA saM bo d+hi/_a d+hi bad b+ho d+ha ni/_ha la ha la ha la/_hi li hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu hu lu/_sarba bud+d+ha/_d+harmA ba bo d+hi ni/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu 
[\[87b.4\]]Ta ni/_sarba pA pa ni/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ni na swA hA/_'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D864}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga bA na a mi tA b+ha d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' 
[\[87b.5\]]yas kyi gzungs sngags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a mi te/_a mi tot+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+ti ka re/_a 
[\[87b.6\]]mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re sarba kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung 
[\[87b.7\]]ba yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_ma hAM 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]du hi ke swA hA/_lus la nad byung ba'am/_nad khong skams su gyur kyang rung ste/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/_bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/_
[\[88a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D865}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[88a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra ma bu/_badzra ma bu bud+d+ha dze/_badzra ma bu bud+d+ha dze/_shU n+ya tA pra be she/_bai ro 
[\[88a.4\]]tsa na gar+b+he/_pany+tsen+d+ri ya/_a ba bo d+ha ne swA hA/_cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdud thams cad dang dgra thams cad dang log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/'chi ba'i tshe 'phags pa 'od dpag 
[\[88a.5\]]med mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs so//[ {D866}]@#/_/dkon mchog 
[\[88a.6\]]gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM ta ra ta ra/_
[\[88a.7\]]ti ri ti ri/_tu ru tu ru/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_b+ha ya b+ha ya/_ku ru ku ru/_sarba karma A ba ra Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/_dz+wa la ni bi d+ha ni bai swA hA/_ku ru pany+tsa li swA hA/_sA ga ra saM bi re swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga tA a 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]d+hiSh+thi te swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[88b.2\]]ro/_/lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid rnam par dag pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[88b.3\]]chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos thos pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/sems dang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags 
[\[88b.4\]]pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D867}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a mi te/_a mi tot+b+ha be/_a mi ta 
[\[88b.5\]]saM b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+t+ra gA mi nI/_ga ga na kIrti ka re/_sarba kA+e sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas 
[\[88b.6\]]pa byas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'i sdig yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro/_/snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D868}]@#/_/zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[88b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/_su tsan+d+ra/_ma ti tsan+d+ra/_tsan+d+ra ki ra Na/_si ri si ri/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ki li ki li/_d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ki li ki li/_saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]nang par langs te/_zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khrir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/zla 
[\[89a.2\]]ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D869}]@#/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a nu ga te/_o~M ku ruM gi ni swA hA/_'di lan cig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[89a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D870}]@#/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na shi khi ne/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_rat+ne rat+ne rat+na shi khi ne swA hA/_'chi ba'i 
[\[89a.4\]]tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D871}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad 
[\[89a.5\]]du/_'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[89a.6\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rnam par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 
[\[89a.7\]]dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang /_dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang /_btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[89b.2\]]grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros 
[\[89b.3\]]rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang /_phreng ba dang spos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang rol mo'i sgra 
[\[89b.4\]]dang byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par 
[\[89b.5\]]mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/_/mtha' yas so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/mtshungs pa med do/_/
[\[89b.6\]]grangs med do/_/dpag gis mi lang ngo /_/brjod du med do/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang ri mor byed pa dang mchod pa dang rjed pa dang /_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga 
[\[89b.7\]]brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang ri mor byed pa dang mchod pa dang rjed pa dang yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/_byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]'tshal ba dang /_phyag byed pa dang bsti stang byed pa dang bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang mchod pa dang rjed pa dang gsol pa dang bsngags pa dang /_skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs 
[\[90a.2\]]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/_phan yon lnga po de dag tu shes par bya'o/_/de las gzhan yang chos bzhir 
[\[90a.3\]]shes par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang /_de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 
[\[90a.4\]]'gyur ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rigs che ba dang /_btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[90a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang /_phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/_blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90a.6\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/_pus mo gnyis 
[\[90a.7\]]ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/_brgya byin nyid dam/_tshangs pa nyid dam/_nyan thos nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/_bla na med 
[\[90b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/_blo gros rnam par dag pa 
[\[90b.3\]]'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong du 'jug kyang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung /_'chag 
[\[90b.4\]]kyang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_chos ston kyang rung /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha'i lding ngam/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye 
[\[90b.5\]]chen po'am/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_shing ngam/_ri'am/_khung bu'am/_bya skyibs kyang rung ste/_thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_kun du 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/_ji ltar 
[\[90b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/_rab tu 'dud/_kun du rab tu 
[\[90b.7\]]'dud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/a mi tA/_ma te pra b+he/_ma hA pra b+he/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_

[\[91a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/_tad+ya thA/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_smr-i ti/_

[\[91a.3\]]na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_zhi bar gyur cig_/
[\[91a.4\]]nad med par gyur cig_/bgegs med par gyur cig_/pra b+ha ba ti/_ma hA mat+ye/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_rash+mi/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan kyang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/_/'di 
[\[91a.5\]]lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen mkhregs dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 
[\[91a.6\]]'phro dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang /_bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang /_bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang /_bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang /_bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas 
[\[91a.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od dang /_bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang /_bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang /_bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang /_bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang /_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'od dag pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[91b.2\]]'das rin chen 'byung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang /_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang /_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang /_bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog dang /_bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang /_bcom 
[\[91b.3\]]ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang /_bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /_bcom ldan 'das spos

[\[91b.6\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang /_bcom ldan 'das pad+mas zil gnon dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das me dang /_bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang /_bcom ldan 'das
