[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang /_bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang /_bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[92a.2\]]lhun po dang /_bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang /_bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang /_bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang /_bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o/_/tad+ya thA/_pa ta pa ta/_da ma da ma/_g+ha ma g+ha ma swA hA/_shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[92a.3\]]'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang /_zhi bar bsrung du gsol/_lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 
[\[92a.4\]]'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar bsrung du gsol/_/nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /_zhi bar

[\[92a.7\]]la nad med pa dang /_zhi bar bsrung du gsol/_phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /_zhi bar bsrung du gsol/_tad+ya thA/_bi ma le/_bi ma lA 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ka re bi ma la saM b+ha be swA hA/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma lA ka re/_
[\[92b.2\]]bi ma lA ka re/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_bi ma la sa mut+ga te/_rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che/_/lha rnams kyis ni 
[\[92b.3\]]brjod pa yin/_/'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na/_/nad rnams las ni yongs su thar/_/mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang /_/sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas dgrol/_/de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur/_/bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za/_/de dag skye ba rnams su yang /_/rtag tu 
[\[92b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur/_/su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs/_/'di ni dga' bas 'dzin byed pa/_/zhing rnams kun du rgyu ba na/_/dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por 'byung /_/mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/_/yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung /_/tad+ya thA/_ku Ti ku Ti/_
[\[92b.5\]]kuts+tsha lo/_e la e la/_muk+ta/_kot+thA lo/_/e ri ri/_ra mr-i ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[92b.6\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur 
[\[92b.7\]]cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D872}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi shi Sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zlar ba'i tshes nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/_grong khyer sany+tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs 
[\[93a.2\]]te/_de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don zhig gi phyir grong khyer gnas song zhes bya bar song ste/_dge slong de rgya yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang /_dge slong des par der mi lus chen po khrun du mtho sum cu yod pa/_bzhin mtho bzhi pa 
[\[93a.3\]]zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/_kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/_'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/_des pus mo gnyi ga'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_mi lus 
[\[93a.4\]]chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/_'di na gda' 'am/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_dge slong de de bzhin no/_/dge slong des smras pa/_'jam 
[\[93a.5\]]dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za rnams ri'i rgyal 
[\[93a.6\]]po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so/_/des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkha'i bar skabs na mi snang ngo /_/de'i tshe lha dang /_lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/_g.yul bkye ba dang lha rnams 
[\[93a.7\]]ni pham/_lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/_de'i tshe 'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/_'di lta ste/_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_'brum phran dang /_me dpal dang /_lto na ba dang /_rims 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa dang /_tshad 
[\[93b.2\]]pa dang /_mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_char che ba dang /_than pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog_/sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog_/tshe dang /_stobs dang /_mdog dang /_gzugs 
[\[93b.3\]]'phrog ste/_de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to/_/gtum po seng ge dang /_spyang ki dang /_stag dang /_sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 
[\[93b.4\]]rnams la dus ma yin par chud za bar nye bar gnas pas sems can rnams nad las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir nga dge 
[\[93b.5\]]slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/_khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad 
[\[93b.6\]]las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/_sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig_/dkon mchog gsum la rtag par rgyun du dad par 
[\[93b.7\]]gyis shig_/lha rjed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/_sku gzugs rnams la spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig_/khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig_/nyi ma bdun yan lag 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi pu la gardzi te/_bi pu la swA re/_bi pu la yo ni she/_a 
[\[94a.2\]]na la se/_a na la saM b+ha be/_a na la sa ga tiM ga te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_he ma he ma/_ha ma ha ma swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[94a.3\]]a mi tot+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+te/_a mi ta bi krAn+ti ka re/_a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga na a ka ra/_ga ga na saM b+ha be/_ga ga na kIrti ka re swA 
[\[94a.4\]]hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ma sa me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a sa ma sa me swA hA/_de bzhin 
[\[94a.5\]]gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ma na bi shud+d+he/_pad+me shwa re/_pad+ma saM b+ha be/_king+ka re/_hi taM ka rI ye swA hA/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[94a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_tad+ya thA/_shwe ta ka ra b+hi/_dz+wa li ne swA hA/_dzaM b+ha ne/_s+t+waM b+ha ne/_mo ha ne swA hA/_pau N+Da ri kA ya swA hA/_ho me d+harme/_d+harmA tsin+t+ra yai 
[\[94a.7\]]swA hA/_d+ha re b+hi d+ha re/_ka la ping+ka ru tA yai swA hA/_shAn+te/_kIn+ne/_nirbA pa N+ye swA hA/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/_bi ma la pra tsun+d+hA yai swAhA/_a ba lo ki ta/_bi lo ki tA yai swA hA/_A dz+nyA n+ya bi d+ha ma n+yai swAhA/_pad+ma swa re/_pad+ma saM b+ha be/_
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]king+ka re hi tang+ka rI ye swA hA/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_tsan+d+ra na gar+b+he/_tsan+d+ra na tsU r+Ne/_ke kai la sa ba ti/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a d+hiSh+Thi ta a nu mo di te swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam 
[\[94b.2\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dze ye/_dza ya la b+he/_dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga na ar+ye/_ga ga na sa mut+ga te/_ga ga na bi krAn+ta/_bi 
[\[94b.3\]]krAn+te/_e dzi me dzi/_pad+mo dzi swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_he b+ha dre/_ma hA b+ha dre/_a ti b+ha dre/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_bi ga ta rA dza se/_ma hA bi ga ta rA dza se/_a ti bi ga ta rA dza se/_he ma ba ti/_karma A 
[\[94b.4\]]ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_mai tri mai tri/_mai tri ma na se swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_tad+ya thA/_gar+b+he gar+b+he gar+b+he/_gar+b+ha 
[\[94b.5\]]bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a k+Sha ye nu/_a k+Sha ye phu/_a k+Sha ya karma bi sho d+ha ne phu swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kIrti tA sarba dzi nai/_
[\[94b.6\]]a b+hi kI rti ta/_sarba dzi nai/_badzra a ka re/_badzra saM b+ha be/_badzra be dA ka re swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sarba A bar Na bi skaM b+he nai swA hA/_d+hA tu bi ka ra N+yai swA hA/_me g+ha 
[\[94b.7\]]bi s+pho Ta me swA hA/_a pa rA dzi ta kA yai swA hA/_ba la da da n+yai swA hA/_bo d+h+yaM da da n+yai swA hA/_karma ni r+b+ha bi ta kA yai swA hA/_e kA rA mA yai swA hA/_yo gA tsA rA yai swA hA/_sarba bud d+hA b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/_pra h+mo pa ku tA yai swA hA/_sarba d+harmA b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/_sarba 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]bud+d+ha a b+hi Shik+ta yai swA hA/_e ka shring+gA yai swA hA/_a shring+gA yai swA hA/_b+hU tA yai swA hA/_a saM b+hU tA yai swA hA/_sarba duHkho pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_su pra b+he/_pra b+hA ka re/_pra b+hot+ga te/_
[\[95a.2\]]pra b+ho t+ga te/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_d+harma bi shud+d+he/_karmA bi shud+d+hir+b+ha ba tu me swA hA/_tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/_de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[95a.3\]]slong bdun la zas sbyin no/_/me las me spel bar bya'o/_/mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos bri ba dang /_bklag pa la brtson par bya'o/_/gal te yams kyi nad cher byung nas khyim nas khyim 
[\[95a.4\]]dang /_grong nas grong dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer du gan d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_lha bshos kyis mchod par bya'o/_/nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 'jam 
[\[95a.5\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[95a.6\]]ston na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar 
[\[95a.7\]]yul nas yul dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer dang /_grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe brjod rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'di lan cig bklags na/_de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi skye bo dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor 
[\[95b.2\]]thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan lnga bklags na de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/_der yang yon 
[\[95b.3\]]tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/_mi klog gam/_yi ger mi 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/_kun chub par mi byed dam/_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par mi ston tam/_yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/_sems can 
[\[95b.4\]]thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_mi nyan tam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar de mngon par 'grub ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o/_/yang 
[\[95b.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga ri'i rgyal 
[\[95b.6\]]po ri rab la song ste/_lha dang dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o/_/de skad ces smras nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par 
[\[95b.7\]]bstod de bzung nas song ngo /_/'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]{D873}]@#/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan+dan dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i sku/_zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i 
[\[96a.2\]]cod pan can gyis gtugs pa/_rang byung sel mdzad/_bla ma/_'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa/_thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/_zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/_gzugs mdzes pa/_mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/_sku 
[\[96a.3\]]dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/_yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/_tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/_spa zhing gsal ba/_
[\[96a.4\]]nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/_thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dud do/_/rab tu 'dud do/_/bstod do/_oM b+ho hU~M hU~M/_A A/_hI hI/_shi ba shi ba/_shAn+ti shAn+ti/_sha ma sha ma/_sha mA pa 
[\[96a.5\]]ya/_ta thA ga tA nu ga ta/_swa b+hA ba/_a b+hA ba/_sa mut+tA ya/_a sa ma pa la/_a bi ra la ba la/_a mi ta ba la/_a ti ba la/_hU~M g+hu~M g+hu~M/_d+hau d+hau/_b+h+rau b+h+rau/_b+h+we du b+h+we du/_hI hI/_b+ha ga bA na/_b+ha bA na ta ka su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn+ti ka ra/_pA pa kilpi Sha nA sha ka swA hA/_
[\[96a.6\]]de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas/_/yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing /_/nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba bo/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/_/grags shing dri ma ra ba spangs la/_/dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo/_/khyab bdag chen po'i stobs bcur ldan/_/rdul 
[\[96a.7\]]bral dpal dang ldan pa po/_/rin chen sa gzhi chen po la/_/pho brang rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur ba/_/nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing /_/'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na/_/thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la/_/
[\[96b\]]
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs/_/nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang /_/khri chen rab spa de nyid la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis/_/phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta/_/thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od/_/nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/bde 
[\[97a.2\]]blag shin tu bkra shis tshul/_/'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/sku 'od 'bar pa'i dkyil 'khor can/_/'od gsal rgyas pa thub dbang gi/_/dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni/_/mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/_/dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi/_/rdo rje can 
[\[97a.3\]]dag rab btul ba/_/gang yin de kun dag byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed/_/ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun/_/legs par shin tu dag byas nas/_/srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/_/rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba/_/'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa/_/
[\[97a.4\]]bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can/_/rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/_/cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs/_/de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis/_/'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu/_/rig sngags hU~M zhes sgrogs pa po/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/_/bzhin mdzes 
[\[97a.5\]]'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing /_/stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/_/legs par mchod byas smras pa ni/_/kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing /_/bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel/_/rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa/_/thub mchog 
[\[97a.6\]]rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/_/de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes/_/sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che/_/bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang /_/brgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing /_/spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi/_/yon tan brgya 
[\[97a.7\]]yi spos ldan 'di/_/thos pa spro bar mi nus so/_/longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can/_/byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du/_/rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan/_/'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yi/_/sems can kun gyi 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]sdig pa rnams/_/ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni/_/blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur/_/zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la/_/rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed/_/dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel/_/sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms/_/dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa 
[\[97b.2\]]ste/_/sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel/_/ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin/_/bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul/_/nyes pa byas pa sel pa yin/_/gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur de/_/sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang /_/ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[97b.3\]]sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing /_/khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba/_/gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i/_/gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/_/kun du bzang po nyid dang ni/_/lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob/_/rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang /_/'di thos pas 
[\[97b.4\]]ni thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun na lam me ba/_/bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang /_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa/_/'di ni ji srid ma gsan par/_/rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi/_/rang 'byung go 'phang ma brnyes te/_/rnam par dag phyir gsan 
[\[97b.5\]]gyur nas/_/gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag_/de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/_/gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas/_/thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/_/'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang /_/bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med 
[\[97b.6\]]dang /_/mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/_/gzungs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur/_/gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang /_/thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/_/gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/_/bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/legs pa 'dod pa rnams 
[\[97b.7\]]kyis ni/_/tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis/_/nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog_/sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang /_/sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/_/gang gis thos nas de spong ba/_/nga yis mngon sum 'byor bar 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]'gyur/_/sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing /_/snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya/_/gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/_/sdig pa thams cad 'byang par 'gyur/_/tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang /_/tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/sdig 
[\[98a.2\]]pa mi dge gang byas pa/_/dag 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang /_/de bzhin tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la/_/cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/_/de nas rmongs pa med par yang /_/nyon mongs dgra ni rab 
[\[98a.3\]]'joms shing /_/shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/_/nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/_/thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/_/'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/_/des na tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/_/'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi/_/
[\[98a.4\]]yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyas pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig_/dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis/_/thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed/_/rdo rje ral 
[\[98a.5\]]gri la sogs pa/_/lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang /_/ri bo ti se'i ri rab la/_/gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang /_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/_/'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang /_/ma la ya yi ri bo la/_/gnas shing rgyan 'bar 
[\[98a.6\]]thogs rnams dang /_/khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/_/lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/_/lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/_/nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang /_/rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/_/rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/_/
[\[98a.7\]]sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la/_/phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/kun gyis sa yi dbang phyug po/_/thub mchog dam pa de la ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/_/mnyam nyid chos te de bzhin nyid/_/shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba/_/dul ba brtan pa 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dri ma sel/_/dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/_/thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi/_/'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/_/de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/_/ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/_/sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/_/
[\[98b.2\]]'jig rten mgon mdzad snang mdzad pa/_/dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/_/nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/_/ston pa po ste dri ma sel/_/spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/_/zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan/_/btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/_/mgon 
[\[98b.3\]]po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa/_/zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral/_/bcings pa las grol nges par grol/_/'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/_/ngan song sel ba dpal dang ldan/_/dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/_/
[\[98b.4\]]mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa/_/khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong /_/khengs pa med pa dman pa med/_/mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/_/snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/_/'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa/_/sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/_/'jig 
[\[98b.5\]]rten kun la phan par brtson/_/dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/_/mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/_/sems can kun gyi 'khra sa lags/_/don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/_/
[\[98b.6\]]skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/_/dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med/_/gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/_/chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags/_/dpe byad bzang po bkod 
[\[98b.7\]]pa yis/_/spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/_/dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/_/de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/_/mthu can yangs pa rgya che ba/_/bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/_/brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/_/dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/_/mthu brnyes 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]brtan pa chen po ste/_/gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags/_/gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/_/dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/_/rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/_/blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa/_/phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes/_/'dod 
[\[99a.2\]]pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/_/dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/_/dpal gyis longs spyod shin tu rgyas/_/bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad/_/gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/_/mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/_/mnyam pa nyid 
[\[99a.3\]]kyis mtshan dpag med/_/rab tu dgyes pa longs spyod gsal/_/gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam pa lags/_/blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/_/gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/_/rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/_/thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba/_/skal ba 
[\[99a.4\]]bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/_/de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/_/dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/_/sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/_/sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog_/thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba/_/mi gnas longs spyod dam pa 
[\[99a.5\]]lags/_/chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas/_/rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che/_/nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo/_/rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/_/khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma/_/rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can/_/shes rab thabs dang ldan pa 
[\[99a.6\]]ste/_/'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das/_/dag par longs spyod brtan pa can/_/sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/_/pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/_/ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/_/rnam thar sgo la mngon sum pa/_/gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang 
[\[99a.7\]]mnyam/_/chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das/_/spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/_/dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/_/shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/_/sgrib pa med 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]par 'char ba brnyes/_/rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/_/khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes/_/mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/_/nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/_/
[\[99b.2\]]dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/_/gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin/_/blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen/_/thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/_/dkon pa bde bar thob 'gyur ba/_/mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan/_/'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/_/zhi gnas 
[\[99b.3\]]mtshon cha thub par dka'/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul/_/dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/_/'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan/_/legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung /_/mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/_/rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul 
[\[99b.4\]]can/_/gsung ba chen po ye shes che/_/gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/_/mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/_/bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po/_/sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/_/shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/_/kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/_/
[\[99b.5\]]'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba/_/kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/_/thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs ldan pa/_/rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/_/chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/_/rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/_/spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/_/
[\[99b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/_/bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/_/bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad/_/g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes/_/dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/_/theg pa chen po'i 
[\[99b.7\]]shing rta bcibs/_/blo chen rgal bar dka' ba yi/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/_/nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/_/rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]sa yi 'bras bur gnas/_/gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/_/khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/_/bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi/_/mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/_/sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis 
[\[100a.2\]]bstod nas/_/de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/_/phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/_/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/_/gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/_/thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/_/langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[100a.3\]]mthon po thams cad du/_/skad ber chen pos yongs bkang nas/_/nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing /_/ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/_/kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/_/byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/_/
[\[100a.4\]]mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod/_/kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang /_/gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/_/'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/_/bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/_/
[\[100a.5\]]sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/_/sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing /_/nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong /_/shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur/_/de ni longs spyod chen po dang /_/
[\[100a.6\]]bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/_/de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/_/blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/_/yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/_/bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis/_/mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal 
[\[100a.7\]]ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/_/nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/_/'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/_/gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/_/de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/_/sems 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]can kun la bde 'dod pa/_/lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/_/ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na/_/'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos/_/de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/_/gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/_/yon tan rgya 
[\[100b.2\]]mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/_/mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni/_/de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/_/gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/_/'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod/_/dge ba phun 
[\[100b.3\]]sum tshogs sbyin pa/_/kun mkhyen bla med 'bras bu'i mchog_/bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/_/'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung /_/thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/_/kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/_/dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de ni 
[\[100b.4\]]dge zhing 'bras bur ldan/_/sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/_/yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/_/snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/_/'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/_/'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste/_/'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba/_/'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med/_/
[\[100b.5\]]ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D874}]@#/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang 
[\[100b.6\]]bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha/_bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta a mo g+ha/_a pra ti ha ta/_shA sa nA nAM/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/_badzra 
[\[100b.7\]]sa twA ya/_badzra bi pu lA ya/_pad+ma sam+b+ha bA ya/_pad+ma yo na ye/_tad+ya thA/_oM hrIHka ra shrI ka ra pra b+hA ka ra badzra satwa/_badzra sam+b+ha ba/_pad+ma sam+b+ha ba/_pad+ma sA ga ra/_pad+ma go tsa ra/_ba ra da/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka/_kA ru Ni sam+b+ha ba/_hU~M hU~M/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_da ra da ra/_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ba ra ba ra/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_yon tan 
[\[101a.2\]]rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/_/'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o/_/gang la la nyan pa dang /_'chang ba 
[\[101a.3\]]dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /_dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing /_'jig rten gsum po kun du rgyas ko lta ste/_
[\[101a.4\]]'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/_sa 
[\[101a.5\]]yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/_/srid gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag_/dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_/snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/_/rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa po/_/skal ba bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i 
[\[101a.6\]]mchog_/shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag_/rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/_/rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/_/mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor ba mdzes/_/dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung /_/skyabs 
[\[101a.7\]]dang yid 'phrog dag cing gsal bar mdzad/_/nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba/_/srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan/_/thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog_/snyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]pa bsnams/_/dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can/_/tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tsham pa'i gzugs/_/'jig pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can/_/dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu/_/tshul gyi longs spyod bde chen mchog gi 
[\[101b.2\]]rgyu/_/dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/_/srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags/_/dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/_/gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/_/sa brnyes 
[\[101b.3\]]'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/_/chen po'i che ba thog ma med pa ste/_/snga ma mun pa bsal cing nyon mongs med/_/dge ba dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag_/tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag_/srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba/_/srid gsum 
[\[101b.4\]]bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/_/dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs/_/nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs/_/pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/_/dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa/_/bde 
[\[101b.5\]]la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag_/smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/_/'gro ba srid par ltung ba grol mdzad pa/_/sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad/_/skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snang ba po/_/rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can/_/
[\[101b.6\]]yon tan rnam grags khyab par dkyil 'khor ba/_/dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/_/de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/_/cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan/_/lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag dbang /_/lha dang lha min 
[\[101b.7\]]dbang byas rnams kyis btud/_/brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/_/bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/_/pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung /_/dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/_/chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po/_/sangs 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa/_/bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/_/rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/_/rab 
[\[102a.2\]]dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/_/na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las/_/cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/_/dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya mnga' ba/_/nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[102a.3\]]zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing /_/nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa/_/me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags/_/gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag_/btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/_/rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 
[\[102a.4\]]'khor ba/_/pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan/_/spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/_/gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/_/tshogs chen mdun ma 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/_/spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor 
[\[102a.5\]]mdzes gyur pa/_/ka la ping ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/_/mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams/_/stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/_/rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/_/
[\[102a.6\]]tshogs mchod dag byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa/_/chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/_/gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa/_/lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/_/mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/_/
[\[102a.7\]]stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan/_/'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/_/sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes/_/nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/_/
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]mtha' dang bral ba kun du gzigs pa ste/_/rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can/_/don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/_/theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags/_/dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes/_/skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma 
[\[102b.2\]]lus bcom/_/blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/_/bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/_/bcom ldan 'byung ba'i 'jigs pa med par mdzad/_/rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/_/bde 
[\[102b.3\]]ba longs spyod cher 'byung dri ma med/_/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/_/mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog_/'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/_/stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags/_/sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos 
[\[102b.4\]]mchog rin chen mtshungs/_/dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/_/khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs/_/khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba/_/rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma dri med phyag gi 
[\[102b.5\]]dbus bsnams pa/_/thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/_/spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba/_/rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa/_/mchog chen rdo rje glu la bstod pa yi/_/ming brgya rtsa 
[\[102b.6\]]brgyad ston sel legs pa mang /_/ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni stod byed pa/_/des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi/_/longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur/_/mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod pa/_/spyan 
[\[102b.7\]]ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin par byed/_/sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/_/de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te/_/lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur/_/srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]skyes/_/de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/_/de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing /_/gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis/_/'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs/_/pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis/_/bcom ldan 
[\[103a.2\]]'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D875}]@#/_/'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub 
[\[103a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai yA d+h+wi kA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sa ra sa ra/_su ru su ru/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA d+ha ra/_
[\[103a.4\]]tsa ra tsa ra/_ma hA tsa ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA b+ha ra/_kam+pa kam+pa/_ma hA gam+pa hU~M ma hA s+pha ra Na/_d+harmA gra sA ga ra swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba ste mtha' yas par khyab pa/_
[\[103a.5\]]bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/_sgrib pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_
[\[103a.6\]]rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa/_sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar bar byed pa ste shin tu dkon pa'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/_nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/_/
[\[103a.7\]]rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/_/rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/_/'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/_/
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas/_/tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste/_/de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral/_/dbang chen rtse ltar 'od ldan pa/_/sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/_/rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/_/yon tan 'od 
[\[103b.2\]]brgyas bsgyings pa ste/_/nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/_/srid gsum dag na spa ba'i sku/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can/_/lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi/_/rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/_/dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/_/rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des/_/
[\[103b.3\]]yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha/_/che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog_/sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/_/ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs/_/
[\[103b.4\]]sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/_/pad+ma 'dab stong rtse mo can/_/rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes/_/chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/_/sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/_/snang bar byed pa 'byung ba bo/_/srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags/_/gtso bo chen po cher grags 
[\[103b.5\]]pa/_/seng ge chen po stobs po che/_/cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/_/skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/_/rdo rje byi ru bai DUr+ya/_/nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs/_/byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/_/sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs/_/zhal mdangs nyi ma 
[\[103b.6\]]du ma'i gzi/_/lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can/_/rig sngags 'chang brgyus zhabs la btud/_/rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod/_/nor bu brgya 'gul 'od zer gyis/_/brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas/_/cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/_/nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/_/
[\[103b.7\]]rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing /_/dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro/_/rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/_/'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/_/'od zer mang pos phog pa yi/_/phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/_/brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi/_/'od kyis zhal 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]gsal rnga yab bskyod/_/dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/_/tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher/_/lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa ltar/_/ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs/_/rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/_/shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa/_/byams 
[\[104a.2\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos/_/btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal/_/snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/_/mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar/_/byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/_/kun nas spa ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/_/ma pham thub med dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[104a.3\]]cha lugs mnyam med che/_/byams pa'i snying po snying po che/_/byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba/_/rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can/_/rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa/_/rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud/_/de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po/_/grub pa chen po 
[\[104a.4\]]rig sngags grub/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/_/thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/_/sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags/_/gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges/_/mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/_/nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/_/snang 
[\[104a.5\]]bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/_/'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba/_/dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste/_/gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang /_/nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/_/swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog_/'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad/_/stobs chen 
[\[104a.6\]]'chang ba bkra shis pa/_/nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/_/stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/_/mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can/_/dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad/_/rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa/_/sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/_/dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rje 
[\[104a.7\]]ston/_/rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yi/_/g.yo dang 'brug sgrog sgra ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/_/de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/_/mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/_/khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/de nas sa yi 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dbang phyug po/_/byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/_/bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral ba/_/thub pa nyi mas bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa/_/bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa/_/thabs chen bla na 
[\[104b.2\]]med pa ste/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa/_/'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/_/sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/_/byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 
[\[104b.3\]]'dis/_/mi ni la la gang bstod pa/_/de la lha la sogs kun dang /_/lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams/_/rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/_/gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/_/sangs 
[\[104b.4\]]rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te/_/'di la the tshom yod med do/_/nang par mal nas langs nas ni/_/gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/_/de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/_/byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing /_/sdig 
[\[104b.5\]]'joms yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs/_/'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[104b.6\]{D876}]@#/_/'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha'i spyod yul 
[\[104b.7\]]can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M swa sti ka mA lA k+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/_d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/_sa yang g.yos par gyur/_rnga bo che dag gi 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]sgra yang grags par gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying 
[\[105a.2\]]po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/_bsod nams chen po/_sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/_rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang 
[\[105a.3\]]'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la/_shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te/_'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/_/nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/_/zla ba lta bur 
[\[105a.4\]]'gyur te/_sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do/_/nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/_/sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/_mtho dman med do/_/lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[105a.5\]]bskyod par mi nus so/_/thar ba lta bur 'gyur te/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/_/de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrang ba tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/_nyan pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_ston pa 
[\[105a.6\]]tsam dang /_bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/_de'i 'dod pa dang /_smon pa dang /_re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_sdang bas dkrugs pa dang /_mi nad dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]rmi lam ngan pa dang /_gnod pa 'byung ba dang /_'jigs pa'i dus dang /_'chi ba dang /_chom rkun dang /_dgon pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_gcan gzan dang /_mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/_bde ba dang /_'byor pa dang /_ci 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]'dod pa dang /_ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha bton te/_sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/_snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[105b.2\]]dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/_nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog_/'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/_/sems can dag pa bla med rin chen 
[\[105b.3\]]mchog_/thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/_/kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/_/thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/_/lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/_/dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang 
[\[105b.4\]]stobs min mkhyen/_/'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog_/lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog_/rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog_/dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog_/zhi rab snying 
[\[105b.5\]]rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/_/'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/_/rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/_/mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab/_/legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron/_/thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min 
[\[105b.6\]]sgron/_/dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron/_/rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron/_/mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/_/legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/_/'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od/_/rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'char 
[\[105b.7\]]ba/_/rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang /_/rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po/_/rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang /_/dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang /_/rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/_/rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag_/rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang /_/na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/_/sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/_/mkha' 
[\[106a.2\]]sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/_/lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar/_/rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyu/_/sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed phreng mchog can/_/glog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan/_/ral gri mtshon thogs dbang 
[\[106a.3\]]ldan mthu stobs mtshon/_/rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/_/'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/_/gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/_/bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug_/sku rnams 
[\[106a.4\]]thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/_/mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/_/sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes/_/rab 'byam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/_/mthu stobs lhag pa 
[\[106a.5\]]brnyes shing grub brnyes la/_/rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/_/bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/_/cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/_/byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren/_/legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/_/
[\[106a.6\]]dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/_/rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can/_/'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/_/longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug_/sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba/_/sku ser sku 
[\[106a.7\]]dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/_/sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/_/rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/_/gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog_/cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog_/dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs/_/rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/_/srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'/_/ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa/_/yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/_/nor bu chen po 
[\[106b.2\]]nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/_/nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/_/sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags/_/srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras 
[\[106b.3\]]mchog_/zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag_/skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+ma skyes/_/kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba/_/dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag_/blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang /_/mkhas rab 
[\[106b.4\]]zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/_/zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas/_/'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/_/legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs skyed pa/_/snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad/_/rnam grol ngas grol 
[\[106b.5\]]shin tu grol ba'i blo/_/blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags/_/kun du longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog_/blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/_/dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad/_/
[\[106b.6\]]snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/_/spyan zur mda' ni rab tu gtad legs pa/_/'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/_/mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/_/drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel 
[\[106b.7\]]gsum las skyes/_/rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris par sla/_/rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/_/lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/_/spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel/_/'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]mda'/_/na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/_/legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mda'/_/na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/_/zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/_/zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten 
[\[107a.2\]]kun 'byor mdzad/_/bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/_/zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/_/dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra/_/rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/_/sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/_/blo gros chen 
[\[107a.3\]]po blo gros rno ba'i mchog_/rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang /_/stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/_/skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/_/
[\[107a.4\]]mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu/_/sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mnga' dang rdo rje can/_/mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan/_/ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/_/gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad/_/brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/_/
[\[107a.5\]]dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/_/gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/_/rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/_/dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/_/gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/_/skye 
[\[107a.6\]]dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang /_/sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/_/bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/_/'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang /_/nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/_/mdun 'dug nang par 
[\[107a.7\]]bstod pa 'di brjod gang /_/de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing /_/dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar bar 'gyur/_/g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang /_/mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/_/mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/_/
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]nam mkha'i snying po la ni stod byed pa/_/de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /_/sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol/_/des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang /_/bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/_/bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel 
[\[107b.2\]]bar bya ba'am/_/rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang /_/rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/_/bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun/_/'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/_/nam mkha'i snying po 
[\[107b.3\]]srid gsum mgon po la/_/rtag tu bsten cing sngags kyang bsten par bgyi/_/'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D877}]@#/_/'phags pa kun du 
[\[107b.4\]]bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kun du bzang po nam mkha'i dkyil kun du rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/_sa'i dkyil 
[\[107b.5\]]'khor kun du 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_gzugs sna tshogs can/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang /_rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/_yon tan chen po'i sku sa kun du mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[107b.6\]]lo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun du bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[107b.7\]]dpa' chen po kun du bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun du yongs su rgyas par gyur te/_nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal 
[\[108a.2\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog_/lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar 
[\[108a.3\]]byas nas/_gzungs 'di bshad do/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M na mo na ma s+t+ri/_b+hu ba ne shwa re/_ma hA b+ho gA ya/_a sa ma sa ma/_a mi ta sa ma/_a nan+ta sa ma/_ga ga na sa ma/_tri b+hu ba na sa ma/_a she Sha sa ma/_be Sha sa ma/_pa ra ma ar+tha sa ma/_swa b+hA ba sa ma/_
[\[108a.4\]]ta thA tA sa ma/_a ra dzaHsa ma/_shud+d+hi sa ma/_bud+d+hi sa ma/_d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/_a b+hi Sha ma sa ma/_sa ma sa ma/_e kA nA ya/_sA ga ra/_bi shud+d+he/_A lo ka/_hI hI/_lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_o~M pra sa ga ta/_na ya na ya/_hi ni ra a d+hiSh+ThA na/_saM b+ho ga/
[\[108a.5\]]aM a na la ya la ya/_d+harma a gra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_dza ya dza ya/_hU~M hU~M/_d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/_de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 
[\[108a.6\]]'das kyi zhal du bltas te/_sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/_'jig rten gsum po kun du gang bar byas so/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing 
[\[108a.7\]]snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/_dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/_kye ma snying rje chen po dang yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/_kye ma sangs 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/_chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/_kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i 
[\[108b.2\]]bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo/_bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing /_bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang 
[\[108b.3\]]chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/_gzung ba'am/_bklag 
[\[108b.4\]]pa'am/_kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/_gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/_/kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/_/'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho 
[\[108b.5\]]ba'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/_/'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal 
[\[108b.6\]]thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 
[\[108b.7\]]'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po 'thob par 'gyur la/_nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa kun du bzang 
[\[109a.2\]]po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas/_lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/_dal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[109a.3\]]phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_chos kyi snang ba chen po yang gsol bar mdzad do/_/'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/_khyod tshe 
[\[109a.4\]]brjes nas sa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs so/_/de nas lus bde ba dang /_sems bde ba dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/_/mthu che ba dang /_dbang che bar grags par yang 
[\[109a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas pha 
[\[109a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/_nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir 
[\[109a.7\]]brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun du bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang /_spyan chen mo 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang /_rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang /_rin chen dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang /_
[\[109b.2\]]lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /_dar chen dang /_gzugs bzang dang /_shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang /_gzhon nu ma rnams dang /_bran rnams dang /_bram mo rnams dang /_mi 
[\[109b.3\]]'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang /_lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang /_ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang /_rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor 
[\[109b.4\]]chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/_kun du bzang po kun gyi mchog_/sna tshogs 
[\[109b.5\]]kun gyi 'byor pa che/_/dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog_/sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag_/rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/_/gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/_/gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/_/khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/_/rdo rje 
[\[109b.6\]]chen po rab tu bzhad/_/bsgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/_/rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/_/rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/_/btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag_/sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/_/de bzhin sa 'dzin 
[\[109b.7\]]sa gsum pa/_/dul dang sbyin pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]thabs/_/rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/_/shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes/_/brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/_/brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/_/stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/_/mthu 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]stobs stong gis spro ba dang /_/yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/_/rdul sel rgyal po chen po ste/_/rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/_/rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/_/cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/_/mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang /_/
[\[110a.2\]]shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/_/snying po chen po las byung dpal/_/nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/_/sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/_/rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/_/gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/_/rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/_/
[\[110a.3\]]rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/_/thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/_/g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste/_/g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/_/gsung bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad/_/dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/_/dbang po las lhag thub 
[\[110a.4\]]dang mnyam/_/chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/_/rab dga'i bun long zhi mdzad pa/_/nyon mongs 'dam rdza bskems par mdzad/_/dpa' bo rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/_/khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/_/gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang ldan/_/mnyam 
[\[110a.5\]]pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang /_/mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/_/sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig_/byang chub snying por rgya cher rol/_/rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/_/spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/_/gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/_/dag 
[\[110a.6\]]mdzad sreg sbyin mchog sbyin po/_/'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms/_/'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/_/rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba/_/skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag_/nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/_/sems can 'khor ba 
[\[110a.7\]]zhi mdzad pa/_/brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/_/kun du rnam rgyal snang ba po/_/kun du rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_/kun du rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/_/kun du nyes pa sel ba lags/_/mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs/_/de bzhin zad mdzad thug 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]par mdzad/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/_/nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/_/'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/_/rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/_/rdo rje chen po stobs skyed pa/_/sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/_/pha rol 
[\[110b.2\]]bzhugs pa sdig sel ba/_/dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/_/dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/_/'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/_/ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin/_/longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/_/dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la/_/nor sbyin 
[\[110b.3\]]tshogs ldan rdo rje can/_/gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par rgyal/_/dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/_/bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/_/sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/_/dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/_/'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/_/
[\[110b.4\]]rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/_/sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can/_/yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/_/brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/_/gsung ba chen po shes rab che/_/sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/_/mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/_/theg pa bla 
[\[110b.5\]]na med par ldan/_/mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa/_/'bras bu chen po chos kyi mchog_/ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/_/zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/_/bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/_/kun du rab 'byam sel mdzad pa/_/snying rje ye shes snying 
[\[110b.6\]]po mkhyen/_/snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/_/dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/_/mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba/_/rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can/_/skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i 
[\[110b.7\]]'byor ba can/_/kun du spyod pa khong dge ba/_/dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po/_/kun du yul kun mnga' ba ste/_/zhes bzang po rtag tu mnga'/_/dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags/_/zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/_/spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/_/dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/_/slob dpon chen po grags pa che/_/dam pa nyid de bla na med/_/gsang sngags 
[\[111a.2\]]rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/_/de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni/_/yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/_/dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/_/yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal/_/gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs/_/mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang /_/
[\[111a.3\]]sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs/_/kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/_/mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/_/sdig bsal kun du bzang po la/_/snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/_/des ni 
[\[111a.4\]]sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/_/mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing /_/de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/_/ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/_/de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spo las nges par byung gyur cing /_/yon 
[\[111a.5\]]tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams la/_/bstod pa chen pos snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/_/'phags 
[\[111a.6\]]pa kun du bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D878}]@#/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub 
[\[111a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/_o~M badzra paN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka_/ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_de nas gzungs sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/_
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo /_/dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to/_/lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum 
[\[111b.2\]]bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal ba/_sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig_/rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so/_/rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang /_bgegs 
[\[111b.3\]]thams cad zlog pa dang /_sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang /_dam pa stsol ba dang /_'byor pa stsol ba dang /_sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_thos na don mchis pa dang /_brjod na don na mchis pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang /_stobs 
[\[111b.4\]]bskyed pa dang /_gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang /_spobs pa skyed pa dang /_dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang /_nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /_dbang bgyid pa dang /_sdang ba 'joms pa dang /_sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_dug sel ba dang /_rgyal bar bgyid pa dang /_
[\[111b.5\]]dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_dang bar bgyid pa dang /_nga rgyal 'joms pa dang /_pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang /_sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang /_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa 
[\[111b.6\]]dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_dpal skyed pa dang /_skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang /_sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyis dang /_gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang /_ci 
[\[111b.7\]]'tshal ba stsol ba dang /_yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /_char ches pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/_g.yul chen po dang /_mi nad chen po dang /_rtsod pa chen po dang /_mi ma lags pa la 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]sogs pa 'jig pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang /_skrod pa dang /_srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang /_'jigs pa chen po byung ba na/_nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/_gos 
[\[112a.2\]]dkar po 'tshal te/_kha shar shar phyogs su bltas la/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/_brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing /_grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/_thams 
[\[112a.3\]]cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/_sems can rnams la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/_/de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par 
[\[112a.4\]]bstod pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/_/rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/_/rdo rje snying po stobs po che/_/rdo rje 'khrugs pa zhags pa che/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/_/rdo rje hU~M gi hU~M lags te/_/rdo 
[\[112a.5\]]rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po/_/chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/_/chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/_/phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/_/spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/_/rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/_/mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags/_/
[\[112a.6\]]ral gri sngon po ral gri che/_/dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/_/mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba/_/'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/_/rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/_/rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che/_/khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/_/sel mdzad 
[\[112a.7\]]khro bo'i rgyags pa sel/_/khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu bstod/_/khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/_/gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste/_/rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gums/_/dbyig thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/_/rdo rje'i zhags pas 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]rab tu 'joms/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/_/'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro/_/sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/_/gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa/_/bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/_/sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/_/
[\[112b.2\]]drag po chen po rdo rje khro/_/sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad/_/gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/_/rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/_/rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/_/dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse/_/gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/_/spyod 
[\[112b.3\]]yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/_/rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/_/rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags/_/na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol/_/mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/_/srin po srung ba drag po ste/_/me tog phreng 
[\[112b.4\]]ba'i rgyan la dgyes/_/nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/_/'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/_/grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/_/rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod/_/mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba/_/mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/_/
[\[112b.5\]]cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/_/phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/_/ye shes che ldan srung ba che/_/rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring /_/gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/_/'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa/_/rgyal chen 
[\[112b.6\]]gtsug na nor bu thogs/_/mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/_/'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig_/gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum/_/'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/_/za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/_/mtho ba 
[\[112b.7\]]sku mchog zhal gsum pa/_/tsham tshom med de srid las byung /_/rtag pa skar dgyes dus 'byor pa/_/rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/_/rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/_/bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/_/baiDUr+ya ltar 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]dri med sku/_/mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs/_/dga' bskyed pa dga' bar mdzad/_/dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog_/lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste/_/brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba/_/bde ba chen 
[\[113a.2\]]po 'ching ba gcod/_/dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/_/mtshon cha che tshogs cod pan can/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba/_/pad+ma chen po'i phyag ring ba/_/pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mchog_/nag po chen po 'byung po che/_/gtum chen 
[\[113a.3\]]thog thog chen po ste/_/rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang /_/rdo rje'i mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/_/rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste/_/'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje/_/zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon/_/brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/_/rgyal 
[\[113a.4\]]ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/_/rdo rje yis ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/rdo rje'i lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa/_/rdo rje'i mdas ni rnam par sbyangs/_/rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang /_/rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal/_/ye shes dag pa theg pa che/_/thabs 
[\[113a.5\]]brnyes snying rje chen po lags/_/rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/_/spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/_/rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/_/mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/_/rdo rje chen po mgon po pa/_/rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/_/rdo rje chen po 
[\[113a.6\]]gad rgyangs sgrogs/_/me tog chun po 'od gsal ba/_/dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/_/des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/_/sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog_/rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/_/rdo rje'i gtsug sdug shes rab can/_/
[\[113a.7\]]rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes/_/mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag_/bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags/_/dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang /_/rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/_/gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung /_/skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]ba/_/rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrogs/_/rdo rje'i sgrog ste rnam par 'joms/_/rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/_/rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/_/nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol/_/spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/_/dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor 
[\[113b.2\]]btags/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/_/rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/_/dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/_/
[\[113b.3\]]sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/_/de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/_/de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa/_rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/_/rdo rje mtshan rtsa brgyad pa 'di/_/ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung /_/
[\[113b.4\]]sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/_/ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/_/dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa/_/grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing /_/nges pa kun las rnam par grol/_/lag na rdo rje stobs po che/_/rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_/lag 
[\[113b.5\]]na rdo rje'i yon tan che/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/_/de ni sdig pa kun las grol/_/ngan 'gro kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/_/su zhig nang bar langs nas 'don/_/rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba/_/
[\[113b.6\]]gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/_/'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang /_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yi/_/bde ba de yis 
[\[113b.7\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nang bar langs nas ni/_/lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/_/de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_/ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/_/bgegs dang logs 'dren thams cad dang /_/'jigs byed 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]rgyal po rnams kyis kyang /_/zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/shes rab can ni gang zhig gis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/_/gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang /_/bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/_/gang zhig ming 
[\[114a.2\]]brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/_/nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don/_/mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/_/bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[114a.3\]{D879}]@#/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya ra brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing /_mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag 
[\[114a.4\]]pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/_yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
