[\[114a.5\]]klu dang /_rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM 
[\[114a.6\]]b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi tsi tra/_mug+ta dA ma/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_pa ra satwa mo tsa ka_/ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma ko Sha d+ha ra/_pra ba ra d+harma/_lab+d+ha/_bi dza ya/_su ra ta/_sam+b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/_kle sha ga ra pra sha ma ka/_shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/_a 
[\[114a.7\]]nu swa ri/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa pa ra/_ba ra ta/_ba ra Na da da/_o~M ma hA phA sha pra sa ra/_a sa ma sa ma/_a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta b+ha dra/_sa man+ta saM d+ha ra/_sa man+ta A ka ra/_sa man+ta pra sa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_he he many+dzu ra ba/_ma hA badzra ma hA khaD+ga/_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]tshin+da tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_bi ra dza bi ra dza/_karma a ba ga ma ka/_ku ru ku ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/_d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/_ma hA ma hA/_ma hA ma hA/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_b+ho b+ho/_b+hI ma b+hI ma/_na da na da/_sa ra 
[\[114b.2\]]sa ra/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_mo tsa ya/_ma ma nA tha ma nu sr-i ta/_a ba ya duHkha na/_su khaM da/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_a nA tho haM/_duHkhi to haM/_sa ra dzo haM/_u pa dru to haM/_a bi bik+to haM/_ku si d+ho haM/_mA ra Na d+harmo haM/_twaM b+ha ga bA na/_duH
[\[114b.3\]]khi tA nAM/_su khaM da da/_a nA thAM nAM/_sa nA tha ka ra/_sa ra dza sAM/_bi ra dza ska ra/_u pa dru tA nAM/_swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka/_a bi bi ga tA nA/_ku sha la saM b+ha ra/_pa ri pU ra yi tA/_ku sid+hA nAM/_ma hA bIr+ya d+ha tA/_mA ra Na 
[\[114b.4\]]d+harmi Na/_ma mi ta pa dA dA tA/_ma ma bi b+ha ga bA na/_nA tho b+ha ba/_sha ra NaM/_pa rA ya NaM/_tra tA/_sarba duHkhA ni me pra sha ma ya/_sarba kle sha ra dzAM si mi/_a ba na ya/_sarba saM sA ra u pa dra ba/_duHkhA ni mi/_nA sha ya/_sarba ku sha la 
[\[114b.5\]]d+harma pa ri pU ra me ku ru/_sarba karma A ba ra Na/_kle sha pa ra ba ta me bi ka ri/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/_bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/_yo gaM me saM ni yo dza ya/_a ra Na d+harma/_bi rA ga bi ra dza/_sany+dza ha/_pra dza ha/_d+ha ri Ni/_sa ma kha sa ma/_dza la ni d+hi sa ma/_
[\[114b.6\]]me ru sa ma/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/_rig sngags don kun sgrub pa 'di/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/_/de ma thag tu sems can rnams/_/skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/_/ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/_/bdud kyi sde rnams 
[\[114b.7\]]rab tu 'dar/_/lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/_/log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur/_/sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/_/gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang /_/grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/_/'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/_/'jam 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing /_/gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/_/brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/_/rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu pa'i/_/sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[115a.2\]]'od kyi snang ba yis/_/sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/srin po mi bzang gzugs can rnams/_/stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smras/_/lha rnams zhi ba'i cha 
[\[115a.3\]]lugs can/_/thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/_/gang na rdo rje ral gri che/_/de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/_/phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/_/shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/_/bgegs 
[\[115a.4\]]kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/_/sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang /_/sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag_/shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/_/drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/_/gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/_/
[\[115a.5\]]dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/_/rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/_/sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/_/skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/_/gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams sel 
[\[115a.6\]]bar mdzad/_/mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/_/me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/_/spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/_/dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs de rab tu bzhad/_/dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' 
[\[115a.7\]]ba/_/ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/_/rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/_/rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/_/rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/_/tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/_/sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/_/cha lugs 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]sngo la sa skyong ba/_/lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/_/'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/_/rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/_/brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/_/yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/_/btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis 
[\[115b.2\]]pa/_/rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/_/stobs po che la shugs che ba/_/phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po/_/sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/_/'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog_/dkyil 'khor chen po ston 
[\[115b.3\]]pa po/_/dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/_/zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan/_/ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/_/mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/_/hU~M gis 
[\[115b.4\]]'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/_/'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/_/lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/_/de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid/_/zham ring gad rgyangs chen po can/_/rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/_/'jig rten gsum du snyan par 
[\[115b.5\]]grags/_/gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/_/drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/_/mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/_/'dzum zhing sgeg par kun du ston/_/spyod pas ltar brtan pa lags/_/nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/_/nyi 
[\[115b.6\]]ma gsal ba lam me pa/_/nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin/_/tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/_/mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/_/nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/_/dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/_/gzugs sbyin de 
[\[115b.7\]]bzhin stobs sbyin pa/_/dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/_/kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/_/'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/_/zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/_/dpung rgyan snyan che gdub kor can/_/nor bu'i rgyan 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gyis brgyan pa ste/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron/_/rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/_/ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/_/dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog_/'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i 
[\[116a.2\]]gnas sbyin pa/_/dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba/_/mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/_/ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/_/shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/_/stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/_/byams pa mchog 
[\[116a.3\]]dang tha ma mkhyen/_/rnam par grags pa gsan pa des/_/rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/_/rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/_/shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur/_/'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin 
[\[116a.4\]]pa/_/mgur bzang 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste/_/zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/_/lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur/_/sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/_/sems can kun la rab ston pa/_/brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog_/sems can 
[\[116a.5\]]rnams kyi blo la mkhas/_/sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/_/me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/_/byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/_/rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/_/phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/_/mkha' 
[\[116a.6\]]'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/_/bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/_/mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med/_/de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/_/brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/_/mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/_/'joms med tshig bzang 
[\[116a.7\]]chu lugs bzang /_/dpa' bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/_/tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/_/mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog_/gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu srung /_/las dang nyon mongs rab 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]sreg pa/_/ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/_/legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/_/brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing /_/dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/_/lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/_/bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang /_/
[\[116b.2\]]gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang /_/mdangs 'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/_/de ring legs par bstod par gyur/_/'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis rab/_/bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/_/de dag kun la bltas nas kyang /_/'di 
[\[116b.3\]]skad du ni tshig smras pa/_/khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing /_/nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/_/'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog_/nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig_/de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing /_/'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yi/_/
[\[116b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/_/shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/_/sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/_/sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/_/shin tu rgyas pa byung bar 
[\[116b.5\]]gyur/_/kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/_/sems can rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/_/dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/_/'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/_/la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/_/sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/_/
[\[116b.6\]]grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/_/yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung /_/de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/_/de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[116b.7\]]pa'i sa chen yang /_/ring bor mi thogs de yis 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/_/rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/_/'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/_/sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/_/ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/_/legs 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/_/sa chen dam pa de dag kyang /_/gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yi/_/sems can chen pos mi thogs par/_/tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang /_/sems can 
[\[117a.2\]]kun la sdug pa dang /_/spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/_/byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang /_/sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa/_/bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di/_/
[\[117a.3\]]sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/_/nang par langs nas su brjod pa/_/de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang /_/de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/_/gnod sbyin srin po 
[\[117a.4\]]mang po dag_/rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/_/de la nges par srung bar byed/_/de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing /_/
[\[117a.5\]]mnyam par gzhag par snang bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/_/bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag_/dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/_/rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/_/de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/_/
[\[117a.6\]]'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/_/lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang /_/bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/_/shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/_/nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/_/dri ma med cing rab dag la/_/rab tu 'od gsal sgra 
[\[117a.7\]]snyan dang /_/sems can thams cad dga' ba yi/_/yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/_/mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang /_/'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing /_/yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]te 'dun pa yi/_/gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[117b.2\]{D880}]@#/_/'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mr-i ta bin+du dza ba ma hA su 
[\[117b.3\]]kha swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_yon tan rin po che'i 
[\[117b.4\]]tshogs can khyed kyi gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas/_sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge 
[\[117b.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo /_tshes brgyad dam/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing gso 
[\[117b.6\]]sbyong dang ldan par byas te/_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_me tog dang dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/_bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na/_dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/_sdig 
[\[117b.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de/_bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/_bsam 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do/_/de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs 
[\[118a.2\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas/_mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul che ba/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/
[\[118a.3\]]chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing /_/nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/_/skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing /_/theg pa gcig 
[\[118a.4\]]pu'i tshul gcig pa/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/_/theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/snang ba chen po snang ba brnyes/_/yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag_/zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/_/'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/theg 
[\[118a.5\]]pa chen po dag pa che/_/sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing /_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa/_/rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/_/dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/_/bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste/_/
[\[118a.6\]]rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/_/zla ba chen po nyi ma che/_/lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/_/lha chen mgon po chen po ste/_/'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing /_/sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/_/kun 
[\[118a.7\]]mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/_/rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste/_/chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/_/ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/_/sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku mdzes yon 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]tan snying po mkhyen/_/rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/_/ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/bstan pa gnas pa dbang bdag po/_/bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/_/yangs pa dri med shes rab can/_/snang 
[\[118b.2\]]ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/_/zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/_/ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/_/dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/_/'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[118b.3\]]'joms pa ste/_/zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/_/chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/_/thar ba'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/_/bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med/_/rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/_/nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtse mo yangs 
[\[118b.4\]]par rnam par grags/_/sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/_/snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog_/dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog_/dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/_/rnam 
[\[118b.5\]]gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag_/rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi/_/'byor ba brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/_/bskal ba dag ni grangs med par/_/tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sa 
[\[118b.6\]]la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/_/sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/_/ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/_/nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel/_/ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che 
[\[118b.7\]]ba/_/mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/_/mgon po chen po snang ba che/_/sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/_/zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/_/yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/_/chos 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/_/dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/_/rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje chen po dri med mchog_/rdo rje'i mtshon pa snams sdig mi mnga'/_/nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/_/
[\[119a.2\]]ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/_/de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/_/sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong /_/shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/_/sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog_/rdo rjes 'dul 
[\[119a.3\]]ba rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/_/rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen chen po rin chen blo/_/rin chen rdo rje 'od che ba/_/rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung /_/rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/_/stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[119a.4\]]yul brnyes pa/_/ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/_/stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/_/stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/_/dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/_/chos gcig las byung snang 
[\[119a.5\]]ba po/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags/_/'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/_/'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/_/brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag_/nyes pa ma lus 
[\[119a.6\]]sel ba ste/_/phal chen skye bo kun la phan/_/sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/_/kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa/_/dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog_/dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa 
[\[119a.7\]]can/_/dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sgeg chen 'jam zhing dgongs par ldan/_/rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/_/rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog_/sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog_/sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/_/ming brgya 
[\[119b.2\]]rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/_/rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_/'di dag so sor rjod byed na/_/
[\[119b.3\]]nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing /_/rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang /_/nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/_/sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/_/blo ldan gang zhig stod byed pa/_/de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/nang 
[\[119b.4\]]par langs nas rjod byed pa/_/sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/_/bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su gtang /_/sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang /_/de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_/ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing /_/sa mchog chen 
[\[119b.5\]]po thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/_/des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/_/ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/_/gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/_/rdo 
[\[119b.6\]]rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/_/ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[119b.7\]{D881}]@#/_/'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha/_ha ra tsa ra/_ma 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]hA bA sha/_ma ru tA/_a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/_de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/_/gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang /_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/_/sa yi snying po tshogs 
[\[120a.2\]]dbang la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/_/skal ldan chen po legs so legs/_/sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/_/khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing /_/yon tan dpag med mchog bskyed pa/_/sems can kun gyi sdug 
[\[120a.3\]]bsngal dang /_/nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni/_/'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/_/nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/_/ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag_/'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin/_/lus can dag las su yang rung /_/khyod kyi gsang sngags 
[\[120a.4\]]'chang byed pa/_/de dag las ni gcig tsam yang /_/byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog_/thos nas mos par byed pa ni/_/nges par yon tan thams cad kyang /_/thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/
[\[120a.5\]]de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/_/langs te sa yi dbang phyug po/_/sa yi snying po sa mchog la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/_/sa yi snying po gtso bo che/_/glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/_/cod pan can te sa brnyes pa/_/phun 
[\[120a.6\]]sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog_/rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas/_/gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/_/gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul/_/swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog_/snying po snying po 
[\[120a.7\]]mkhyen par grags/_/gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/_/sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can/_/sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/_/'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po/_/rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/_/snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/_/shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/_/'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal cing /_/gar thabs chen po ston pa po/_/ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/_/nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/_/nyi 
[\[120b.2\]]ma chen po nyid yin te/_/dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/_/yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/_/sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/_/chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho/_/yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod 
[\[120b.3\]]pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog_/thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/_/theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med/_/mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/_/zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/_/rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya pa/_/rdo rje dkyil 
[\[120b.4\]]'khor me tog thod/_/blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/_/pad+ma chen po stobs po che/_/gsang sngags chen po tshogs chen po/_/sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/_/lag na rdo rje yon tan des/_/nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/_/mnyam nyid 'byam 
[\[120b.5\]]longs spyod pa yi/_/rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/_/rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/_/sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin/_/sa la longs spyod longs spyod bzang /_/mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs/_/rab 'byam snod ni rnam par grags/_/smra mkhas 
[\[120b.6\]]rdo rje rab 'joms pa/_/spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/_/me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/_/spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/_/brtan po brtan la bde sbyin pa/_/ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/_/gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/_/dbang po 
[\[120b.7\]]gshin rje'i rgyal chen dang /_/btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug_/'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/_/de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/_/rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/_/dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/_/gzigs pa 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ring ba spyan yangs pa/_/nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/_/thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug_/srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/_/dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/_/dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can/_/rnam par 
[\[121a.2\]]gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das/_/ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che/_/stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/_/bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/_/dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed/_/sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa/_/mnga' bdag grags 
[\[121a.3\]]pa yul dang ldan/_/dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba/_/rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/_/rigs kun du ni mchod pa lags/_/rgyal po rigs mchog skyed pa'i rten/_/rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa/_/rig 
[\[121a.4\]]sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/_/mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog_/mgrin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nad dang bral ba lags/_/skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/_/grol ba smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus 
[\[121a.5\]]rnams kyis brgyan/_/rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/_/rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/_/grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog_/tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/_/dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/_/'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang ldan/_/
[\[121a.6\]]ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan/_/spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/_/nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/_/rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/_/mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med/_/sku yang dag cing na bza' dag_/
[\[121a.7\]]dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/_/dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/_/'byung ldan sred pa sel mdzad pa/_/'khor ba zad mdzad shes rab can/_/tshul shes tshul spyod yul ba/_/rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dge 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ba che/_/'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can/_/ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/_/sa yi snying po snying po che/_/rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/_/dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/_/zab cing 
[\[121b.2\]]gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/_/dga' dad dang bskyed pa ste/_/ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/_/rlung gi drag shul lta bur drag_/drag po lags te drag sel gtsang /_/rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba zhi/_/rgyal 
[\[121b.3\]]ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad/_/lhun po ti se ma la yas/_/spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/_/rin chen rdo rje snying po che/_/sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags/_/rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/_/
[\[121b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa/_/shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/_/rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/_/phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/_/de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/_/rdo rje 
[\[121b.5\]]sems dpas bstod nas ni/_/rdo rje sa gsum dbang mchog smras/_/yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing /_/nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/_/sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong /_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/
[\[121b.6\]]thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/_/sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /_/dri ma kun bral yon tan nges/_/de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/_/phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/_/rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/_/
[\[121b.7\]]mi brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi/_/gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/_/dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin/_/yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/_/sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba/_/'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/_/yon 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]tan mchog ni gang brjod dang /_/dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa/_/sdug bsngal kun las myur du 'grol/_/'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[122a.2\]]pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D882}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dal ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes 
[\[122a.3\]]bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye 
[\[122a.4\]]ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[122a.5\]]gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 
[\[122a.6\]]skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 
[\[122a.7\]]snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[122b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste legs so 
[\[122b.3\]]legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing /_dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig_/o~M ma hA hU~M ma hA bI ra swA hA/_snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom 
[\[122b.4\]]ldan 'das mchod do/_/o~M hrI hU~M pad+ma pri ya swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/_/o~M mai hA rA Na swA hA/_byams pa'i snying po'o/_/o~M A kA sha gar+b+hA ya swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o/_/o~M swA hri rA dza ya swA hA/_
[\[122b.5\]]kun du bzang po'i snying po'o/_/o~M ku ru b+ha na ra ha swA hA/_lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/_/o~M shrI aM ra~M ga swA hA/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/_/o~M ni swA ra~M b+ha swA hA/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/_/o~M k+Shi ti ha 
[\[122b.6\]]rA dza swA hA/_sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[122b.7\]]te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye 
[\[123a.2\]]shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D883}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na hr-i da ya gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/_
[\[123a.3\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[123a.4\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[123a.5\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang /_yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/
[\[123a.6\]]de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/_mdzangs pa/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_mthong na dga' ba/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de yang gcig tu 
[\[123a.7\]]dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_zhib mo brtags pa/_sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_phyug pa/_rdzas mang ba/_yo byad phun sum tshogs 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]pa yin no/_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pas mngon par mchod do/_/na bza' rin 'bum ri 
[\[123b.2\]]ba yang gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas/_zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123b.3\]]sras tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas 
[\[123b.4\]]cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_de rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_zhal zas dang /_yo byad 
[\[123b.5\]]dang /_zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang /_gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123b.6\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123b.7\]]gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod la bab na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/_'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen po 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/_'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs 
[\[124a.2\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so/_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang /_bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom 
[\[124a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so/_/'khor mang po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[124a.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig 
[\[124a.5\]]yod do/_/skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/_zhig pa tsher mas gang ba/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_gyo mos kun du gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang /_mchod rten 
[\[124a.6\]]rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo /_/phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/_/deng ni 
[\[124a.7\]]gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/_/bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyod legs so/_/deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum 
[\[124b.2\]]pa bstan te/_'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[124b.3\]]kyang 'od zer bkye ste/_mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po chen po der zhugs so/_/de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por gyur cing yi chad de 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar/_snying ni 'gul/_rdo 
[\[124b.4\]]rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba 
[\[124b.5\]]gang gis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang ba bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[124b.6\]]chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/_lag na rdo rje 
[\[124b.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so/_/de 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu ji snyed pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang /_spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so/_/lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/_/lag 
[\[125a.2\]]na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor 
[\[125a.3\]]mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/kha cig gis 
[\[125a.4\]]ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/_/kha cig 
[\[125a.5\]]gis ni sa dang po'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa brgyad 
[\[125a.6\]]pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so/_/bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang /_ser sna dang phrag dog 
[\[125a.7\]]dang bral bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]kyang phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phu dud dang /_bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[125b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/_lag na rdo rje des de bzhin 
[\[125b.3\]]gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag 
[\[125b.4\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_phyogs re re'i 
[\[125b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing /_nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_khong du chud par byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[125b.6\]]bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_me tog phreng rgyud dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang /_phyogs re re'i 
[\[125b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_me tog phreng rgyud dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[126a.2\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas/_gcig la gcig 'di skad du/_mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang /_
[\[126a.3\]]gyo mo'i phung bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[126a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi/_'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rin po che'i mchod 
[\[126a.5\]]rten chen po yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur gyi/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am/_'gyes par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[126a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to/_/lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun du spyod pa dang /_sdig pa can 
[\[126a.7\]]dang /_dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas ma yin/_chos ma yin/_dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa bdag kyang skyed par mi byed de/_rgyu de dang rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo/_/lag na rdo rje de'i phyir 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin 
[\[126b.2\]]gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/_mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[126b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/_mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang 
[\[126b.4\]]bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang /_spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig 
[\[126b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/_mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas 
[\[126b.6\]]pa dang /_bkra shis dang char khab kyi gzugs dang dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang /_byin gyis brlabs dang /_bden pa dang /_
[\[126b.7\]]dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang /_bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang /_bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug pa la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[127a.2\]]gnas gang na mchod rten nam/_gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_gnas 
[\[127a.3\]]der srog chags mi srun pa'am/_gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_gcan gzan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_bya mi srun pa dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_byi ba dang /_sre mo dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_bye ba dang /_sbrang ma mchu gsum 
[\[127a.4\]]pa dang /_mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rta bla ba'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_sbrul gdug pas tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der yams kyi nad dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_
[\[127a.5\]]'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_'dre dang /_brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang /_'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_
[\[127a.6\]]lhog pa dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_rkang shu dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing /_mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[127a.7\]]gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_dug gis ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]yin zhing /_me dang chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/_lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[127b.2\]]po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sa phyogs der srung bar byed/_yongs su skyong bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_
[\[127b.3\]]zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]chen po yang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing /_legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po 
[\[127b.4\]]de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo /_/yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo /_/stod par byed/_skor ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[127b.5\]]lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang /_lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa la 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par 
[\[127b.6\]]dgongs pa dang /_byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so/_/mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'i 'am/_rdo'i 'am/_shing gi'am/_dngul gyi'am/_gser gyi'am/_zangs kyi byed pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/_de'i nang du 
[\[127b.7\]]bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/'phang dang /_them skas dang /_kha ran dang /_'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_gdugs dang /_dril bu 'phyang ba dang /_ba dan dang /_dril bu 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten 
[\[128a.2\]]rin po che dang sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang /_mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/_/sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang /_mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag 
[\[128a.3\]]na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di ji lta bur 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i 
[\[128a.4\]]gzungs yin te/_lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang /_
[\[128a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum 
[\[128a.6\]]dag ste/_chos kyi sku dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/_dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kAnAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M b+hu bi b+ha bA na 
[\[128a.7\]]ba re ba tsa Tau/_tsu lu tsu lu/_d+ha re d+ha re/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_d+hA tu d+ha re/_pad+ma gar+b+he/_dza ya ba re/_a tsa le/_sma ra ta thA ga ta/_d+har+m+ma tsakra/_pra bar+t+ta na/_badzra bo d+hi maN+Da a laM kA ra/_a laM kr-i te/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bo 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_bud+d+ha ya bud+d+ha ya/_saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ya/_tsa la tsa la/_tsa laM tu sarba A ba ra NA ni/_sarba pA paM bi ga te/_hu ru hu ru/_sarba sho ka bi ka te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_badzri Ni/_saM b+ha ba saM b+ha ba/_sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye/_d+hA ra Ni mu dre/_bud+d+he/_su 
[\[128b.2\]]bud+d+ha/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_d+hA tu mu dre swA hA/_su pra tiSh+Thi ta/_stu be ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_hU~M hU~M swA hA/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu drA Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi te 
[\[128b.3\]]hu ru hu ru/_hU~M hU~M swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang /_phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[128b.4\]]'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang /_ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[128b.5\]]thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/_mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/_gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 
[\[128b.6\]]'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzungs bshad pa dang /_ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod 
[\[128b.7\]]rten du mngon par 'phags shing /_'phang dang /_legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang /_'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po lag 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]na rdo rje dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[129a.2\]]'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de gtsang de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur 
[\[129a.3\]]cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D884}]@#/_/bod skad du/_shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa 
[\[129a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang /_'dul ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas 
[\[129a.5\]]la/_/phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la/_/mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med/_/spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri 
[\[129a.6\]]rab chen po sna lnga las grub pa/_gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/_rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang /_tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang /_rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyibs kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na/_
[\[129a.7\]]lag na rdo rje dang /_'jam dpal dang /_spyan ras gzigs dang /_byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang /_thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing 
[\[129b.2\]]brjod kyis mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang /_dig pa rnams smra shes pa dang /_theng po 
[\[129b.3\]]rnams dang /_zha bo rnams 'gro zhing yan lag rangs pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang /_dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar ba dang /_gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[129b.4\]]thams cad yid kyi mchod rten chos kyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/_'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to/_/de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[129b.5\]]'das la bla re dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan dang /_gdugs dang /_rnga yab dang /_dril bu dang /_dar dpyangs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dang /_bshos dang /_rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams 
[\[129b.6\]]kyis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[129b.7\]]mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_bris sam/_klog gam/_ming nyan par byed na/_de mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu dang /_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byad par 'gyur ro/_/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o/_/o~M trai ya d+hA sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/_pA baM 
[\[130a.2\]]sarba ta thA ga tas man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA/_rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am/_ras sam/_shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na lha dang mi la 
[\[130a.3\]]sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba dang /_rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam/_mgul du thogs na de lha dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid ri 
[\[130a.4\]]brag gam/_tshal lam/_dgon pa'am/_sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M trai ya d+h+wa sarba ta thA ga ta hr-id ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/_pA paM 
[\[130a.5\]]sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he/_ma hA bi ra dze ra gaM bi ra si/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_bi bi sA ra a a laM swA hA zhes brjod na/_sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid chu'am/_chu bo'am/_mtsho'am/_rgya mtsho la sogs 
[\[130a.6\]]pa gang las rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/o~M trai ya d+hA+e sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/_pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/_bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/_ma hA 
[\[130a.7\]]bi ra dze ra gaM bi ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sA ra a ma ma ki swA hA zhes brjod na/_chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na/_nam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/o~M trai ya d+h+we sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_saM ha ra Na a yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/_pA paM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta/_bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/_ma hA bi ra dze ra gaM bi ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sA ra a a e khaM ya swA hA zhes brjod na/_
[\[130b.2\]]nam mkha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/_phyag bya ba dang /_bskor ba bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang /_sgrib pa thams 
[\[130b.3\]]cad dag par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sa dang /_shing dang /_rdo dang /_'jim pa dang /_'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste/_mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/_o~M rat+na tsai t+ye bany+tsa ye bi bi sA ra swA hA zhes brjod nas ba'i 
[\[130b.4\]]lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/_gang zhig gser dang /_dngul dang /_baiDUr+yal sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang /_shing dang /_kham pa 
[\[130b.5\]]dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs pa ma bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na/_'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa 
[\[130b.6\]]dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/_rdo dang shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/_de gdon mi 
[\[130b.7\]]za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de/_bcu gcig kun du 'od kyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_baiDUr+yal sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/_de gdon 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na bye ba btab kyang 
[\[131a.2\]]gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gong ma bzhin no/_/rig pa chen mo de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_tad+ya thA/_sUk+Sh+me/_sa me sa ma ye/_shAn+te dAn+te/_nir ku le/_ya sho te dzo/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+NA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_a nu mi de swA hA/_
[\[131a.3\]]'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/_/brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/stong 
[\[131a.4\]]btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin 
[\[131a.5\]]gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten brtsigs pa'i gnas sam/_mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/_mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i 
[\[131a.6\]]gnas der sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang /_dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/_thig skud la rig pa chen po'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/_o~M badzra sU tra hU~M phaT ces brjod nas thig 
[\[131a.7\]]skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam ran pa dang /_'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa bcad/_de bzhin du sa bcad nas gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/_oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+TaM hU~M phaT ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te/_rdo rje phur bur dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhir gdab po/_/de bzhin du btab na mi dang mi ma yin pa las bsrung bar 'gyur 
[\[131b.2\]]ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go/_/de nas til dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_o~M a mr-i te ha na ha na 
[\[131b.3\]]hU~M phaT ces lan bdun bzlas te/_sa'i phyogs su gtor bas sa'i phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur/_de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/_bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa 
[\[131b.4\]]las mtshams bcad de/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/_bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na/_sa phyogs 
[\[131b.5\]]de yang shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o/_/o~M badzra kha na kha na hU~M phaT ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na/_de 
[\[131b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma gcig tu bzhag nas/_sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste 
[\[131b.7\]]brdung ngo /_/badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT ces lan bdun bzlas te/_rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba ni spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]phyag rgyas gtugs te/_spos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par dmigs te/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/_spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i 
[\[132a.2\]]rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas/_de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di 
[\[132a.3\]]brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra bra marda nA ya hU~M phaT ces lan bdun brjod de/_'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni/_'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i 
[\[132a.4\]]phyag rgya bcings te/_rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sUk+Sh+me/_sUk+Sh+me/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_ni rA ku le/_ya sho ya sho ba ti te dzo shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/_sarba ta thA ga tA/_a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_A na mo te hi te swA hA zhes 
[\[132a.5\]]bdag nyid kyis rig pa chen mo 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can 
[\[132a.6\]]thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs 
[\[132a.7\]]so/_/de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe/_rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/_o~M badzra A yuShe swA hA zhes lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs na/_'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]khyab ste/_'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgang ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas 'bi 
[\[132b.2\]]'bi'i nang du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/_gro ga'am/_ras sam/_shog shog gam/_shing shun la sngags bris pa dang /_de'i nang du rigs lnga so so'i snying po/_o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHaH/_de rnams phrugs su sbyar te/_mu dra'i phyag 
[\[132b.3\]]rgyar byas pa'am/_yi ger bris ba'am/_gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra gar+b+he swA hA zhes bya ba bzlas na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[132b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas tsai t+ya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/_til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA zhes 
[\[132b.5\]]lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra mut+ga ra A 
[\[132b.6\]]ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po gong nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel 
[\[132b.7\]]ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten phor bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo /_/o~M d+harma d+hA tu ye swA hA/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes rab 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gnyis su med par 'brel ba las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byam klas pa 'byung ste/_'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas 
[\[133a.2\]]mchod rten snod nas phyung ba la 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M pra ma Na ye swA hA zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[133a.3\]]shar bu dang /_dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/_'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten na bza' 
[\[133a.4\]]gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to/_/o~M d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te swA hA zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 
[\[133a.5\]]'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/_stong ngam/_gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni sa'am/_rdo'am/_shing la sogs 
[\[133a.6\]]pa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te/_'og gi khri yang seng ge'i khri'am/_rin po che'i khri'am/_pad+ma'i khri stegs su byas la/_de'i steng du go ma yaM dang /_spos chus chag chag btab ste/_dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa 
[\[133a.7\]]kun du gur gum dang /_tsan+dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/_srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor bri ba yang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]brgya 'am/_stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o/_/mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o/_/de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs 
[\[133b.2\]]pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol lo/_/o~M su pra tiSh+Tha stu pe swA hA zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni/_dang po dbus 
[\[133b.3\]]su dgod/_de nas shar du dgod/_de nas lhor dgod/_de nas nub tu dgod/_de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/_/dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra pad+mA sa ya ye swA hA zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo 
[\[133b.4\]]rje dang pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la/_sa gzhi dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rgya mtsho'i mjing thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/_
[\[133b.5\]]spos dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/_mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni/_zhi ba'i dkar po/_rgyas pa'i ser po/_dbang gi dmar po/_bsrung ba'i ljang gur dmigs te/_na bza' yang de de bzhin du 
[\[133b.6\]]gsol la/_yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ra~M dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_hU~M ra~M swA hA zhes lan gsum bzlas pas 
[\[133b.7\]]de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am/_
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]brgya'am/_stong ngam/_gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_o~M a tsan+d+re maN+Dal hU~M phaT ces grangs ji tsam ran par bzlas na/_mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re 
[\[134a.2\]]rer 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/_bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/_snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa 
[\[134a.3\]]ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/_sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing /_sems can gyi khams thams cad du byin 
[\[134a.4\]]gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas/_slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni/_mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas/_mchod 
[\[134a.5\]]rten gyi steng du reg par byas la/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i 
[\[134a.6\]]gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste bzhag nas/_de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_'bras chan dang /_spyan gzigs sna 
[\[134a.7\]]tshogs dang 'dra zhing dgod pa dang /_bla re dang /_'phan dang /_gdugs dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos dang /_mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams rnam par dag par sbyang ba'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M sarba pU dza 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]puSh+pe swA hA zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas/_kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing /_char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga 
[\[134b.2\]]po cha re res mchod cing /_yon du dar bu chung dang /_'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang /_gdugs bu chung yang rung ste re re dbul lo/_/de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar 
[\[134b.3\]]rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang /_rgyan dang /_cha lugs dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgongs te dmigs par bya'o/_/ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba/_de dag bum pa'i dbus 
[\[134b.4\]]su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snying po dang /_rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dang zhing 'tsher ba cig tu dmigs la/_de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[134b.5\]]sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mthas klas shing /_chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad cing /_re ba bskang nas slar 'dus te/_de nyid kyi 
[\[134b.6\]]dbu'i gtsug dang thugs kar phog_/'phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/_dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang /_dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i ar+g+has gsol to/_/ar+g+ha'i phyag 
[\[134b.7\]]rgya bcings la/_de'i steng du dung phor bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/_mchod pa dbul ba'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]o~M a ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA zhes bzlas nas/_dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas/_'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/_/de 
[\[135a.2\]]nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing /_phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigs so/_/de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklag cing /_lan ci mang du brjod par byas la bsngo ba dang smon 
[\[135a.3\]]lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi bde na rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa mnyams par bya ste/_mchod rten dang /_mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag 
[\[135a.4\]]par dgongs te/_mchod rten btab na yang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste 'gal ba med do/_/de bzhin du ma gyur na yang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin 
[\[135a.5\]]te/_mchod rten de de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhung 
[\[135a.6\]]las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo /_/rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi/_/sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing /_/dgongs pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas/_/mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams/_/btab kyang rdzogs par yong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[135a.7\]]zhes 'byung ngo /_/gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni/_ji skad du/_mchod rten cho ga dam pa 'di/_/bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni/_/gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis/_/gcig 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]btab bye ba btab dang 'dra/_/yun ring dus nas 'khor ba yi/_/mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams/_/ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang /_/tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/tshe rabs gzhan du skye ba na/_/rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang /_/
[\[135b.2\]]longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye/_/tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur/_/dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du/_/dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing /_/bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod/_/bsam pa yongs su 
[\[135b.3\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D885}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni bi pu la bi mA na su pra tiSh+Thi ta gu h+ya 
[\[135b.4\]]pa ra ma ha s+ya ka lA rA dzA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[135b.5\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/_dpyod pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa thams cad dang /_mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul 
[\[135b.6\]]nas pham par mdzad de/_'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo 
[\[135b.7\]]rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/_sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing /_mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas 
[\[136a\]]
