[\[157a.4\]]dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_gang dang gang du skyes pa der thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sku gzugs rgyas pa chen po'i le'u ste cho ga lnga 
[\[157a.5\]]pa'o//_//don kun sgrub par byed pa yi/_/sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/_/sems can kun gyi bde thob pa/_/zhi ba yi ni las brtsam mo/_/rig pa 'dzin pas gsang bya ste/_/nges par tshangs par spyod pa yis/_/sems can thams cad yid dga' ba'i/_/de 
[\[157a.6\]]nas sbyin sreg dag bya'o/_/o~M swA hA pa ti b+hUr b+hu bA hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_sngags 'dis til dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar las sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad 
[\[157a.7\]]dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba thams cad rmugs par byas par 'gyur/_rengs par byas par 'gyur/_rmongs par byas bar 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/gu gul dang /_yungs kar dang /_
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gdon thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur/_'byung bo thams cad kyis gnod pa byas pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_rims nad la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang /_
[\[157b.2\]]yungs kar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/_/sa bon bdug pa dang /_mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pas 'jigs skrag pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sgron shing dang mar 
[\[157b.3\]]las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ci 'dod pa de byed do/_/gang dang gang slangs pa de dang de 'thob po/_/ri khar sra tsi bog dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar las sbyin sreg byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 
[\[157b.4\]]'gyur/_rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar dang /_til mar dang /_nA ga ge sar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ci bsgo ba byed do/_/dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/phyin chad ser ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[157b.5\]]kha zas las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'bru stong du 'phel zhing mang por 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad lhags nas/_rje btsun srog dang ma da bral cig dang /_bka' ci stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/'bras 
[\[157b.6\]]dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma la kha bltas te na le sham las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na de la lha thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/dpal thams cad thob 
[\[157b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo'i mdun du til dang /_yungs kar las sbyin sreg byas na nor mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/shing ar ka'i yam sreg shing dang mar las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 
[\[158a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di'i mthus bde ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur/_byad thams cad dang /_bcings pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs te sbyin 
[\[158a.3\]]sreg gi las rnams kyis mchog tu zhi bar byed do/_/bde ba rab tu sbyin par byed/_nor thob par byed/_don grub par byed cing lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i sems can thams cad nyams par byed do/_/sbyin sreg grub pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste cho ga drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[158a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yin/_'di ni yon tan khyad par chen po can yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum yin/_'di ni de 
[\[158a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[158a.6\]]kyi chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gang na yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pham par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dam pa yin/_
[\[158a.7\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen yin/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa 'jig pa yin/_'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]kyi dmyal ba thams cad skems pa yin/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten zlog pa yin/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa yin no/_/'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre 
[\[158b.2\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams skems par byed pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'on kyang bsod nams kyi phung po 'byung ba lha'i mig gis blta ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ste/_
[\[158b.3\]]yon tan gyi khyad par de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab pa/_rab mchog gya nom pa la sogs pa de ltar gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib 
[\[158b.4\]]mo'i rgyal po 'di ni sems can skal ba chung ba rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/_thos par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur/_'chang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba de'i lag 
[\[158b.5\]]tu mchog tu gsang ba 'di 'ong ba'am/_nyan pa'am/_bsnyen bkur byed pa'am/_'dzin par lta ga la 'gyur/_lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste/_lag na rdo rje gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang 
[\[158b.6\]]gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams la bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims mal dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_
[\[158b.7\]]bcibs pa dang /_pho brang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyi ma re re 'bul zhing /_de bzhin du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]byed pa dang /_gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis byur bur bkang ste/_nyi ma re rer sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/_lag na rdo rje gang gis de bzhin 
[\[159a.2\]]gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di lan cig bzlas brjod byas na bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig dran par 
[\[159a.3\]]gyur na/_de gong du bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur/_mkho ba'i yo byad khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la de ltar nyin gcig bzhin mchod par 'gyur 
[\[159a.4\]]ro/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis/_a la la zhes ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra cher 
[\[159a.5\]]bton nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma'o sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lags so/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin 
[\[159a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gshegs so/_/'phags 
[\[159a.7\]]pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ste bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA gar+b+ha pra b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D886}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya puSh+pa kU Ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[159b.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[159b.3\]]tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba/_thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/_de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas 
[\[159b.4\]]dbang bskur ba/_go cha chen po bgos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshom med pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[159b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[159b.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge 
[\[159b.7\]]rnam par rtse la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par rtse khyod de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa/_shes rab dpag tu med pa/_rnam par grol dpag tu med pa/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa ste/_seng ge rnam par rtse gang gi phyir de bzhin 
[\[160a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa de yang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/_/seng ge rnam par rtse gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /_yongs su 
[\[160a.3\]]mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge rnam par 
[\[160a.4\]]rtse yang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas sems dad par gyur la/_dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang /_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad dang /_bde bar 
[\[160a.5\]]sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas shing /_ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed la/_rim gror byas pa dang /_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa mnyam par shes par bya ste/_
[\[160a.6\]]bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba med do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul bar phul ba 
[\[160a.7\]]bas byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas kAr+ShA pa Na gcig tsam dbul bar phul la/_phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_bskrun pa dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/_lo brgya'am/_
[\[160b.2\]]lo stong yang rung ste/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 
[\[160b.3\]]'bul lam/_chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/_byug pa'i thig le 'dri'am/_me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/_byug pa 'bul lam/_sbos 'bul lam/_me tog 'bul lam/_bdug spos 'bul lam/_phreng ba 'bul lam/_rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul 
[\[160b.4\]]lam/_gdugs 'bul lam/_dril bu 'bul lam/_dbyangs pa 'bul lam/_rgyal mtshan 'bul lam/_ba dan 'bul lam/_dar 'bul lam/_mar me 'bul zhing /_phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[160b.5\]]ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba de dag ni/_seng ge rnam par rtse bskal par ram/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong du'am/_bskal pa 'bum du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/_'di la dogs pa'am/_yid gnyis 
[\[160b.6\]]sam/_the tsom za bar mi bya'o/_/seng ge rnam par rtse me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de 
[\[160b.7\]]bshad par bya'o/_/seng ge rnam par rtse gang la la zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang dam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_de 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur/_dal ba rnyed par 'gyur/_nam du yang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_
[\[161a.2\]]nam du yang byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur/_spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_
[\[161a.3\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hA ra NI/_d+hA ra NI/_mu ni pra b+ha swa re/_sid+d+he tsaN+De nA matsi nir+hiri/_a ro ga ba ti/_bud+d+ha ma ti d+hair+ye/_o~M ka ra te/_ga ga ra te/_rA dzA ba ti/_te dzo 
[\[161a.4\]]ba ti/_bi pu la bud+d+he/_d+harma a ba b+hA se/_ak+Sha ya kalbe/_kalpa ba ti/_a mr-i ta kalbe hU tA sha ne/_te dzo ba ti/_nir+ya si hi te/_te dzo gra b+hA/_tiSh+thi na dra ya tiSh+ThI na dra ye bud+d+hi swA hA/_seng ge rnam par rtse gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di'i ming dang /_yi ge 
[\[161a.5\]]dang /_tshig mtha' dag shes te/_kun chub par byed pa des dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dang /_dbyar zla ra ba dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bsam zhing /_de 
[\[161a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/_bcom ldan 'das la spos dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 
[\[161a.7\]]rab tu thob par 'gyur/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_blo dang ldan par 'gyur/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa thams cad dang /_bstan bcos thams cad dang /_
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bzo thams cad dang /_las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems las rnam par dag par 'gyur te 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni ma gtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[161b.2\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[161b.3\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D887}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ma hI n+d+ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i 
[\[161b.4\]]gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang 
[\[161b.5\]]ldan pa na bzhugs te/_de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[161b.6\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[161b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags na/_gang gis bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od kyis bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na de'i phyir kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi 
[\[162a.2\]]snying po 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_a mo da ni/_pra mo da ni/_bi mo da ni/_saM mo da ni/_pri yaM ka ra Ni/_shrI ka ra Ni/_shrA ka ra Ni/_bo d+hi ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ras+yaM samyak+saM bud+d+ha ka 
[\[162a.3\]]ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra Ar+ya ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra pradz+nyA ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/_a nun+ta ra sarba kle sho pa kle sha bi d+hA ra Ni/_a pa d+yA na d+ha ka ra bid+ha ma ni/_a nut+ta ra bid+yA a lo kot+pA da ni/_a nut+ta shai k+Sha shI la bid+yA tsa ra Na/_bi muk+ti gu Na ga Na/_saM b+ha d+ha ni/_u nut+ta ra 
[\[162a.4\]]sarba ku sha la/_mU lo d+b+ho da ni/_a nu t+ta ri b+ho na mU la ni/_a nut+ta dA ra ga do Sha/_mo ha na mU la ni/_a nut+ta ra shaik+Sha ma na/_a bid+yA/_an+ta ka rA bid+ha ma ni/_a nut+ta rA sI a pra ti ha ta ba la tsakra/_a nut+ta rA sarba lA ra ba bi drA ma ni/_twaM hi b+ha dre/_a nut+ta 
[\[162a.5\]]rA ba la b+ha dra/_su b+ha dra/_shrI b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra b+ha dra/_sa man+ta b+ha dra/_a sa ma sa ma b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se pi tA/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha a nu brta nI/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma de shi kA_/a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha/_d+harma ko Sha/_
[\[162a.6\]]sa~M bAr+d+hi kA/_a nut+ta ra ma hA bu ru Sha nirbA Na/_a nut+ta pra tar+Shi k+Sha/_twaM hi b+ha dre/_gang gA si ta pak+Shu/_samyak+saM bud+d+he A se bi tA/_b+hA bi tA ba hu lI kro d+ha/_stu ta/_stau bi ta bar+Ni tA pra sha sta/_bu 'di ni kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/_de bas na bu khyed kyis kun du 
[\[162a.7\]]'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba na yang yid la gyis shig_/bu gang la la zhig kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ming dang /_rigs dang /_rigs kyi bye brag gang yid la byed dam/_skyes pa'am/_bud med 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo'am/_lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci mo'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_
[\[162b.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_lung 'bog gam/_ston tam/_'chad na de tshe rabs bdun gyi 
[\[162b.3\]]bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/_/lhar gyur kyang rung mir gyur kyang rung ste/_de mtshon cha'am/_dug gam/_chu'am/_mes bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par 
[\[162b.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[162b.5\]]ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag 
[\[162b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang 
[\[162b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bram ze sa'i 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu 
[\[163a.2\]]chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D888}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzungs chen po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[163a.3\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[163a.4\]]te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer gnas bcas su dbyar gnas dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang chos gos byas te/_chos gos zin nas lhung bzed dang chas gos thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[163a.5\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_stobs 
[\[163a.6\]]dang /_gzi brjid kyi phyir gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/chongs shig_/long shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/yid la zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags gzhi 
[\[163a.7\]]rnams ni rnyed par dka' zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yang rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir te/_dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog lta bu yin gyis/_zung shig_/chongs shig_/long shig_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]lhogs shig_/yid la zungs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la 'dzin tam/_kun 
[\[163b.2\]]chub bar byed na de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug gis ma yin/_mes ma yin/_chus ma yin/_rgyal pos chad pas ma yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_rlung lha 
[\[163b.3\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /_smyo byed dang /_gnon po 
[\[163b.4\]]dang /_grib gnon dang /_gshed byed dang /_gnod byed dang /_byad kyis mi tshugs/_de la mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs/_de la rig pa'i las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kyis mi tshugs/_de la rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis 
[\[163b.5\]]pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_'byung po'i rims dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur ba dang /_'dus pa las gyur pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la

[\[163b.7\]]'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/_nga yang da ltar 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed 
[\[164a.2\]]na/_de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_an+te/_ban+d+he/_k+Sha me/_k+Sha ma me/_d+hA na se/_ba da ne/_a da ne/_
[\[164a.3\]]hu le/_ma hA hu le/_ta ka re gaM b+hI re/_duSh+pu ste/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang 
[\[164a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/_nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_
[\[164a.5\]]klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed na/_de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_aT+Te/_baT+Te/_
[\[164a.6\]]ag+ge/_bag+ge/_Thag+ge/_Thag+ge/_d+hak+ke/_d+hA ra d+hak+ke/_Ta ke Ta ra ke/_a ka si/_sa ka si/_ma ka si/_i li mi li/_ti li mi li/_rau ra be/_ma hA rau ra be/_b+hU taM ga me b+hU ta pa rA ya Ne/_ti mi gi se/_ma hA ti mi ge se/_saM b+hA be/_ma hA saM b+hA be/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs 
[\[164a.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/_nga yang da lta na 'chad cing 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chad pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi 
[\[164b.2\]]bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_ru le/_ma hA ru le/_he he ri/_mat+ta ri/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_kun dga' bo dad 
[\[164b.3\]]pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po la bsrung ba'am/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba 
[\[164b.4\]]dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_nam mkha' bcing ba dang /_sa bcing ba byas te/_de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa ba yang skye bar 'gyur/_yal ga dang /_lo 
[\[164b.5\]]ma dang /_lcug ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yang skye bar 'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/kun dga' bo nyi zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar 
[\[164b.6\]]mthu che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni sa la ltung yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo ri'i rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yo yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/_'di ltar rgya che la 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba bzhi po 'di dag ni 
[\[164b.7\]]skams shing yongs su zad de mthar thug par 'gyur yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/_chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang srid/_me ni tsha ba 'dor ba yang srid/_rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang srid kyi/_gzungs chen po'i gsang 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni slu mi srid do/_/kun dga' bo lha'am/_klu'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_rlung lha'am/_dri za'am/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[165a.2\]]sam/_sha za'am/_grul bum mam/_srul po'am/_lus srul po'am/_'byung po'am/_bram ze'am/_srin po'am/_grib gnon nam/_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/_gzhan su yang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 
[\[165a.3\]]kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/_tad+ya thA/_ag+gi le/_tsag+gi le/_bal+le/_mal+le/_o hA ni/_mo hA ni/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 
[\[165a.4\]]'khor lo 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gems so/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rnam thos kyi bu yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/_rab 
[\[165a.5\]]tu 'bar ba kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gems so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar 
[\[165a.6\]]ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[165a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]po dzi ni mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D889}]@##/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun 
[\[165b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ha na ha na swA ni/_na ba sA ni/_
[\[165b.3\]]dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/_tsa la tsa la ne/_purbo/_yo ga ma nu sma ra phaT/_ma hA ha ta ya swA hA/_gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs 
[\[165b.4\]]so//[ {D890}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tri pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[165b.5\]]oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/_shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a dzi te/_a dzi te/_a pa rA dzi te/_a dzi tan dza ya/_ha ra ha ra/_mai tri a ba lo ki te/_ka ra ka ra/_ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+he/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da bI dze/_sma ra sma ra/_
[\[165b.6\]]A sma kaM sa ma ya/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so/_/o~M mo hi mo hi/_ma hA mo hi swA hA/_snying po'o/_o~M mu ni mu ni sma ra swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la 
[\[165b.7\]]sems pa dang /_sgom pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/_bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bgyi'o/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/_de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/_/'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar 
[\[166a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gi dri mas mi gos so/_/ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/_/lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub 
[\[166a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/_/nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/_de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/_/'phags 
[\[166a.4\]]pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba/_dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[166a.5\]{D891}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya A pa ra Na bi skaM b+hi nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgrib pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la 
[\[166a.6\]]phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i snying po 'di lan bdun brjod na/_lus brgyud pa'i 
[\[166a.7\]]sdig pa thams cad 'byang zhing 'chi ba'i dus su bde ba nyid du dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM shwe ta wa ra bi dza li ne swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i snying po 'di nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun brjod na las brgyud mar bsags pa'i 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]sdig pa thams cad 'byang zhing 'chi ba'i dus su gnad gcod pa'i sdug bsngal drag po mi 'byung ngo /_/bde ba nyid du dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM sarba A ba ra Na bi skaM b+hi ne swA hA/_sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa de dag rnams la bshos gtsang la sogs pa'i mchod pas 
[\[166b.2\]]yang dag par mchod na yang gang zag de 'chi ba'i dus su nad dang zug rngu dang bral te/_bde ba nyid du dus byed cing /_tshe 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum mam/_'thab bral lam/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye zhing /_bde ba nyid du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[166b.3\]]pha dang dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen mas/_/dus tshigs gza' skar ma brtsis shing /_/khrus dang gtsang sbra ma byas kyang /_/rig pa la ni gnas pas 'grub/_/gang dag mos pa med 'gyur bas/_/'grub nyid du ni yong mi 'gyur/_/de bas shin tu

[\[166b.5\]]gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te d+harma d+hA tu ni gardzi ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na mo many+dzu shri ye/_ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M dz+nyA nA lo ke/_tri rat+na paM sha

[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi

[\[167a.3\]{D893}]@##/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[167a.7\]]pa tsa pa tsa/_ma ta ma ta/_ma tha ma tha/_bid+h+wan+sa ya/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_ka ra ka ra/_tru Ta tru Ta/_bany+dza bany+dza/_a b+hi sa a b+hi sa/_tu Ta tu Ta/_tru Ta tru Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_hr-i da ya baM d+ha ni/_na maHsaM bo d+ha ni/_pra b+he sa pra b+he sa/_lo ta lo ta/_kr-i da kr-i da/_kr-i Ta kr-i Ta/_ha 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]sa ha sa/_pra ban+d+ha/_pra ban+d+ha/_A bi sha A bi sha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gang zhig gis nam phyed na lan gsum brjod/_nyi ma la yang lan bdun brjod pa byas na rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams kyi sh+lo ka sum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i cho ga

[\[167b.5\]{D895}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+haT+TA ra ka s+ya pradz+nyA bud+d+hi bar+d+ha na nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo many+dzu shri ye ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/_tad+ya

[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing /_nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom

[\[168a.7\]]pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]shAkya thub pa ri po Ta la'i steng /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang rin po che bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor na nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis 'khor bar 
[\[168b.2\]]bkod cing dpyangs pa la bzhugs te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas kun 'dzin ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_
[\[168b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman mngon par 'phags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[168b.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems
