[\[168b.6\]]kyi rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/_/gzhan yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa'i sa bcu spyad pa tshad med grangs med pa dag dang thabs cig ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 
[\[168b.7\]]tshangs ris kyi lha tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu k+ShaN+Da ma ra ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha dang lha'i bu tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu kuM b+ha ka ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i rgyal po 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_
[\[169a.2\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_klu'i rgyal po chen po ri'i dpal ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig ces bya ba ni gtso mor 
[\[169a.3\]]gyur to/_/gzhan yang nam mkha'i lha dang /_chu bo dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha dang /_chu mig gi lha dang /_chu klung gi lha dang /_sman gyi lha dang /_ljon shing gi lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_khang khyim gyi lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_me'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_
[\[169a.4\]]sa'i lha dang /_ri'i lha dang /_gzhal med khang la sogs pa'i lha tshad med pa snyed kyang so so nas 'dus shing lhags par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du gsang ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'od zer bkye bas 
[\[169a.5\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to/_/lha'i gzhal med khang rnams dang /_klu'i khang khyim rnams dang /_lha'i gtso bo rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang rab tu 
[\[169a.6\]]g.yos par gyur/_chu bo dang /_mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_ri khor yug dang /_ri rab lhun po dang /_sa'i ri dang /_ri nag po rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_nor bu dang /_me dang /_rgyu skar dang /_gza'i 'od rnams kyang 
[\[169a.7\]]zil gyis mnan te mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal pos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang /_sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/_bcom 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di dag sus bkye lags zhes gsol nas/_tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/_deng ni su zhig mngon par sangs rgyas na/_/'di ltar 'od zer chen po rab bkye bas/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gser gyi mdog tu gyur/_/stong 
[\[169b.2\]]chen 'jig rten khams kyang de bzhin lags/_/deng ni su zhig rang dbang thob gyur na/_/ya mtshan rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu bkye nas/_/mtha' med sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab g.yos shing /_/lha klu gzhal med khang rnams mi bder gyur/_/su yi mthu lags rgyu rkyen ma 
[\[169b.3\]]rtogs pas/_/'khor mang 'di dag the tshom 'tshal gyur na/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po yis/_/rdzu 'phrul 'di yi rgyu rkyen bkas bshad gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[169b.4\]]khyed kyis 'di rig par bya ste/_deng 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod pa de sngon bskal ba tshad med pa nas byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs par 
[\[169b.5\]]gyur pa/_gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa snyed shin tu bsgoms shing mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pas/_sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir gsang ste 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[169b.6\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje 
[\[169b.7\]]chen po'i sems zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags mchis te/_sems can mang po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang /_bro nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyug cing 'byor pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]ba'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su sbyang zhing bsal ba dang /_sgrib pa'i bgegs rnams dang 'bral ba dang /_chos dkar po'i yon tan thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_/dge ba'i sa bon thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi ba 
[\[170a.2\]]dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang /_re ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng bshad par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[170a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags bshad par 'dod pas deng dus la bab kyis myur du smros shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nga dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su 
[\[170a.4\]]thugs dgyes par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/_sngon byung ba'i bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe 
[\[170a.5\]]de'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od stong gi rgyal po zhi bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs 
[\[170a.6\]]su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal nas/_phyag gser gyi kha dog can gyis bdag gi spyi bo la byugs te 'di skad ces/_rigs kyi bu khyod thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di zung shig dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan pa'i sems can thams cad la 
[\[170a.7\]]phan pa dang bde ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/bdag de'i tshe gdod sa dang po la gnas pa las rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa tsam gyis sa brgyad pa las yang dag par 'das par gyur lags so/_/bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na sems rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa'i slad du smon lam 'di skad du btab lags te/_gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid pa'i 'os su 'gyur yang dag pa zhig lags na deng bdag gi lus 'di nyid las lag pa stong dang /_mig stong tshang bar 'byung 
[\[170b.2\]]bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las sug pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar byung bar gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'od zer bkye bas bdag gi lus la 
[\[170b.3\]]reg cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar bgyis par gyur lags so/_/deng slan cad sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dag tu gzungs 'di yang dang yang du thos shing mngon sum du yang 
[\[170b.4\]]dag par blangs pa dang /_gzhan yang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rangs pa tshad ma mchis pa bskyed pas bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba phra mo las yang dag par 'das par gyur lags so/_/deng slan cad gzungs 'di rtag par 'don 
[\[170b.5\]]cing yongs su bzung nas nam du yang mi bskyud par bgyis pa'i slad du skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skyes pas mngal du skye ba'i lus blangs par ma gyur lags so/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge 
[\[170b.6\]]bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang la la zhig 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/_dang po kho nar bdag la smon lam 'di skad gdab par bgyi lags so/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la 
[\[170b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis sems 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du shes 
[\[171a.2\]]rab gru yis sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog_/
[\[171a.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la 
[\[171a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog_/bdag ni ral gri ri la 'dzeg_/ral gri ri ni rang rnyil shog_/bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na/_/chu tshan me mur rang zhi shog_/sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/_/sems can dmyal ba rang skams 
[\[171a.5\]]shog_/bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas song na/_/bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog_/bdag ni lha min gnas song na/_/ngan sems rang ni dul bar shog_/bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/_/rang nyid shes rab che thob shog_/de skad du smon lam btab nas sems 
[\[171a.6\]]rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rjes su dran par bgyis na/_de'i rjes la gzungs sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar 'don par bgyid na bskal pa 
[\[171a.7\]]'bum phrag brgyad stong snyed du 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshig 'di 'don cing 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]'dzin par bgyid na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'tshal ba ci ltar smon pa bzhin du de dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[171b.2\]]'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan 'gro gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[171b.3\]]thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnams su skye bar ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin 
[\[171b.4\]]dang spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na snying rje chen 
[\[171b.5\]]po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/_mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[171b.6\]]sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas gal te bud med kyi dngos po las yongs su gyur te/_skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na 
[\[171b.7\]]gdon mi 'tshal bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/_/sems can gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang dkor 'phrog cing chud gson pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du byung ba dag la 'gyod pas 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]mthol zhing bshags na yang 'byang zhing tshangs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di bton pa tsam gyis de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ba lags te/_dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal zas dang /_
[\[172a.2\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor 'phrog cing chud gson pa de dag ni phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyan sngar bshags na gdod yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags la/_thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i ston pa 
[\[172a.3\]]rnams der gshegs nas dbang mdzad par 'gyur bas kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /_gang zag la skur pa btab pa dang /_chos la skur pa btab pa dang /_gso 
[\[172a.4\]]sbyong bshig pa dang /_tshul khrims bshig pa dang /_mchod rten bshig pa dang /_gtsug lag khang bshig pa thams cad dang /_dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa sun par bgyis pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sdig pa'i 
[\[172a.5\]]las lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/rig sngags 'di la the tshom 'tshal ba'i dngos po gcig ni ma gtogs te/_the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na tha na kha na ma tho ba chung ngu'i las yang ba tsam yang yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba 
[\[172a.6\]]lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_kha na ma tho ba lci ba dag yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub kyi ring ba'i rgyu ni bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la 
[\[172a.7\]]la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi rig sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar len par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba de yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]de bkres pas nyon mongs te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kho na mchis pa'i dgra'i sug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_g.yul ngor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_stag dang spyang ki dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i khar 
[\[172b.2\]]'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang rtsangs pa dang sdig pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_chab dang zhugs kyi nang du 'bying zhing tshig ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_dug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_byad stems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_smyos 
[\[172b.3\]]nas dran pa nyams te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ri dang /_ljon shing dang ngam grog dang g.yangs nas lhung ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi ma rungs pa'i byad kyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_log pa'i 'dre gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed de 'chi ba'i dus bgyid 
[\[172b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_nad ngan pas lus la dkris te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_cha ma lags pas bdag nyid la gnod pa bgyis te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags te/_thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin 
[\[172b.5\]]par bgyid pa de dag ni gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po thob par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_skye ba thams cad du rgyal po dge ba dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par 
[\[172b.6\]]yul dge bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par dus bzang po dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par lus kyi dbang po tshang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lam gyi sems la goms par 'gyur ba 
[\[172b.7\]]dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims nyams par mi bgyid pa dang /_'khor rnams drin gyis 'dris shing 'dum par 'gyur ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par gzhan gyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]dang /_yo byad bdog pa rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid la smon pa rnams bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dge ba rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba dang /_skye ba thams 
[\[173a.2\]]cad du sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag pa'i chos thos nas don zab mo rtogs par 'gyur ba dag lags te/_lha'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyis gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa gang lags 
[\[173a.3\]]pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyur bas/_lha dang /_mi thams cad kyis rtag par bton nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste le lo bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras 
[\[173a.4\]]nas/_'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/_'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gya 
[\[173a.5\]]nom pa 'di dag smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba ban+d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_sarba pA ya sa mu dro ts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba 
[\[173a.6\]]i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/_sarba b+ha ye Shu tA ra Na ka rA ya/_tas+ya/_na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da ya/_mA brta yiSh+yA mi/_sarbA r+tha sA d+hAnAM/_shu b+ha tse ta nAM/_sarba b+hA tA nAM/_pA pa mA rga bi sho d+ha kaM/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[173a.7\]]A lo ke_/a d+hi pa ti/_lo ka a ti krAn+te/_e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA sma ra hr-id yan/_e h+ye hi Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ra Ni ka ku ru ku ru/_karma sA d+hA ya sA d+ha 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ya/_bi d+yA na de hi de hi/_me a raM ga maM ga ma bi haM ga ma/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra du hu du hu bIr+ya n+te ma hA bI r+yan+te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha re n+de shwa ra/_tsa la tsa la/_bi ma la/_mUrte Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_dzi na kr-iSh+Na dza TA mu ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_laM ba pra la~M 
[\[173b.2\]]ba bi laM ba/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/_ba la ba la ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la ma hA ma la/_tsa la tsa la ma hA tsa la/_kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/_kriSh+Na bak+Sha/_kr-iSh+Na pA sha nirgA ta na he pad+ma ha sta/_tsa ra tsa ra nish+tsa re shwa re kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/_e h+ye hi ma hA bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra 
[\[173b.3\]]da ha ne shwa ra/_nA rA ya Na ba la rU pa be Sha d+ha ra/_he nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA ha la ha la/_bi Sha nir+dz+dza ta/_lo ka s+ya/_rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha naM/_dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha naM/_mo ha gi Sha bi nA sha naM/_ni rmok+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_mu hu mu hu/_rA hu la rA hu la/_
[\[173b.4\]]ha la ha lA hA re ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ta ma hA siM ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ma hAT+TAT+Ta hA s+ya/_e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA 
[\[173b.5\]]sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra b+ha Na b+ha Na bA tsa sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi d+yAM sma ra sma ra twaM/_he b+ha ga ban+tA lo ka bi lo ka twaM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_da dA hi me daR+sha na kA ma s+ya dar+sha nAM/_pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/_sid d+hA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ShA ya 
[\[173b.6\]]swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hastA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma 
[\[173b.7\]]ha stA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shaM kha shab+da ni bo d+ha nA ya swA hA/_bA ma skan d+ha de sha s+thi kr-iSh+NA dzi nA ya swA hA/_bA ma ha sta byA g+h+ra tsar ma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/_lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_sarba sid+d+hi shwa rA ya swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_ku ru rak+Sha mu drA NAM swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pA dA ni swA hA/_byang 
[\[174a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab par gyur/_phyogs 
[\[174a.3\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par gyur/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams ni 'jigs shing dngangs nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur/_'khor 'dus pa mang po thams cad las kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 
[\[174a.4\]]gyur/_kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni sa dang po dang sa gnyis pa dang sa gsum pa 
[\[174a.5\]]dang sa bzhi pa dang sa lnga pa thob pa nas sa bcu'i bar du thob par gyur/_sems can tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/_gos tshags bcos nas gus par thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub 
[\[174a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu chen po legs so/_/bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa tshad med pa snyed dag tu chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_gzungs rnam pa sna 
[\[174a.7\]]tshogs thos par gyur mod kyi/_sngon chad nam yang thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs chen mo'i rig sngags kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos par ma gyur na/_skyes bu chen po khyod kyis bdag la gzungs 'di'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]bshad du gsol/_bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams shin tu thos par mos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la smras pa/_lha'i rgyal po khyod thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir 
[\[174b.2\]]de skad du dris pa yin pas/_deng khyod legs par nyon cig dang bdag gis khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_de ni snying rje chen po'i sems yin/_mnyam pa'i sems yin/_'dus 
[\[174b.3\]]ma byas kyi sems yin/_mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems yin/_stong pa nyid du lta ba'i sems yin/_gus pa'i sems yin/_dam pa'i sems yin/_'dres pa med pa'i sems yin/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin te/_de lta bu'i sems 
[\[174b.4\]]gang yin pa de dag ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste/_khyod kyis 'di kho na bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos smras pa/_bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams ni deng gdod gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa khong du 
[\[174b.5\]]chud par gyur pas deng phyin chad yongs su bzung nas brjed par bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa gang 
[\[174b.6\]]yin pa des byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed nas/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar yi dam yang dag par blang bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can rnams la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed de/_rtag par rig 
[\[174b.7\]]sngags 'di rgyun chad pa med par gdon par bya'o/_/gnas khang gtsang ma'i nang du 'dug ste/_yongs su dag par khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_ba dan dpyangs mar me sbar te/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas kyi mchod pa byas nas sems 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]rtse gcig tu gtad de/_dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan la mi dmigs par chos bzhin du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od lha dang /_drang srong tshad 
[\[175a.2\]]med pa snyed dang der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston par gyur la/_bdag kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis de la lta bar byed/_lag pa stong gis ni de la yongs su srung zhing byin gyis rlob par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag ji snyed pa de dag kyang 
[\[175a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_mu stegs can gyi chos kyi cho ga dang /_smrang ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni 'jig rten na gdon dang nad rnam pa 
[\[175a.4\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa dag gsos nas 'tsho bar byed do/_/'dre srin thams cad la dbang byed cing lha'i bu'i bdud rnams kyang 'dul bar byed/_mu stegs can rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do/_/gal te ri'am dgon pa na gnas te mdo sde kha ton du 'don 
[\[175a.5\]]pa dang bsam gtan sgom pa na ri'i lha dang /_'dre srin gnod pa byed pa dag nan gyis kyal ka byas nas sems mnyam par gzhag tu mi rung bar gyur na/_rig sngags 'di lan cig bzlas pa byas na 'dre srin de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te chos bzhin 
[\[175a.6\]]du bzlas brjod byas te/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed par gyur na/_bdag kyang de'i tshe dge ba'i lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa rnams la rtag par de'i rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su srung bgyis shig_/de'i 
[\[175a.7\]]nye 'khor na gnas nas mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du yongs su srungs shig_/rang gi srog gi dbang po bzhin du yongs su skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag la bsgo bar byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]po rdo rje 'chang /_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sme brtsegs lcags kyu can/_/stobs ldan shang kar dang sde brgyad dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis dbang phyug dang ni mthu chen dang /_/ku be ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dag_/btang 
[\[175b.2\]]nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis nor srung dang ni chu lha dang /_/dge rgyas dang ni pa ri tsi tra dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis sa sar tsa dang ma hA ra/_/ku lan tan ta dang ni lngas rtsen dag_/btang 
[\[175b.3\]]nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis pi pa ka la'i rgyal po dang /_/dpal ldan pyi ta dang ni swAr hA rA/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni sam ba ra/_/gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtshe ma dag_/
[\[175b.4\]]btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha/_/spobs chen dpal ldan dang ni sa ta na/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang ni/_/ma mo lha la sogs 
[\[175b.5\]]pa mthu chen 'khor/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni/_/mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang /_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis gser mdog rma bya'i 
[\[175b.6\]]rgyal po dang /_/sde dpon nyi shu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni/_/sde dpon chen po sa 'dzin phu la pa/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis 
[\[175b.7\]]dga' bo dang ni bsnyen dga' bo/_/klu rgyal rgya mtsho dang ni e la'i 'dab/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri za dang /_/mkha' lding mi'am ci dang lto 'phye rnams/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]byed/_/bdag gis chu dang me dang glog gi lha/_/grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/dge ba'i lha de dag dang klu'i rgyal po dang ma mo la sogs pa de dag kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[176a.2\]]mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis kyang rtag par thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de la yongs su srung zhing skyob par byed pas/_gang zag de ri dang dgon pa na gcig pu nyal bar gyur na yang dge ba'i lha de dag res kyis mtshan mos 
[\[176a.3\]]de la bsrungs nas bgegs dang bar chad yongs su sel bar byed do/_/gal te gcong rong dag tu gnas te lam stor bar gyur pa las rig sngags 'di bzlas par gyur na de'i dbang gis dge ba'i lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po dag dge ba'i mi'i gzugs su mngon 
[\[176a.4\]]par sprul nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ri dang nags tshal dang dgon pa dag tu gnas pa las chu dang me dag gis phongs par gyur na yang klu'i rgyal po dag gis yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me dag mngon par sprul bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[176a.5\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du gnod pa dang /_bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir shin tu bsil ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig ri dang 'brog 
[\[176a.6\]]dgon song ba las/_/stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang /_/rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang /_/gzungs 'di 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus/_/gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/_/gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang /_/gnod 
[\[176a.7\]]sbyin srin po nya dang rus sbal dang /_/gzungs 'di thos na so sor 'byer bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig g.yul sprod dgra yis bskor ba'am/_/chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang /_/lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/rgyal pos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig byad stems dug mda'i 
[\[176b.2\]]khyim zhugs te/_/zas skom dug can gyis ni gsad pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/dug nyid zil dngar zas skom nyid du 'gyur/_/bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/_/bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod 
[\[176b.3\]]tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/_/klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas/_/tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 
[\[176b.4\]]bzlas na/_/rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang /_/shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa 
[\[176b.5\]]zhi/_/sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyed pas na/_/byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/stems gnod de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du/_/sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa 
[\[176b.6\]]na/_/'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas/_/khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/_/nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/_/gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/_/bdag gis 
[\[176b.7\]]gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/_/bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yod mi 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdud nas mgul du gdags par bya'o/_/gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub par yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_
[\[177a.2\]]byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_drang srong gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[177a.3\]]tu sems ma bskyed pa dag myur du sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sems can gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la dad pa'i dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus theg pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos kyi myu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas/_
[\[177a.4\]]bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje'i mthus de dag gis ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'byor par byed do/_/gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi gnas su ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyed gnas pa 
[\[177a.5\]]dag bdag gi rig sngags 'di thos par gyur na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni myur du thob par 'gyur la/_sa bcu pa'i bar du yang ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar 
[\[177a.6\]]du yang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad brgyad cu yang rang gi ngang gis 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'di rna bar lan cig thos par gyur tam/_gzungs 'di spyod cing yi ger bris sam/_drang po'i 
[\[177a.7\]]sems kyis chos bzhin du gnas par byed na/_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang gi ngang gis thob par 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri dang /_chu klung dang /_brag dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu ji snyed pa dag 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]kyang g.yo zhing 'khol bar nus so/_/ri rab lhun po nas ri khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus so/_/de na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par nus so/_/sems can gang dag tshe 
[\[177b.2\]]'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang /_tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas na gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/_'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khor ba'i 
[\[177b.3\]]mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang sdig pa'i las thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rol na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang /_tshangs 
[\[177b.4\]]pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_drang srong dang /_klu'i rgyal po ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyen cing shes par 'gyur ro/_/lha'am mi gang yang rung ste/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung 
[\[177b.5\]]ngam/_rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chu lus la reg par gyur na/_sdig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas 
[\[177b.6\]]mngal dang /_drod gsher dang /_sgo nga las skye ba'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/_len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po 
[\[177b.7\]]langs te/_gang zag de'i lus dang /_spu dang /_skra dang /_gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de rdzi phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/_de dag gi sgrib pa dang sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bas/_yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par 
[\[178a.2\]]bya'o/_/gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam du tshig tu brjod par byung ba dge yang rung /_mi dge yang rung ste/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang /_mu stegs can dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam 
[\[178a.3\]]par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'gyur bas/_de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed nas bkur sti dang /_rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyid du rig par bya ste/_
[\[178a.4\]]sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni 'od can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad pa'i 
[\[178a.5\]]phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni byams pa dang snying rje'i gter yin par yang rig par bya ste/_'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kun 
[\[178a.6\]]sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag par mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni nam mkha'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_rtag 
[\[178a.7\]]par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can la blta ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_lha dang /_klu dang /_dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su srung ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig gi mdzod yin 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]par rig par bya ste/_kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni rtag par gnas pa'i gter yin par rig par bya ste/_'jig pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni rnam par 
[\[178b.2\]]grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams kyis gshol bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_rtag par gzungs kyis sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad gso ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[178b.3\]]gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod na nams kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig 
[\[178b.4\]]rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su skyo nas tshe ring ba'i sman yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas mtshams yongs su dag par bcad de/_gos la sngags kyis btab nas bgo bar bya'o/_/chu dang /_zas dang /_spos dang /_sman rnams 
[\[178b.5\]]la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod par byed na gdon mi za bar tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad de chos bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed na thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni ral gri la lan 
[\[178b.6\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 
[\[178b.7\]]phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro/_/yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongs su 'dzin par gyur na rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 
[\[179a.2\]]'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/_'don pa dang 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed pa la mchod cing rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa 
[\[179a.3\]]yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang dag sems can sdug bsngal gyi bgegs la yongs su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas ring por mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par 
[\[179a.4\]]bya'o/_/ci tsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te/_de dag gi rna lam du grag par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/_gang zag de dag yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/gang la 
[\[179a.5\]]la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sems dang lus gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mthol bshags te/_kha 
[\[179a.6\]]nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad pa med par byas na/_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhig yin na ni sa bcu'i 'bras bu yang dka' ba med par 
[\[179a.7\]]'gyur na/_'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang /_gzungs 'di'i byin gyi brlabs 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing /_mi rnams bag yangs su bkod de/_sems can stangs las mi gcod 
[\[179b.2\]]cing /_nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs su bskyabs nas/_nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/_thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di 'don par byed na/_yul de'i gnod pa dang /_bgegs thams cad yongs su 
[\[179b.3\]]bsal bar 'gyur/_'bru rnams legs shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag yang nas yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tam/_blon po chen pos rku bshams nas log par gyur tam/_rims 
[\[179b.4\]]nad byung bar gyur tam/_than chen byung bar gyur tam/_nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam/_de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyur na/_de'i tshe snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan te/_spos dang /_me tog 
[\[179b.5\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyed de/_
[\[179b.6\]]gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di 'don par byed na/_phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig lta bar 'gyur/_rgyal bu dang blon po rnams 
[\[179b.7\]]kyang srid zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/_btsun mo dang sras rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing skyong bar 'gyur/_char chu dus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]po rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur tam/_ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/_'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim dkrugs par gyur tam/_mi ma rungs pa 
[\[180a.2\]]dag gis klan skur btab nas rku bshams te gnod pa byas par gyur tam/_khyim mi che chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan 
[\[180a.3\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tshang bar bzlas na/_gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[180a.4\]]ldan 'das rig sngags 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/_rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/thogs pa med pa'i 
[\[180a.5\]]thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o/_/sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su skyob pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/tshe bsring ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/ngan 'gro yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang 
[\[180a.6\]]bya'o/_/smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/sems kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'da' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya ste/_de ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[180a.7\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na/_'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/'od stong pa'i mig can zhes kyang bya ste/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang gzi 
[\[180b.2\]]byin dang mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang /_thugs rje chen po dang smon 
[\[180b.3\]]lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus mngon du bstan pa yin pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyed dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti 
[\[180b.4\]]byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o/_/lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/_sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur/_kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_tshe 'das nas 
[\[180b.5\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[180b.6\]]mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/'dre gdon thams cad gdul bar 'dod na rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag la 
[\[180b.7\]]mchod do/_/lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra gzhom par 'dod na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar bar 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]sbyin pa'i lag la mchod do/_/mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/blon thabs mthon 
[\[181a.2\]]por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lus kyi 
[\[181a.3\]]bgegs ma rungs pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du gyur par 'dod na bum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/stag dang /_'phar sbyang dang /_dom dred dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa 
[\[181a.4\]]thams cad spang bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgegs las thar bar 'dod na dgra sta thegs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/bu dang /_bu mo dang /_g.yog 'khor gyi phyir ni shel gyi gdub 'khor thogs pa'i 
[\[181a.5\]]lag la mchod do/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i me 
[\[181a.6\]]long thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/drang srong 
[\[181a.7\]]gi lam mngon par 'grub par 'dod na sprin sna lnga thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tshangs par skye bar 'dod na ril ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs gzhan gyi dgra phyir rgol 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]ba bsal bar 'dod na ral gri dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/dge ba'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lha 'dre thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thod pa'i 'khar ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[181b.2\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na pa grang phreng 'dzin pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tshig gi spobs 
[\[181b.3\]]pa gya nom pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams rtag par 'ongs te srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 
[\[181b.4\]]'dod na 'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen bkur byed cing brtse bar sems par 'dod na thal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod do/_/skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral 
[\[181b.5\]]bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/mang du thos pa'i 
[\[181b.6\]]shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag 
[\[181b.7\]]la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]do/_/de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang deng mdor bsdus nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis gzungs 'di zung la 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya 
[\[182a.2\]]cher yongs su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/_/gzungs 'di khams gsum gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas gzungs 'dis yongs su gsos na mi 'tsho ba gang yang med do/_/rig sngags chen mo 'dis shing skam po la btab na 
[\[182a.3\]]yang yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu skye bar 'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges par med do/_/rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i byin 
[\[182a.4\]]gyi brlabs dang mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa ma yin na tha na 'di'i ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon sum du mthong ba lta smos 
[\[182a.5\]]kyang ci dgos/_lha dang /_mi dang /_klu la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po khyed rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la skur pa btab par gyur na gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag 
[\[182a.6\]]dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzungs 'di la the tshom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na gang zag de ni phan yon chen po dang gtan du 'bral bar 'gyur bas bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ngan 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i 
[\[182a.7\]]dus med de/_rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong /_chos kyang mi thos/_/dge 'dun yang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas/_thams cad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas bka' yang dag par blangs nas mngon par sgrub par gyur to/_/
[\[182b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chen po 'di smras so/_/na mo bud+d+ha gu ra be/_na mo d+harma ma ha te/_na maHsaM g+ha Ta yA Ni/_tri pu bi sA ta ta~M na maH/_rig sngags 'di bton na kha na ma 
[\[182b.3\]]tho ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_bdud spong bar byed/_bgegs rnams sel bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nas sangs rgyas la phyag lan re bya'o/_/de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 
[\[182b.4\]]skye ba thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes pa re re'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di smras so/_/sin+ti te du soSh+Ta/_a dz+nyA mi te o tuSh+Ta/_si ni khi 
[\[182b.5\]]ta pa li tiSh+Ta/_ya mi dz+nyA ta o d+huSh+Ta/_ku la ti maSh+Ta/_khiSh+Ta swA hA/_rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud byas te/_gang du na bar gdags par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed 
[\[182b.6\]]kyis gsungs pa yin pas/_deng bdag gis kyang rnal 'byor ba dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang /_nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[182b.7\]]rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di ni yang dag 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]par bden te mi bden pa ci yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di drung du 'ong bar 'dod na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin 
[\[183a.2\]]par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus bsregs pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/_'jim pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas/_mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du bcad nas 
[\[183a.3\]]sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lan re brjod na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/byad stems kyis phog par gyur na gu gul dang ga pur cha mnyam par byas te/_khron pa'i chu gtsang ma bre gang dang bsres nas bskol te phul gang tsam lus pa blangs nas/_mig stong 
[\[183a.4\]]pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyis zin par gyur na bca' sga'i phye ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi ma rungs 
[\[183a.5\]]pa dag gis rku bshams nas gnod pa byas par gyur na sa gtsang ma'am/_bag zan nam/_spra tshil la pha rol po'i gzugs byas te mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gril lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags lan re brjod de lan re gtubs nas 
[\[183a.6\]]pha rol gyi ming nas brjod de/_bsregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na pha rol po dga' zhing nam 'tsho ba'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing byams par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mig nad kyis btab ste/_mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/_mdongs par gyur 
[\[183a.7\]]tam/_mi gsal bar gyur tam/_ling tog dkar po dang /_dmar po dag gis khebs te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/_a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra 'brum bu re zhib tu btags te/_'thag pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar du bu btsas 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pa dang khyi dang phag rnams bsnyen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de/_sbrang rtsi dkar po dang /_mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar bya'o/_/'o ma de yang bu khye'u btsas pa'i nu zho rung gi bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo /_/sman de sbyar 
[\[183b.2\]]zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar du khang pa dben par rlung bsrungs na/_mig gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal ba rgyas par 
[\[183b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab ste myos par gyur na stag dang /_'phar ba dang /_spyang ki'i pags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bgos na sos par 'gyur ro/_/gal te sbrul gyis zin par gyur na gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spabs 
[\[183b.4\]]blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab sta rma khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro/_/gzer thabs ma rungs pas snying la gzer te 'chi la thug na ka byi ta lag pa tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang dang sbyar te/_bskol nas phul phyed lus pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste 
[\[183b.5\]]cig car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/_/sman de yang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o/_/ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyun ring du na bar gyur na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te snar bdug par bya'o/_/yang na ri bong gi rtug 
[\[183b.6\]]pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mid du bcug na sos par 'gyur te/_sha dang /_chang dang /_dku ba rnam pa lnga dang /_tshig ngan pa rnams bsrung dgos so/_/yang na ba bla dang /_yungs kar dang /_lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[183b.7\]]sngags kyis btab ste nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na/_gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna subs par gyur tam/_rka lag sdud mi nus par gyur na ru rta til mar gyi nang du 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na yang sos par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur 
[\[184a.2\]]na til mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[184a.3\]]gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/_sdug bsngal zhi zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na yang sman 'di 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/_/glo bur du snying gzer te mi bzod par gyur na de ni ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin 
[\[184a.4\]]pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste ci tsam 'byor pa byin nas blan du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/sha chang dang /_dku ba rnam pa lnga bsrung dgos so/_/mes tshig par gyur na ba lang gi lci ba dron po la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[184a.5\]]gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/srin bu khong par zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na srin bu thag pa gcus 
[\[184a.6\]]pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shu chen byung ba la leng se'u hA brdungs pa'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du blugs na rtsa bar dbyung bar 'gyur bas mod la 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mig tu sbrang ma zhugs te na bar gyur na bong bu'i rtug 
[\[184a.7\]]pa btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshan mo mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/lto na bar gyur na khron pa'i chu gtsang ma'i nang du lan tshwa ma grugs pa 'brum bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phul phyed 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/_/mig tshag por gyur tam/_mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/_ling tog byung bar gyur na ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_de'i nang du khar ba'i dong tshe gcig mtshan gcig 
[\[184b.2\]]spangs nas yang lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshan mo 'byung 'jug gi tshe 'jigs dngangs nas mi bde bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du 
[\[184b.3\]]btags na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang bral ba kho nar ma zad kyi bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po se'u'i shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad 
[\[184b.4\]]du gtubs te/_mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzla zhing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so/_/shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa 
[\[184b.5\]]brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang 'bel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma'am yal ga yang rung ste dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyi gar ba mar yang dag 
[\[184b.6\]]pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dkar po dang bzho bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o/_/nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na sngags mkhan de rang gis mngon par shes 
[\[184b.7\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/_mar dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o/_/gi'u wang srang gcig bai DUr+ya'i bum 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa'i nang du bcug ste/_'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[185a.2\]]thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste lag pa la bskus nas btson cha la byugs na btson cha dang grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyo shug chu dang me bzhin du 
[\[185a.3\]]mi 'dum par gyur na bya ngur pa'i mjug ma blangs te/_'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/_de dag nam 'tsho ba'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa dang bkur bar 'gyur 
[\[185a.4\]]ro/_/lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa'am thal ba'am bye ma gtsang ma blangs te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyur ro/_/chu gtsang ma la sngags kyis btab ste 
[\[185a.5\]]'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thug mi thub bo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_sha ra ma hA sha ra/_tu lu ma hA tu lu/_o~M ku me ha ni sha pa/_o~M ku me ha ni sha pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la la zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te/_
[\[185a.6\]]mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na khyed kyis mig btsums nas lus drang por bsrang ste/_sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas mig phye shig dang /_lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snod bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[185a.7\]]gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma stong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma dang rnga yab dang lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o/_/chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ngang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bza' bar bya ste/_de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/zas zos zin nas mig btsums te sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyi lhag ma yang spang bar 
[\[185b.2\]]bya'o/_/zas zos te ltor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i gzungs ni 'di yin te/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maH
[\[185b.3\]]saM g+hA ya/_na maHA dan ni ya/_ug tsi du ug tsi du/_ma ti la li la/_la lu te na ma ni mi ti na ma swA hA/_gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshams bcad de lus bsrungs nas/_khar ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu cig khron pa'i 
[\[185b.4\]]chu gtsang mas bkang ste mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas nas/_gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba gcig 'ong bar 'gyur bas/_'od pa'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/_
[\[185b.5\]]dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa rgyud pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba gcig lhung bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes bskyed par 
[\[185b.6\]]bya'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas 
[\[185b.7\]]thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/_deng bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang /_bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang /_bcing ba mtha' dag gcad pa dang /_'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bar bzhed pa lags pas/_deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/_dus tha ma'i sems can rnams yum zhes bgyi 
[\[186a.2\]]ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dus lnga brgya tha ma la yul lam/_grong ngam grong khyer ram/_grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/_
[\[186a.3\]]dge slong ma 'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[186a.4\]]bka' drin rjes su dran zhing gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas/_gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig 
[\[186a.5\]]tu yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni 
[\[186a.6\]]phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na yang 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/_deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang /_sems can rnams la 
[\[186a.7\]]bde bar bgyid pa dang /_lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad par 'tshal te/_bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par bar brnyes pa lags pas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[186b.2\]]'di 'don cing klog pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_shes rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/_lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/_gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' 
[\[186b.3\]]zhing thams cad kyis spyi bo btud de phyag bgyid par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur/_gang ci smras kyang rung ste/_thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyen par 'gyur lags te/_de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[186b.4\]]'das rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthu lags te/_rang nyid kyi mthu ni ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba 
[\[186b.5\]]dang /_las kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas/_khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog par mi 'gyur bar 
[\[186b.6\]]bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/_'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[186b.7\]]'di yongs su bzung bas ri bo po Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing /_sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi 'grub par bgyi bar bshams pa las/_de'i tshe bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]nas thams cad so sor gyes par gyur pas/_gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sems can thams 
[\[187a.2\]]cad la phan gdags shing /_lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i 
[\[187a.3\]]sngags 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo\u0f85 mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA s+thA ma/_prap+tA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_
[\[187a.4\]]ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta sa~M g+hA ya/_sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka pra b+hA a ba b+hA si te rmUrta ye/_ma hA ma Ni ma ku Ta kuN+Da lA laM kA ra d+hA ra NI/_b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/_sarba lo ka u pA sha ma nA ya/_bi bi d+ha mu kha 
[\[187a.5\]]sa ma be Sha biSh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+hur+b+hu ba/_ma hA lo ka ka ra Na nA tha ma sid+d+he mi ra b+ha dra bi nA sha nA ka rA ya/_rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/_sha sa ka sa mA shwA sa na ka ra ka sarba pA pa durga te pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta sam+ba da na 
[\[187a.6\]]ka ra/_he he/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra da pad+ma lo ka saM b+hU ta/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka dza Ta mu ku TA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/_ma Ni ka na ka sha ta/_badzra bai DUr+yA laM kr-i ta sha rA+e raM/_a mi tA b+ha si na ka ma lA laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na/_la ri tsa na ma hA du na/_na ra na ri sha ta sa ha sra/_a b+hi 
[\[187a.7\]]la ShI ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twA ya/_bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/_ma hA yan+t+ri kle sha ka ba d+ha/_a ba ba d+ha bi bi d+ha satwa saM sA ra tsA ra ka pra ma thA na/_pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha nA ga/_pu ru Sha sA ga ra/_pu ru Sha siM ha/_bI ra bI rA shA ya/_su yan+ta su yan+ta/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]ba ra ba ra/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra shA sa ya/_pra shA sa ya/_gi ri gi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_mu yu mu yu/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_gA ya gA ya/_gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/_ha sa ha sa/_pra ha 
[\[187b.2\]]sa pra ha sa/_bi b+hi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/_bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i/_ha ra ha ra/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_du ru ti du ru ti/_ma hA man+t+ra du ru ti/_kar+N+Na sha ta pa ra si ka b+ha ba bi sa na/_sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[187b.3\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du 
[\[187b.4\]]shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab po/_/'og min gyi lha dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 
[\[187b.5\]]'jigs shing dngangs par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to/_/de

[\[187b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skems par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do/_/yul 'khor rnams dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal rnams yongs su 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]srung bar byed do/_/'dre gdon dang /_nad dang /_sman gyi dug dang /_srin bu'i dug dang /_log pa dang /_ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smras pa 
[\[188a.2\]]dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas

[\[188a.4\]]bo shin tu rgya che bdag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_yongs su 'dzin par bgyid dam/_mthong bar gyur na/_de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu 
[\[188a.5\]]byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam/_'don par bgyid na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par 
[\[188a.6\]]de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrung ba bgyid cing /_yongs su skyob par bgyid do/_/gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/_gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub

[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/_ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/_rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/_gang zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba 
[\[188b.2\]]brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun du bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur/_gang zag de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du byang 
[\[188b.3\]]chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/_btsun pa khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam/_me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[188b.4\]]gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/_gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen

[\[188b.7\]]'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab 'thob par 'gyur/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]lags so/_/gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang /_dbyar zla 'bring po dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang /_tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po 
[\[189a.2\]]gtsang ma bgos te/_zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/_me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 
[\[189a.3\]]gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de/_rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid 
[\[189a.4\]]na/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas/_rnal 'byor bas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas/_
[\[189a.5\]]lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang /_dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis yang 'thob par 'gyur lags 
[\[189a.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/_gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/_/dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa 
[\[189a.7\]]brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so/_/gtsang po dang /_chab mig skams pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad kyis thebs pa 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]thams cad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug pas byabs na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[189b.2\]]lags so/_/gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag mtshams dgum 
[\[189b.3\]]par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te/_chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te/_mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su 
[\[189b.4\]]bsrungs par 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/_gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de 
[\[189b.5\]]dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/_gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/_smon lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi 
[\[189b.6\]]gzungs 'di bzlas te/_gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan cig bsreg pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal 
[\[189b.7\]]na rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]mar btags te/_chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/_yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/_drod dang /_dud pa dang /_'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/_/mtshan ma de dag thob
