[\[190a.2\]]nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang byug par bgyi ste/_de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/_bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum 
[\[190a.3\]]gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o/_/de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun du sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar langs nas 'greng ste/_lus drang por bsrang nas 
[\[190a.4\]]rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o/_/sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/_lag mthil du bzhag la/_mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo dang /_mthe bong ni 
[\[190a.5\]]yan par brkyang ste/_lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/_phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/_'di ni lus kun 
[\[190a.6\]]sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/gal te bdud dang mu stegs can la log par lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/_phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par 
[\[190a.7\]]'gyur lags so/_/gzungs ni 'di lta ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a bat+ta/_a bat+ta/_pa ri bat+te/_e hi e hi swA hA/_de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]stong dang ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par 
[\[190b.2\]]bgyis la/_mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/_'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i 
[\[190b.3\]]las ci mchis pa thams cad dus gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud 
[\[190b.4\]]kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang /_kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/_/gzungs ni 'di lta ste/_tad+ya thA/_sarba d+hA ra NI/_maN+Da la/_e hi e hi/_pra b+hA shud+d+ha/_satwA ya swA hA/_
[\[190b.5\]]de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_slar bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_spyi bor thal 
[\[190b.6\]]mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/_chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/'das pa'i 
[\[190b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par grol ba brnyes pa lags te/_rig sngags ni snga ma dang mthun lags so/_/gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar 
[\[191a.2\]]gung mo dang /_srin lag dang /_mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du mnan te/_lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag par bgyi ste/_'di 
[\[191a.3\]]ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa'i bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang 
[\[191a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang 
[\[191a.5\]]bgyir mi rung lags so/_/rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba cig lags na ni ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gzungs ni 'di lta ste/_oM sarba 
[\[191a.6\]]tsak+ShuHka rA ya/_d+hA ra NI/_in+d+rA ya swA hA/_de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang 
[\[191a.7\]]nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/_'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so/_/gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/_tad+ya thA/_a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swA hA/_de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas ting nge 
[\[191b.2\]]'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bsgreng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung 
[\[191b.3\]]mo bkug ste nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/_'dis ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang /_chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/_bla na med pa 
[\[191b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad dang /_'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags 
[\[191b.5\]]te/_'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo la reg par bgyis nas/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/_mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por bsgreng nas rtse mo 
[\[191b.6\]]phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/_lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM sarba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/_de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang /_brgya byin lha'i 
[\[191b.7\]]dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas/_sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/_lag mthil bkan la mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM ma hA brah+mA ya 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]e hi e hi swA hA/_phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o/_/gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/_chab mar la lan 
[\[192a.2\]]brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/_/yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o/_/chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sh+lo ka khri lobs par 'gyur lags so/_/phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni 
[\[192a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so/_/de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas snying gar 
[\[192a.4\]]thal mo sbyar te/_mthe bong gnyi ga lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgreng sta snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/_gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/_phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[192a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang lags pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par 
[\[192a.6\]]bgyis te/_phyag rgya 'di bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas/_bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su byang bar 'gyur bas/_de'i slad du yon tan 'di lta 
[\[192a.7\]]bu'i bsngags pa brjod par lags so/_/de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las/_mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen mo ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/_rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de la bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig 
[\[192b.2\]]stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[192b.3\]]rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/_rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sangs rgyas spyan 
[\[192b.4\]]'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM sarba bud+d+ha sa ma ya/_e hi e hi/_brah+ma shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/_de la byang chub sems 
[\[192b.5\]]dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de 
[\[192b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/_rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te/_bre mo'i gtam 
[\[192b.7\]]rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gzungs las 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o/_/yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag nas 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyi'o/_/gal te khe la gdu bas slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/_sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yang dag 
[\[193a.2\]]pa'i yongs su dang ba dang /_chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des bsgom par mi bgyid na/_bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/_nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag 
[\[193a.3\]]par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa lnga dang /_sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o/_/gal te dbyen tshig dang /_g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang /_phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_
[\[193a.4\]]rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung bar gyur na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/_'di skad du ngas khyed srangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[193a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_yang dag pa'i chos dang /_dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags 
[\[193a.6\]]pas/_de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang /_'dre gdon thams cad dang /_mu stegs can rnams dang /_byi nA ya ka rnams dang /_khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang /_las gcig la gnas pa dang /_gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags 
[\[193a.7\]]pas/_'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par mi mdzad cing /_rtag par sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa dang /_lha dang /_drang srong thams cad kyis dmod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/lam sun 'byin cing 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/_de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang 
[\[193b.2\]]bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/_de dag rang nyid kyis nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang /_glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/_'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/_gang dag tshangs par 
[\[193b.3\]]spyod pa yongs su dag pa srung ba dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/_yum 
[\[193b.4\]]gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/_/chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i sems 
[\[193b.5\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_rus pa dang /_sha dang /_rtsa rgyus dang /_rkang dang /_mgo dang /_mig la sogs pa yang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/_chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par 
[\[193b.6\]]nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par sgrub par 'tshal na rin po che dang /_'bru dang /_dar zab dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_sman dang /_nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya'i gzugs 
[\[193b.7\]]brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/_yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang /_rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing /_de dag dus 'di nas 
[\[194a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/_/dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/_ri'am/_chab mig 'bab pa'am/_nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/_nye 'khor 
[\[194a.3\]]kun du khru gang yan chad ni shing gi rtsa ba dang /_dog sa ngan pa dang /_gyo mo dang /_gor ma dang /_rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas/_dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang /_spos 
[\[194a.4\]]chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o/_/de la dbus kyi gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/_dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhi lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs 
[\[194a.5\]]brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba cig bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i rjes la gling gi 
[\[194a.6\]]grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas/_nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[194a.7\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan+dan dkar po las bgyis pa cig gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis nas/_sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/_/shar lho mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen po bri'o/_/lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o/_/nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar 
[\[194b.2\]]bya'o/_/gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang /_phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling gsum pa ni zheng du khru do par bgyis te sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang 
[\[194b.3\]]bar bgyis te/_ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad du ma bu re re'i nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang /_rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang /_dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang /_
[\[194b.4\]]gri'i phyag rgya dang /_ral gri'i phyag rgya dang /_dung gi phyag rgya dang /_chu gri'i phyag rgya dang /_zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /_dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang /_gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang /_byi nA ya 
[\[194b.5\]]ka'i phyag rgya dang /_mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang /_'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang /_sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas/_phyag rgya de dag kun la'ang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis 
[\[194b.6\]]pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o/_/nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o/_/byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/_/shar phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[194b.7\]]de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/_ngos bzhi kun du 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang /_me tog gi ljon shing dang /_rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun du rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyis gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o/_/gzhan 
[\[195a.2\]]yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su dpyangs 
[\[195a.3\]]te kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/_gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu 
[\[195a.4\]]bcu drug dang /_zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_spos chab bre gang dang /_bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha 
[\[195a.5\]]brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang /_mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_byug spos dang /_spos kyi phye ma dang /_de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang /_dar tshon sna 
[\[195a.6\]]tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/_/'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sder dang /_snod spyad dang /_bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang /_dngul dang /_'khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar 
[\[195a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lags so/_/'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/_/gdan dang /_me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/_/'bras 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]sA lu'i me tog dang /_yungs kar dang /_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o/_/sngags mkhan de yang 'byung 'jug gi 
[\[195b.2\]]tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byugs te/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_tu ruSh+ka dang /_ga pur la sogs pa bsres te gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang 
[\[195b.3\]]chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/_/nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhag pa'i mdun du rang gis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag 
[\[195b.4\]]yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/_/gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te/_mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs 
[\[195b.5\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/_gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/_sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang 
[\[195b.6\]]po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin 
[\[195b.7\]]tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/_thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas/_nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad bsgrib cing mchod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]du 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/_de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras 
[\[196a.2\]]gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/_lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/_dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces 
[\[196a.3\]]'dri bar 'gyur bas/_de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang /_gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_sngags kyi cho ga thams 
[\[196a.4\]]cad mngon par 'grub pa dang /_'dre gdon thams cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/de ltar smon pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 
[\[196a.5\]]'di ni bal ras sam/_btso ras la ri mo bris te bgyis na yang rung lags so/_/smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba bgyis la/_a ga ru bsregs te/_lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_bcu 
[\[196a.6\]]pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/_smon pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid 
[\[196a.7\]]bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas/_lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/_/yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bar 'gyur lags so/_/gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra pa'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul 
[\[196b.2\]]bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/_/'dre gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na 
[\[196b.3\]]gu gul dang /_yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/_/yul phyogs su rims nad byung bar gyur 
[\[196b.4\]]na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/_ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na chab nyung zad 
[\[196b.5\]]cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/_gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur 
[\[196b.6\]]to/_/de'i tshe bram ze tsin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/_cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas/_thams cad zhi bar gyur te/_rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po'ang de'i tshe yul 
[\[196b.7\]]nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/_chom rkun dang /_'khrug pa 'byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/_rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 
[\[197a.2\]]'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/_gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas/_a ga ru bsregs te/_rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su 
[\[197a.3\]]'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/sngon yul bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/_bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/_lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon pa dang /_khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 
[\[197a.4\]]bram ze zhig sgo kun du rgyu zhing zas slong ba las/_khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do/_/de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig 
[\[197a.5\]]dang /_khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang /_gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/_lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa 
[\[197a.6\]]las/_deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir nga 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/_khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos 
[\[197a.7\]]dang /_dge 'dun la phul bas/_cho ga 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/_/sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags na/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]mi 'tshal te/_phyag rgyas bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la/_myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug 
[\[197b.2\]]bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/_chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde bar 'gyur zhing /_khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/_dge ba sna tshogs 
[\[197b.3\]]kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/_rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs 
[\[197b.4\]]te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar 'gyur na/_sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas/_sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/_rgyu dang rkyen des gang 
[\[197b.5\]]zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs 'dri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar 
[\[197b.6\]]po khru bcu drug pa'am/_khru nyi shu pa yang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/_gdod la mig gsum mchis pa/_sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing /_sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i 
[\[197b.7\]]mthil du'ang mig re re bri'o/_/sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mchis te/_sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do/_/sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so/_/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yang gcig gis ni glegs bam thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni 'khar gsil thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor 
[\[198a.2\]]lo thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni pad+ma kha bye ba thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/_/yang gcig gis ni bgrang 
[\[198a.3\]]phreng thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni zil dngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/_/yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar 
[\[198a.4\]]g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so/_/sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/_sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang /_phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs 
[\[198a.5\]]pa'o/_/kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya rgyad pa nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/_so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/_ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/_/lag ngar la ni gdub kor rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[198a.6\]]kyis brgyan to/_/lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/_/kun du ru'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag yum gyi gzungs 
[\[198a.7\]]kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/_/gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas/_ri mo 'dri ba'i gnas khang nyen 'khor kun du tsan+dan dkar po'i chab kyis dog sa la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang ri 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/_nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/_/chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang /_ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/_dkyil 
[\[198b.2\]]'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/_ba dan dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos chab dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher 
[\[198b.3\]]bgyis te/_rnal 'byor pa dang /_ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams mthol bshags na/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa 
[\[198b.4\]]las 'od zer chen po byung nas/_nyi zla zil gyis mnan te/_'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang /_tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/_rnal 'byor pa dang /_ri 
[\[198b.5\]]mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang /_sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/_/cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis 
[\[198b.6\]]pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang lag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan 
[\[198b.7\]]nas/_bdud chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/_sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la/_mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas/_bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs 
[\[199a.2\]]par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang na mchog tu gyur pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_legs so 
[\[199a.3\]]legs so/_/ngas kyang byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs 
[\[199a.4\]]su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di 
[\[199a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig_/de 
[\[199a.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang /_nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi 
[\[199a.7\]]lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'og min gyi lha dang /_dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/_/'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/_ku co 'don cing shar nub tu 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[199b.2\]]bsgo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skems par bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams bsrung bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma 
[\[199b.3\]]rungs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don 
[\[199b.4\]]cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang 
[\[199b.5\]]smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/_bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la 
[\[199b.6\]]byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_g.yar khar bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o/_/bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_snying 
[\[199b.7\]]gar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/_yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sug pa 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bo gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang bsrung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyid do/_/phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/_mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas chab 
[\[200a.2\]]gtsang ma'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/_thal ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas/_de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/_de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[200a.3\]]lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang /_log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal ga dang /_grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/_rig sngags 'di 
[\[200a.4\]]bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha/_d+harma saM g+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_na mo badzra pA Na ye/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[200a.5\]]bi si bi si bi/_kA ya si bi/_pa la sha pa la ni swA hA/_rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag pa re gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang /_gdugs 
[\[200a.6\]]kyi gung dang /_gdugs pas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/_tshe 'das 
[\[200a.7\]]nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/_khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bka' stsal par 'gyur/_tshe 'di nyid la yang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing /_'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho 
[\[200b.2\]]ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo /_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug ste/_
[\[200b.3\]]sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/_lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_dus gcig gi tshe yang 
[\[200b.4\]]lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /_shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba 
[\[200b.5\]]bsregs nas/_tshe 'das pa'i rjes la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/_gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang /_ye shes 
[\[200b.6\]]mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/_gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/_gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_lus kyi nad thams cad kyang 
[\[200b.7\]]yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/_ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na/_
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brdos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/_ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[201a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor 
[\[201a.3\]]bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/_/cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma'i 
[\[201a.4\]]dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/_gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog phor thogs te/_a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas byang 
[\[201a.5\]]chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa'i spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/_/
[\[201a.6\]]gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/_pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/_gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[201a.7\]]tshang bar bgyis na/_slad kyis cing bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis nad 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gzhibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/_sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa 
[\[201b.2\]]brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang shing kun dang /_yungs kar dang /_shu dag dang /_ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi 
[\[201b.3\]]nang du bor te bsreg par bgyi'o/_/'di dag bsreg pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/_dkyil 'khor ram/_gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya 
[\[201b.4\]]rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/_ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag sngags 'dis btab na thams 
[\[201b.5\]]cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/_/bsod nams ma mchis 
[\[201b.6\]]pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du grub par mi 'gyur na/_gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i 
[\[201b.7\]]rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi 'dus sar chos ston pa na klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang /_klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_sems can mang po rnams sdug 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las/_de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gcig phul ba dang /_bdag gis ni de la yum 
[\[202a.2\]]gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar gyur lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/_/
[\[202a.3\]]bi ma le/_ma hA bi ma le/_u ha le/_ma hA u ha le/_hu ma le/_ma hA hu ma le/_sa hA le/_ma hA sa hA le/_tsi li te swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag 
[\[202a.4\]]stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste/_yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig brel zhing 
[\[202a.5\]]phongs par gyur tam/_pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/_chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur na/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas dpung pa g.yon pa la 
[\[202a.6\]]mdud par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang /_gung mo dang /_mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/_mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/_sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams 
[\[202a.7\]]cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te chos ston pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]'tshal zhing /_dge ba'i sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang /_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/_de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/_mig stong 
[\[202b.2\]]dang lag stong dang ldan pas bdud 'dul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/_yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang /_de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas nongs pa mthol bshags te/_phyag bgyis pa dang /_
[\[202b.3\]]bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/_de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas 
[\[202b.4\]]sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_snying gar thal mo sbyar te/_mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol mar btang zhing /_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/_cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/_
[\[202b.5\]]thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'gro ba drug gi sems can 
[\[202b.6\]]sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/_'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/_lag ngar gyi tshigs dang lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o/_/sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par 
[\[202b.7\]]bgyis te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su 'das pa zhes bgyi ste/_'di ltar phyag rgya' 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so/_/de la byang 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go/_/
[\[203a.2\]]de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o/_/'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i 
[\[203a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/_phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/_/rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon 
[\[203a.4\]]sum du ma gyur nas/_gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/_sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon sum du bzhugs par yid la bgyis te/_gdugs mtshan 
[\[203a.5\]]gcig la dus drug tu mthol bshags bgyis na/_sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub 
[\[203a.6\]]sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bo khu tshur 
[\[203a.7\]]bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas/_lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_o~M ku tsi ku tsi/_ku tsi ya ri/_tsa ri tsa ri/_tsa 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ri le swA hA/_gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te/_sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing /_snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa 
[\[203b.2\]]brgyad tshang bar gyur na/_sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar 
[\[203b.3\]]mi 'gyur bas/_gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/_g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur 
[\[203b.4\]]ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/_rim gro bgyid cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[203b.5\]]'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar bzhag go/_/de'i rjes la sug pa 
[\[203b.6\]]lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/_lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas/_mdzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na mo nI la kaN+Tha/_na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/_na ma Ar+ya sha la swA hA/_e hi e hi swA hA/_rigs 
[\[203b.7\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag rgya 'di len tam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_'don par bgyid na/_myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/_sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur/_
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur/_rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/_nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig gdugs re 
[\[204a.2\]]bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/_skud 
[\[204a.3\]]pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas/_de'i mgul du btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yul gang du ltas ngan dang /_rims nad byung 
[\[204a.4\]]ste/_yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/_rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/_pad+ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang 
[\[204a.5\]]chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/_sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag 
[\[204a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/_sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[204a.7\]]bzlas brjod bgyis na/_smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]sdig rnam pa sna tshogs pa bgyis pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/_rdul phra rab de re re yang bskal pa re re la mngon par byung bar gyur na/_gang zag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang 
[\[204b.2\]]gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan 
[\[204b.3\]]sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas/_rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur te/_gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/_
[\[204b.4\]]de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang 
[\[204b.5\]]pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/_dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 
[\[204b.6\]]'tshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon 
[\[204b.7\]]pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/_sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par bsgreng ste/_lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/_lus 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na drang srong 'phur te mchi ba dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_
[\[205a.2\]]sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_o~M a ro li ka te le/_lo ki bi do ya/_sarba ya dru/_pra mar+d+ha na ka rA ya pu ru swA hA/_bcom ldan 
[\[205a.3\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[205a.4\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[205a.5\]]zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D898}]@##/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin 
[\[205a.6\]]gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang po 
[\[205a.7\]]dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_gos tshags bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang 
[\[205b.2\]]na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin 
[\[205b.3\]]po che chen po dang /_yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_khyod 
[\[205b.4\]]kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang /_langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar 
[\[205b.5\]]stan la 'dug ste/_sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[205b.6\]]tad+ya thA/_o~M tsakra pa ti tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha te/_badzra b+ha ra/_A ka rA ya hU~M swA hA/_'di ni lus kyi sngags lags so/_/o~M pad+me/_tsin+tA ma Ni/_ma hA badzra b+ha ra hU~M/_'di ni snying po'i sngags lags so/_o~M b+ha ra ta pad+me hU~M/_'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngags lags 
[\[205b.7\]]so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /_sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_bdud kyi rgyal po dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/_bdud kyi rgyal 
[\[206a.2\]]po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/_sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad kyang phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams 
[\[206a.3\]]thar te/_lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/_lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/_de bzhin 
[\[206a.4\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/_rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 
[\[206a.5\]]gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[206a.6\]]kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong 
[\[206a.7\]]ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/_gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]'di mi bskyud par bgyis te gdugs dang dus mi 'dam bar gtsang yang rung /_mi gtsang yang rung ste/_g.yar ston du bzlas par gyur na bgyi ba rnams don dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/ci yang rung ste/_don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa 
[\[206b.2\]]brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/_rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'das pa dang da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang /_
[\[206b.3\]]sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/_/gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/_
[\[206b.4\]]las ngan pa dang gdon bgegs dang bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba'am/_rlung dang /_mkhris 
[\[206b.5\]]pa'am/_bad kan la sogs pas bro 'chal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam/_lhog pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze 
[\[206b.6\]]nad dam/_phol mig gam/_rlung nad dam/_smyos pa'am/_klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mchu dang /_lce dang /_mid pa dang /_kha dang /_gdong dang /_gtsug dang /_klad rgyas dang /_brang dang /_rtsib 
[\[206b.7\]]logs dang /_snying dang /_lto ba dang /_rked pa dang /_rgyab dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par bgyid/_ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]lags so/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bi nA ya ka dang /_bdud sdig can dang /_'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/mtshon cha dang /_dmag tshogs dang /_chab dang /_zhugs dang /_
[\[207a.2\]]rlung dang /_char pa dang /_ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dgra dang /_chom rkun dang /_rgyal po ma rungs pa dang /_rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed 
[\[207a.3\]]par mi 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/_rtsangs pa dang /_sbrul dang /_sdig pa dang /_srin bu gyi med dang /_rkang mang dang /_gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa 
[\[207a.4\]]bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/_gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid 
[\[207a.5\]]bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig_/
[\[207a.6\]]ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/_thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bgo bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/_mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos 
[\[207a.7\]]po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gnas ri po Ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/_bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/_skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal 
[\[207b.2\]]du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/_bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/_'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[207b.3\]]spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/_'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras 
[\[207b.4\]]gzigs dang dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/_thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'di lta 
[\[207b.5\]]ste/_'jig rten gyi nor dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[207b.6\]]dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /_byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel 
[\[207b.7\]]zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o/_/gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/_sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dang /_gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/_rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[208a.2\]]phyug gi ming dang /_yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang /_gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/_gal te rgyal po 'am/_rgyal bu'am/_btsun mo'am/_slas sam/_rgyal po'i bu mo'am/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gdol 
[\[208a.3\]]pa'am/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/_mu stegs sna tshogs dag la bsten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o/_/gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer 
[\[208a.4\]]zhing rgyal po la bsten par 'tshal na dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/_/rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na lan 
[\[208a.5\]]brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/_/slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i bu mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal rigs 
[\[208a.6\]]la bsten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o/_/gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o/_/khye'u gzhon nu 
[\[208a.7\]]dang bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan drug cu'o/_/'di ni bsten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/_nor dang /_bran dang /_rta dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so/_/gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' bdag ring po na mchi 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsams pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras 
[\[208b.2\]]gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon 
[\[208b.3\]]sum du bstan nas/_de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te sangs rgyas dang 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur 
[\[208b.4\]]lags so/_/gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing /_so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsol nas yongs su srung bar bgyid de/_
[\[208b.5\]]zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas/_de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do/_/bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams 
[\[208b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/byang chub sems spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod 
[\[208b.7\]]las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/_gi'u wang dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_dza ti pha la 
[\[209a.2\]]dang /_li shi dang /_ka ko la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la sngon po dang /_gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te/_snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs sam/_gos la bdugs sam/_
[\[209a.3\]]mig la bskus sam/_dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/_lus la byugs na rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_blon po rnams dang /_bran rnams dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang /_lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu 
[\[209a.4\]]sems bskyed nas/_lus kyi zho sha dang /_nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/_brjod kyis mi lang lags so/_/ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[209a.5\]]lags so/_/gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang /_chab kyis ded pa dang /_zhugs kyis tshig pa dang /_
[\[209a.6\]]mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dug dang /_'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/sman 'dis 
[\[209a.7\]]bdugs pas bab chol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/_'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyar ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi 
[\[209b.2\]]yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum zhib mor btags te/_gi'u wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_chab gtsang mas 
[\[209b.3\]]sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/_yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/_gdugs dang /_rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas/_ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam 
[\[209b.4\]]pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/_ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po'am/_blon po nye phan nam/_skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na bkur sti bgyis nas/_nor dang rin po che dag phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 
[\[209b.5\]]'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/_tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/_bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/_
[\[209b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba cig bgyis te/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[209b.7\]]gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram zhing /_tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/_rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing /_yol ba dang /_bla re dkar po bres te/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang /_snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o/_/lus kyi sngags kyang 
[\[210a.2\]]lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsregs te/_me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste/_ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 
[\[210a.3\]]'grub par 'gyur/_tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/_don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/_'di ni yid bzhin tsan+dan gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho 
[\[210a.4\]]ga zhes bgyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_gzhan yang sems can rnams la 
[\[210a.5\]]snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/_sman shi ri ka ku shu dang /_pad+ma le brgan dang /_pad+ma sngon po dang /_rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang /_nya rkun mnag po'i rus pa dang /_ba bla dang /_
[\[210a.6\]]ka kun ban s+ya dang /_gi'u wang dang /_gur gum dang /_rgya'i gur gum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na gla rtsi dang /_ga bur srang 
[\[210a.7\]]phyed stsal nas zhib tu bdar te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/_snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang /_klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams 
[\[210b.2\]]cad dang /_sprin dkar dang /_mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_sprin dmar dang /_long nad dang /_klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so/_/rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags 
[\[210b.3\]]so/_/gdugs gnyis stsal na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gdugs gsum stsal na smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[210b.4\]]gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_lci ba bzhi dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_byad stems thams cad rnam 
[\[210b.5\]]par 'joms shing /_ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro/_/zhag 
[\[210b.6\]]bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dag dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro 
[\[210b.7\]]bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang /_klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas byad stems dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang 'dre srin sde brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes 
[\[211a.2\]]su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an+t+rad nar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo 
[\[211a.3\]]rang bye nas de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas/_
[\[211a.4\]]tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/_mthu chen po dang ldan bar 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod 
[\[211a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas blta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag 
[\[211a.6\]]sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rlung 
[\[211a.7\]]gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur la/_de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams 
[\[211b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul 
[\[211b.3\]]gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang 
[\[211b.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal pa gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid che par bgyi zhing /_
[\[211b.5\]]sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/_the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/_'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan nor bu'i
