[\[211b.6\]]'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[211b.7\]]gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/_nyon mongs pa dang kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang /_las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_dgra thams cad 'dul ba/_bi nA ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/_sbyin sreg ho~M bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/_dog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas me tog ma len tsa su dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_
[\[212a.2\]]sbrang rtsi dang /_chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te/_thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags 
[\[212a.3\]]kyis btab ste/_zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so/_/zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par ho~M gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong 
[\[212a.4\]]thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po nye phan dang /_skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag 
[\[212a.5\]]bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_nyi zla'i lha dang rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/_lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 
[\[212a.6\]]'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na yungs kar dang chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/_gdugs gsum gyi bar 
[\[212a.7\]]du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char ba 'bab par 'gyur/_gal te char che ste mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/_gnam du gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/_rlung drag 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]po glo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/_lus 
[\[212b.2\]]'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[212b.3\]]phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig 
[\[212b.4\]]gis lan cig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[212b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar byas pa 
[\[212b.6\]]legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/_/gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yin mod kyi ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes 
[\[212b.7\]]su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/_nga'i tshig dang 'gal bar ma byed cig dang nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing /_rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so/_/sems 
[\[213a.2\]]can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lags pas/_gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang /_rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/_bdag ni de ltar bcom 
[\[213a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /_'khor 
[\[213a.4\]]'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las sbyin sreg hoM gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//
[\[213a.5\]]'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lots+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis 
[\[213a.6\]]rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D899}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[213a.7\]]dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/_bcom 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di 
[\[213b.2\]]ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/_de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang sdig pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum 
[\[213b.3\]]pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung bar bgyi ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_
[\[213b.4\]]yongs su gzung bar bgyis pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang /_chad pa spangs pa dang /_mtshon cha spangs pa dang /_dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang /_gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/_de ni 'jig rten lha dang 
[\[213b.5\]]bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa 
[\[213b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[213b.7\]]pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/_thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]gyur/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/_de ltar bdag gis snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lags so/_/de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par 
[\[214a.2\]]bya'o/_/gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o/_/nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[214a.3\]]yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal po'i tshogs rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang /_lus la dug 
[\[214a.4\]]gis mi tshugs pa dang dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang rims kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon chas mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /_chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[214a.5\]]dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so/_/gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[214a.6\]]dang /_ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te 'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung 
[\[214a.7\]]bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so/_/bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so/_/gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang /_gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang /_chab dang zhugs dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[214b.2\]]kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas pa dang /_bskyab pa dang skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen bgyi'o/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste/_bla na med 
[\[214b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/_/lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 
[\[214b.4\]]kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/_ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 
[\[214b.5\]]'tshal te/_bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi'am/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la smyung ba bgyis na de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 
[\[214b.6\]]'dzin pa ni don mchis te/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so/_/bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/_bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[214b.7\]]dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te/_ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing 
[\[215a.2\]]rjes su yi rang ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po 
[\[215a.3\]]'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+ha teb+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na ma Ar+yA pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[215a.4\]]ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su ma ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni bsgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/_
[\[215a.5\]]rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_'byung po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'dre dang /_lus srul po dang /_brjed byed dang /_lba ba dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_bas bldags la sogs 
[\[215a.6\]]pa dang /_dug dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o/_/lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do/_/byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro/_/rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro/_/
[\[215a.7\]]sna bro 'tshal ba la gro ba btags na des zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyi ste bklags pas 'grub po/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D900}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA mASh+Ta sha ta kaM_/bod skad du/_'phags 
[\[215b.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas 
[\[215b.3\]]pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_'dzam bun da'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kun du 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[215b.4\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gror byas/_mchod cing bkur stir byas te/_yongs 
[\[215b.5\]]su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su byang ba/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs 
[\[215b.6\]]su gsal ba/_tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/_kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[215b.7\]]bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas/_/khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/_/srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad/_/yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems/_/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/_/klu chen po ni cang shes po/_/sems la dbang 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]sgyur thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob/_/ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs/_/srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu rgal/_/gzhan la phan pa mdzad le brtson/_/thugs rje dang ni 'brel pa'i thugs/_/skye dgu kun 
[\[216a.2\]]la mchog tu byams/_/bde bar brtson pa byams las byung /_/mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas/_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes/_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'/_/khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig po/_/
[\[216a.3\]]'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/_/rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/_/mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes/_/n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/_/
[\[216a.4\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang /_/sku ni rnam pa kun du brgyan/_/sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra/_/sku tshad che la dkar sham po/_/nA ga ge sar gzhon nu ltar/_/cung zad dmar pa 'dra ba'i mdog_/dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan/_/thor 
[\[216a.5\]]tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs/_/dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/_/'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro/_/'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar/_/gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab/_/gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che/_/shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi/_/
[\[216a.6\]]nyi ma'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan/_/nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yi/_/se ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan/_/sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod/_/tshul khrims mnyams ral ba med/_/mthon ka seng ge'i ral pa 'dra/_/sku ni 
[\[216a.7\]]'jam zhing ldem bag can/_/gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra/_/g.yas su 'khyil pa'i dung yang 'dra/_/dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra/_/dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che/_/smin mtshams bar yang yong ma chad/_/spyan ni nor bu rin 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]chen 'bar/_/shangs kyi dbyibs kyang cung zad mtho/_/tshems kyi sgros kyis rnam par gnon/_/ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing /_/snyan gyi khung yang rab tu zab/_/mgur kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra/_/dpung pa dag kyang rab 
[\[216b.2\]]tu zlum/_/phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring /_/sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar/_/phyag sor rnams kyi bar yang 'brel/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la/_/'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan/_/ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes/_/
[\[216b.3\]]sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas/_/gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan/_/yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba/_/pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra/_/pad+ma dag las kun du skyes/_/pad+ma dag 
[\[216b.4\]]gi gdan la bzhugs/_/phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnams/_/ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams/_/kriSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa man bas/_/dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin/_/bkra shis dag gis gtsang mar gyur/_/snga nas gsung zhing gsong por 
[\[216b.5\]]gsung /_/bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad/_/bzang por snang ba'i ljon shing ltar/_/sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags/_/
[\[216b.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/_/ba spu nyag ma re re yang /_/sems can rnams kyi gtso bor gyur/_/bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad/_/bshol ba med cing nges par mdzad/_/rab tu 
[\[216b.7\]]drag pa'i brtson 'grus can/_/'khor ba dag las rab tu rgal/_/dam chos rgyal tshab mnga' gsol ba/_/yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor/_/don yod zhags pas sdug bsngal 'dren/_/ha ya gr-i ba bdud bzhi 'joms/_/kro d+ha mgrin sngon 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gdug pa sel/_/chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las sgrol/_/lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang /_/khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed/_/rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan/_/mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan/_/yon tan ldan zhing 
[\[217a.2\]]byams dang ldan/_/shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan/_/tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan/_/don rnams kun ni rig pa po/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/_/chos rnams thams cad smra ba po/_/'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po/_/
[\[217a.3\]]zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan/_/gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas/_/'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag_/tshangs pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa 
[\[217a.4\]]brgyad kyis gang zhig stod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong gi bar du 
[\[217a.5\]]yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o/_/mnar med par mi 'gro'o/_/su zhig nang par langs nas klog gam/_klog tu 'jug gam/_kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang /_shu ba dang glo na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las 
[\[217a.6\]]thar bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gar skyes gar gnas kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang 
[\[217a.7\]]phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/_/bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do/_/rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel 
[\[217b.2\]]rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//[ {D901}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[217b.3\]]'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[217b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das po Ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_mya ngan med pa dang /_a ti mug ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang /_sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag 
[\[217b.5\]]par brgyan par/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs 
[\[217b.6\]]cig tu bzhugs so/_/dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos 
[\[217b.7\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/_'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[218a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/_gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yang 'dus so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don 
[\[218a.3\]]yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang /_dbang 
[\[218a.4\]]phyug chen po dang /_tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod 
[\[218a.5\]]rten du 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i 
[\[218a.6\]]rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/_sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_dam pa'i chos la smod pa/_mnar med pa la gzhol ba/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[218a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de/_gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi pa'am/_de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru ba'am/_tshad ba'am/_
[\[218b.2\]]lag pa na pa'am/_rkang pa na ba'am/_mgo na ba'am/_ha la ha la yis btags pa'am/_mdze'am/_rkang shu'am/_'brum bu phra mo'am/_lhog pa'am/_'bras sam/_bye'u 'bras sam/_g.yan pa'am/_mtshan ma rdol 
[\[218b.3\]]ba'am/_'brum bu'am/_brjed byed dam/_khyab par na ba'am/_gsod pa'am/_'ching ba'am/_rdeg pa'am/_bsdigs pa'am/_mi snyan par brjod pa'am/_mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/_sems kyi sdug 
[\[218b.4\]]bsngal lam/_rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/_/sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang /_
[\[218b.5\]]rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/_gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang /_don 'dzin par byed pa/_'chang bar byed pa/_klog par byed pa/_'dri bar byed pa/_'drir 'jug par byed pa/_kun chub par byed pa/_
[\[218b.6\]]sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa'am tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed/_sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang /_dor ba med pa/_gzugs med pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_yang 
[\[218b.7\]]dag par 'byung ba med pa/_yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/_sgyu med pa/_gos pa med pa/_mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/_phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/_/ji snyed po tir bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/_phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa'am 
[\[219a.2\]]rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/_gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/_gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[219a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gang la la'i skyes bus tsan+dan nam/_ga pur ram/_gur gum mam/_gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba'am sa la gzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na de la tsan+dan nam/_ga pur ram/_gur gum mam/_gla rtsi gnur ba'am 
[\[219a.4\]]brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang /_snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed 
[\[219a.5\]]pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das dmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la'ang ngo /_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /_bsod 
[\[219a.6\]]nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do/_/gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen 
[\[219a.7\]]ma'am/_de las gzhan pa kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te/_lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs su bzlas na/_de la bcom 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o/_/nyi shu po gang zhe na/_gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang /_las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus 
[\[219b.2\]]dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang /_nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/_/nor yod pa yang rkun pos khyer bar mi nus so/_/mes mi 'tshig go/_/chus mi khyer ro/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[219b.3\]]yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/_/de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po 
[\[219b.4\]]chu'am thal ba la yongs su bsngags te/_phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar 
[\[219b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/dgra yis 'jigs pa byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/me yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa drag po'ang 
[\[219b.6\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar bsrung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[219b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob ste/_brgyad po gang zhe na/_'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba 'khrul ba med do/_/lag pa g.yob pa med do/_/bshang ba med do/_/gci ba med do/_/rlung gi rnam pa med 
[\[220a.2\]]do/_/shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de 
[\[220a.3\]]dang de ru skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/_/chang dang /_sha dang /_btsong dang /_sgog skya dang /_bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du bsrung bar 'dod pas 
[\[220a.4\]]de rnams spang bar bya'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o/_/slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni 
[\[220a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin no/_/sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/_/shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/_de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don 
[\[220a.6\]]nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang /_sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/_/de 
[\[220a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[220b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gson cig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang /_skye dgu'i 
[\[220b.3\]]tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang /_rnam par thar ba'i don gyi phyir yang ngo /_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/_na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+hAr+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yo\u0f85tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pa n+ne b+h+yaH/_na maHsaM myak+ga tA nAM/_na maHsaM 
[\[220b.4\]]myak+p+ra t+yut+pan+nA nAM/_na maHshA ra dwa tI pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/_na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa saM g+he b+h+yaH/_na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shi len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo\u0f85R+had+b+h+yaH/_saM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/_na maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa 
[\[220b.5\]]bi na rdi te shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsiM ha bi krI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHa mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsu pra tiSh+thi te ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsa man+ta rasmyut+ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi ba sh+yi ne ta thA 
[\[220b.6\]]ga tA ya/_na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkra kuts+tshA na dA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAR+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+ha 
[\[220b.7\]]ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_o~M sha me sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba sa twAMsh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/_na maHsu pa ri kIrti ta nA mad+he yA ya shri ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsa man+t+ra wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]na maHin+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo rat+na pra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo \u0f85pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi krAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_
[\[221a.2\]]na mo \u0f85tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+ne b+ho bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_smr-i ti baR+d+ha ni/_ma ti baR+d+ha ni/_ga ti baR+d+ha ni/_d+h+r-i ti baR+d+ha ni/_pradz+nyA baR+d+ha ni/_pra ti b+hA na baR+d+ha ni/_d+h+yA na baR+d+ha ni/_shA mas+thA baR+d+ha ni/_pi pa sh+ya na baR+d+ha ni/_sarba bo d+hi pak+Sha d+harma baR+d+ha ni/_sa 
[\[221a.3\]]ka la bud+d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra NA+e ya swA hA/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hAs+thA ma brAp+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_e b+h+yo nam skri twA/_i da mAr+yA ba lo 
[\[221a.4\]]ki te shwa ra mu khot+gir+N+Na/_a mo g+ha pA sha rA dza nA ma hri da yaM ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hu Shi taM/_ma ha tAM paR+Shan+mad+h+ye a ha mi dA nI mA baR+ta yiSh+yA mi sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dAHsarba kAr+yA Ni/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/_tad+ya thA/_o~M tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu 
[\[221a.5\]]ru/_ma ra ma ra/_mi ri mi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_ma hA pad+ma hasta/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu 
[\[221a.6\]]ku lu swA hA/_ma hA shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/_bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/_bod+ha bod+ha/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+tha ma prap+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_

[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ma ra ma ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_hA hA hI hI hU hU/_o~M kA ra prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_na ra na ra/_ba ra ba ra/_
[\[221b.2\]]ha ra ha ra/_ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+hA Sha b+hA Sha/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_b+ha ga wAn+sau ma/_A di t+ya/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_pra h+man+d+ra/_bA yu/_a g+ni/_d+ha na dA/_de ba/_r-i Shi gaNA b+h+yar+ts+tsi ta tsa ra Na/_su 
[\[221b.3\]]ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_sa nat+ku mA ra/_ru dra/_bA sa ba/_biSh+Nu/_d+ha na dA/_bA yu/_ag+ni r-i shi/_nA ya ka_/bi nA ya ka pa hu bi bid+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_tha ra tha ra/_
[\[221b.4\]]g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pa ra pa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/_bi lo ki ta/_lo ki shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/_sarba gu Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/_a ba lo ki te shwa ra/_
[\[221b.5\]]mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/_sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH/_sarbo ba sarge b+h+yaH/_sarbo gra he b+h+yaH/_sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/_sarba pi She b+h+yaH/_sarba dz+wa ra b+h+yaH/_e ba~M/_baM d+ha ban+d+ha na/_tA Da na/_

[\[221b.7\]]ta ma ta ma/_da ma da ma/_sha ma sha ma/_ma sa ma sa/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA ha mo\u0f85n+d+ha kA ra bi d+ha man/_ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/ma la ma la/_mi li mi li/_mu lu mu lu/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]Tu Tu/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e ne ya tsaR+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_ma hA b+hU ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka_/ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ba ra ba ra/_
[\[222a.2\]]sa ra sa ra/_ma ra ma ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ki Ti ki Ti/_ku Tu ku Tu/_ma Ta ma Ta/_ma hA bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si ta/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe te ya dz+nyA+o pa bI Ta/_rat+na mu ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nya shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA mu ku Ta/_ma hA ad+d+hu 
[\[222a.3\]]ta/_ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/_d+h+yA na/_sa mA d+hi/_bi mok+ShA pra kam+b+ya/_ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karmA wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka_/sarba dz+nya dz+nyA na pa ri bU ra ka_/sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka_/sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba 
[\[222a.4\]]satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/_a mo g+hA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/_a dzi tA ya swA hA/_a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/_i mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/_mA ra sai ne ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/_a b+ha yA ya swA hA/_a b+ha ya 
[\[222a.5\]]pra dA ya swA hA/_dza yA ya swA hA/_bi dza yA ya swA hA/_dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/_ba ra dA ya swA hA/_ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/_a kA la mri t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/_i dany+tsa me karma ku ru na maHstu te swA hA/_o~M ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M dza ye hU~M phaT swA hA/_
[\[222a.6\]]o~M dzra dzriM dzuM swA hA/_o~M hU~M dza ya swA hA/_o~M hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M pa su pa ti swA hA/_o~M A ro li ka swA hA/_o~M ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/_o~M A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/_ni ya tA ni ya ta be da nI yA shu 
[\[222a.7\]]b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wA na karma No\u0f85she Sha tAHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/_o~M pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_a~M bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA/_bklags pas las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/_/dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/a ga ru'i bdug spos dang /_thal ba dang /_chu dang /_yungs kar dang /_seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo /_/rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/_/
[\[222b.2\]]nad thams cad la mar ram/_mar nag gam/_chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/_/lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas gcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/_/lto ba na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa'am/_'jim bag gam/_chus kyang bya'o/_
[\[222b.3\]]mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/_/so'i nad la ka ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/_/mtshams bcing ba la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab pa 
[\[222b.4\]]byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no/_/thams cad du srung skud dam/_chu'am/_thal bas bya'o/_/gza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/_/rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/_/sbrul dang /_srin bu dang /_ba 
[\[222b.5\]]spu byi ba dang /_lhog pa dang /_gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o/_/mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/_rgya skyegs kyi chu'am/_sbrang rtsi'am/_shing mngar gyis bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i dus thams cad 
[\[222b.6\]]du rtsod pa dang /_mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o/_/yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing 
[\[222b.7\]]bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas na sems can thams cad bsrung ba yin no/_/nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang /_yams rnams zhi ba yin no/_/phyag rgya tsan+dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]du yongs su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas na khyim bsrung pa'o/_/pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi bsrung ba'o/_/tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang /_/'byung po 
[\[223a.2\]]dang /_rgyu skar thams cad las bsrung ba'o/_/rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rgyal ba dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_na gu li dang /_dri'i na gu li dang /_d+ha ra ni dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang /_dbang po'i lag pa dang /_
[\[223a.3\]]dri'i pri yang ku dang /_ta ka ra dang /_'khor lo dang /_'khor lo chen po dang /_rnam par gnon pa dang /_so ma rA dzi dang /_su nat+ta zhes bya ba ste/_de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas 
[\[223a.4\]]mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o/_/bud med rnams kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do/_/g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro/_/nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams 
[\[223a.5\]]cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no/_/dug dang mes mi tshugs so/_/dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang /_sprin dang /_thog ni chus 
[\[223a.6\]]rengs par byed do/_/ka ra pI ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do/_/de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus 
[\[223a.7\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]lha bzo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/nye bar spyod pa brgyad 
[\[223b.2\]]dang /_nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/_/a ka ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa'am/_dkar gsum za zhing /_dus gsum du 
[\[223b.3\]]khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[223b.4\]]par byed do/_/ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/_/sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de 
[\[223b.5\]]'dis byed do zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[223b.6\]]ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 
[\[223b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D902}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_da sha b+hU mi d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_sa bcu 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor bsgrub par 'gyur ba ni/_o~M zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 
[\[224a.2\]]'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar 
[\[224a.3\]]gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/_don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/_'phags 
[\[224a.4\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do/_/gsang sngags o~M zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/_/o~M b+huH/_yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas 
[\[224a.5\]]brjod byas na sa gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan snga na 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/_sngon gyi las 
[\[224a.6\]]ngan gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/_nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas kyang ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/_don yod zhags 
[\[224a.7\]]pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yi ge gnyis pa'o/_/o~M pad+me/_gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[224b.2\]]ston par mdzad/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/_thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/yi ge gsum pa'o/_/o~M pad+ma hrIH/_gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod 
[\[224b.3\]]byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba 
[\[224b.4\]]rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/_rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/_/mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing 
[\[224b.5\]]tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/phyir zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sa bzhi pa'o/_/o~M pad+ma b+hu dze/_gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas 
[\[224b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad do/_/sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/_rig 
[\[224b.7\]]sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/_rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]rtsa ba mtshungs pa med par skyed par 'gyur zhing /_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i rim par phye ba 'grub cing /_
[\[225a.2\]]rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad kyis shig_/yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/_/sa lnga ba'o/_/o~M pad+ma lo ki te/_gzungs sngags yi ge drug 
[\[225a.3\]]pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[225a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par 
[\[225a.5\]]dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog_/las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing /_khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams ni bcad/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[225a.6\]]thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs spyi ni khong du chud/_khyod kyis don yod pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/_khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/_
[\[225a.7\]]'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig_/o~M pad+ma dz+wa la hU~M d+h+r-i ka_/yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]thob par 'gyur la/_ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/_sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/_lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[225b.2\]]thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing /_gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[225b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang ste/_phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_
[\[225b.4\]]rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/_/'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba ces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod zhags pa 
[\[225b.5\]]pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_don yod zhags pa'i snying por rnam par sprul ba grub kyis/_rig sngags 'chang ba'i 
[\[225b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig_/oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/_gzungs kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che me shel 
[\[225b.7\]]ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/_sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa rang 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing /_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog pa mdzad/_legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/_

[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/_/gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod zhags

[\[226b.3\]]la gus pa/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/_bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/_/sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so//_//

[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mo g+ha shI la/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA shud+d+ha sa twa pad+ma bi 
[\[227a.2\]]b+hA Shi ta/_b+hu dza/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa man+ta a ba lo ki te hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas smyung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dran pas brjod par bya'o/_/de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas 
[\[227a.3\]]brjod bya'o/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du

[\[227b.1\]]pa gang yin pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur

[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gyi mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod

[\[228a.4\]]ma Ni ma hA pradz+nyA/_pad+ma d+hA ri Ni b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu

[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa don

[\[228b.3\]]bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D904}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang

[\[228b.6\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to/_/longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/
[\[229a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag 
[\[229a.3\]]tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_rgya mtsho phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_rdo rje dkyil 'khor 
[\[229a.4\]]gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_/mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_/phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[229a.5\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/_blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/_chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing /_mthong ba dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur 
[\[229a.6\]]bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/_gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing /_'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[229a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 
[\[229b.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kha ga me kha ga me/_tsak+Shu/_kha be/_shro tra kha be/_g+h+rA Na kha be/_dzi hwa kha be/_kA ya kha be/_ma na kha be/_sa ra kha be/_sa ra kha be/_sa ra kha be/_shU 
[\[229b.3\]]na tra kha be/_a na mi ta kha be/_a pra Ni hi ta kha be/_sa mA d+hi kha be/_pA ra mi tA kha be/_bo d+hi kha be/_sa ra sa ra sa ra/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/_d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ka la ka la ka la/_sang+g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_na mo dwA na ba tI nAM/_bud+d+ha 
[\[229b.4\]]ko TI nAM/_a d+hiSh+Than+tu mAM/_tsa ta sra paR+Sha do A yur ba lany+tsa da dan+tu/_tad+ya thA/_su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/_ma hA su ra b+hi/_mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[229b.5\]]satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sa mr-i dAn+tu mAM/_sa man+ta b+ha dra d+hA ra NI swA hA/_gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[229b.6\]]dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/_nang bar langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[229b.7\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/_/rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o/_/klad pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/_/
[\[230a.2\]]lto na ba la bya ba par bgyi'o/_/gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so/_/mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byug go/_/nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o/_/'di 
[\[230a.3\]]ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o/_/ji ste sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang /_mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/_des 
[\[230a.4\]]sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_bum pa gang pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bres te/_me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la/_tsan+dan dang a ka ru dang kun du ru'i 
[\[230a.5\]]bdug pas bdugs te/_mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/_tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_
[\[230a.6\]]bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ti li ban d+hA mi/_mi li ban d+hA mi/_tsi li mi li ban d+hA mi/_sI mi ban d+hA mi/_bdag gi mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/_chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur 
[\[230a.7\]]mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi li/_tsi le li/_e hi 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya swA hA/_'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/_des bdag 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/_dus gsum 
[\[230b.2\]]du khrus bgyi/_dus gsum du gos brdze bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad 
[\[230b.3\]]bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/_lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs su de 
[\[230b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang /_nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang /_byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 
[\[230b.5\]]rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[230b.6\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[230b.7\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]{D905}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya nI la kaN+Tha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[231a.2\]]rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par 
[\[231a.3\]]gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[231a.4\]]bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[231a.5\]]phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob 
[\[231a.6\]]par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ril 'dzeg par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag 
[\[231a.7\]]nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ri de rang snyil zhing zhig par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag gshin 
[\[231b.2\]]rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams rang tshim par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig_/na mo rat+na tra 
[\[231b.3\]]yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba ban+d+ha na/_ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_sarba pA pa sa mu dro ts+tshoSha na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba it+yu pa dra ba/_bi nA sha na ka rA ya/_sarba b+ha ye Shu 
[\[231b.4\]]tA ra NA ya/_ta s+ya nA ma skr-i twA/_i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/_nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da yaM/_A baR+ta yiSh+yA mi/_sarbA R+tha sA d+ha na na/_shu b+ha tse ta naM/_sarba b+hU tAnAM/_pA pa mAR+ga bi sho d+ha kaM_/tad+ya thA/_A lo ke/_A lo ke/_A lo ka/_a 
[\[231b.5\]]d+hi ba ti/_lo kA ti krAn+te/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/_he bo ng+hi sa twa/_he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA kA ru Ni ka_ma hA sma ra hr-i da yaM e h+ye hi/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ba ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/_ku ru ku ru/_karmA sA d+ha ya/_
[\[231b.6\]]sA d+ha ya/_bi d+yA na/_de hi de hi me rang+ga maM ga ma/_bi haM ga ma/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bIr+yan+te/_ma hA bir+yAn+te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ren+d+re shwa ra/_tsa la tsa la/_bi ma la mUrte/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_kr-iSh+NA dzi na/_dza TA mu ku TA/_a laM kr-i ta/_
[\[231b.7\]]sha rI ra lam b+ha/_pra lam ba/_bi lam pa/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/_ba la ba la/_ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la/_ma hA ma la/_tsa la tsa la/_ma hA tsa la/_kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/_kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha/_kr-iSh+Na pA na nir+g+hA ta na/_he pad+ma ha sta/_tsa ra tsa ra/_nish+tsa re shwa ra kr-iSh+Na 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/_e h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/_ma hA bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/_nA rA ya Na/_rU pa ba la be ga d+ha ri/_he nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi ma hA ha la ha la/_bi Na ni rdzi ta/_lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha na/_dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA 
[\[232a.2\]]sha na/_mo ha bi Sha bi nA sha na ni rmo k+Sha Na/_hu lu hu lu/_ma hA hu lu ha re/_ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_bu d+h+ya/_bu d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya/_bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/_bA ma s+thi ta/_ma hA sid+ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+tsa 
[\[232a.3\]]muny+tsa/_ma hAT+Ta T+Ta hA sa/_e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/_yo gI shwa ra/_b+ha Na b+ha Na/_bA tsa na/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi d+yA na/_sma ra sma ra twaM b+ha ga paM taM/_lo kA nu pi lo ki taM/_ta thA ga ta taM/_de hi de hi/_me daR+sha na kA ma s+ya/_daR+sha naM pra sA d+hA ya me swA hA/_sid+d+hA 
[\[232a.4\]]ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+hA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_sing ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra sing ha mu khA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_sid+d+hi bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha 
[\[232a.5\]]rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo d+ha ra bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shad+kha shab+da niR+NA da na ka rA ya swA hA/_bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/_bA ma s+thi ta kan+d+ha de sha kr-iSh+Na dzi nA ya swA hA/_
[\[232a.6\]]byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/_lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_ma hA yo gi nI shwa rA ya swA hA/_sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu 
[\[232a.7\]]me man+t+ra ba dA ni swA hA/_'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D906}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ya grI ba d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa nA ga ti ne/_na maH
[\[232b.2\]]sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa na/_A ba ha ri Ni/_na maHsarba satwa b+ha yot+ta ra NA ya/_na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba/_pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsi kit+saM ka rA ya/_na maHsarba ban+d+ha na/_ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba duHkha pra mo k+Sha na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba an+b+ha 
[\[232b.3\]]ka rA bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba bi d+yA rA dza/_ba sha prAp+ta ye/_ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya ta s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khot+gIr+NaM r-i Shi bi da dA/_de ba nA ga/_yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/_shAkya pra h+ma/_lo ka pA la biSh+NA ma he shwa ra/_na rA ya NA/_skan+d+ha 
[\[232b.4\]]ku be ra/_a su ren+d+ra/_ma tr-i ga Na/_na ma skri taM/_badzra khu ra sa hi yaM/_ha ya grI ba pra h+ma/_pa ra ma hr-i da ya/_ma brta yiSh+yA mi/_a ba pra me yAr+ha sa d+ha kaM/_a ba h+yaM/_arba b+hU tA nAM/_sarba bi g+h+na bi nA ya kaM/_a mo g+haM/_sarba karma NaM/_bi shA nany+tsa 
[\[232b.5\]]bi nA ya kaM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ta ru la ta ru la/_bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/_sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/_sarba b+hU ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/_a na li/_bi spu ling+ga/_aT+Ta hA sa/_ke sa ra/_a to pA/_pra bi ta ka yaM badzra khu ra ni rga ti ta/_tsa li ta bA su dA ta la/_badzrod shwa se 
[\[232b.6\]]ta/_hA si ta ma ru to k+Sha ti/_pra sha man ka ra/_pa ra duSh+Ta bi g+h+na na/_saM b+ha k+Sha Na ka ra/_swa bi d+d+ho pa de sha ka ra/_pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bo d+ha yA mi te/_b+ha ga bA na ha ya grI ba/_sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/_mA brta yiSh+yA mi/_khA da khA da/_ma hA rau dra/_
[\[232b.7\]]man+t+ran/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_At+ma swa hi tA na man+t+ran/_sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/_sarba karme Shu me/_sid+d+he/_de hi de hi/_A be sha A be sha/_pra be sha pra be sha/_sarba gra he Shu/_a pra ti ha ta/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_sarba ba ro pa 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gra ma/_kr-i ta ka khordo/_dur lad+g+hi ta/_mu shi ka/_bi Sha ka ra/_bi Sha daM Sh+Ta bi Sha tsUr+Na yo a b+hi tsA ra biSha ka ra Na/_sid+d+ha any+dza na/_tsak+Shu rmo ha na/_tsit+ta bA k+She pa na ka ra/_Ni t+ya/_a ba_ra pre k+Sha Na/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_ma hA bo 
[\[233a.2\]]d+hi sa twa r-id+b+h+ya daMSh+Ta Ne na/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nAM rak+Sha rak+Sha/_ma ma bud+d+ha/_d+harma saM g+ha/_a nu dz+nyA taM/_me karma/_shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru phaT/_ha ya grI ba phaT/_badzra khu rA ya phaT/_badzra daMSh+Tod ka Ta/_b+ha ya b+he ra bA ya phaT/_pa ra man+tA na nA sha na ka rA ya 
[\[233a.3\]]phaT/_pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+nA na/_baM b+ha k+Sha Na ka rA ya phaT/_sarba gra hot+sA d+ha na ka rA ya phaT/_sarba gra heShu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/_pa Ta la mu khA ya phaT/_ye ke tsi ta/_ma ma a hi te Shi na/_ka ye kra man+ti/_man+t+ra yan+ta/_ya mAn+ti/_dzu hwa na ti/_
[\[233a.4\]]kA kho rdaM kurba n+ti/_ta ni sarba na b+ha mu khe na/_bA kri hA ya phaT/_na maHsarba du Sh+Ta grA hot+sA d+ha nA ya/_ha ya grI bA ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu man+t+ra ba daiHswa hA/_oM a mi to da b+ha bA ya hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_o~M na mo ha yA ya swA hA/_o~M na mo bi shwa mUrta ye swA hA/_na maH
[\[233a.5\]]sarba satwA nAM/_sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dA ya swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D907}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya me kha la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[233a.6\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na/_shing n+ya gro 
[\[233a.7\]]d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin mal na nyal ba las srin po zhig gis dngangs par byas par gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas gzhon nu mang po rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_spyan sngar 'dug nas ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[233b.2\]]kun dga' bo gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bsrung ba'i phyir me kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bshad kyis khyod kyis zungs shig_/lha'i tshogs dang /_klu'i tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /_srin po'i tshogs dang /_lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[233b.3\]]tshogs dang /_mi'am ci'i tshogs dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang /_sha za'i tshogs dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshogs dang /_grul bum gyi tshogs dang /_srul po'i tshogs dang /_gza'i tshogs dang /_rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[233b.4\]]gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_drang srong 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang /_gangs la gnas pa dang /_phyogs bcu na 'byung po gang dag 'khod pa dang /_sring mo'i tshogs dang /_bA li dang /_kA Ta li di dang /_
[\[233b.5\]]bo da ri dang /_grong rna dang /_yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_'phrog ma chen mo dang /_ma mo'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig_/rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi srung ma shar phyogs kyi phyogs cha na srin mo 'phrog ma zhes bya ba dang /_lho phyogs kyi phyogs cha na srin mo glang sna 
[\[233b.6\]]ma zhes bya ba dang /_nub phyogs kyi phyogs cha na srin mo ral pa can zhes bya ba dang /_byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha na srin mo sa'i gtsug ces bya ba ste/_srin mo drag mo de dag re re la yang 'khor bye ba drug cus bskor ba me kha la'i rig sngags las brjod pa de dag 
[\[233b.7\]]thams cad kyis bsrung bar gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne/_ba ti/_g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/_ba ti/_g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re g+ha re/_g+hi ri ri ni/_g+ha ra ba ti/_swa ra ba ti/_d+ha na pa ti 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]su ra ba ti/_a hi me/_ba ti ma ti/_a ba ti/_su ba ti/_ba hu ba ti/_ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la/_hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li/_hu la hu la hu la hu la hu la hu la hu la hu lu/_ti li ti li ti li

[\[234a.4\]]'di ni sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang /_bde ba'i phyir dang /_bsrung zhing sba ba'i bar du bya ba'i phyir 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/drang srong chen po gzhan dag gis kyang smras te/_kun dga' bo me kha la'i

[\[238a.1\]]chos kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang /_bden par smra ba rnams kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang /_drang srong gi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/_'byung

[\[238a.3\]]par tho 'tsham par ma byed cig_/'tshe bar ma byed cig_/gang yang rdeg par ma byed cig swA hA/_me kha la'i rig sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la me tog gi mchod pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_lha bshos dag phul nas phyis 
[\[238a.4\]]bsrung bar bya'o/_/gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas me tog dag bkram ste/_ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma'am/_phye'am/_pad+ma dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_me tog bsres pas 
[\[238a.5\]]bum pa bkang ba'am/_snod bkang pa'i dbus su 'dug nas spos kyis rgyun mi 'chad par 'dug par bya'o/_/rtswa ku shas thams cad la byab par bya'o/_/bdag bsrung ba dang /_gzhan bsrung bar bya ba ni skud pas so/_/sprin bcing ba ni me tog 
[\[238a.6\]]sna ma'i shing dang /_sna ma'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rlung dang /_char bzlog pa ni rtswa muny+dza'i lhas ma la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/_rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bdun btab nas mdud pa bdun bor bar bya'o/_/lam grub pa dang /_
[\[238a.7\]]bde bar bya na chos gos kyi grwar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa gsum bor bar bya'o/_/zas dkar gsum zos la nyin zhag gsum smyung ba byas nas pad+ma dang /_yungs kar dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_grong dang /_
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]grong khyer mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/rig sngags thams cad gcod par 'dod pas sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te chu la gcad par bya'o/_/snod sar par chu blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_khrus byas na 
[\[238b.2\]]log 'dren thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dkar po dag la bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas byab par bya ste/_bdag bsrung ba byas na gang du gdon gyi phyir 
[\[238b.3\]]yang las thams cad bya'o/_/'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du sna ma'i me tog gi 'bru mar gyi nang du a ti mug ta ka smyugs pa'i yam sreg shing la 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis btab ste lan bcu bzhir 
[\[238b.4\]]sbyin sreg bya'o/_/'byung po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ra'i 'o ma dang /_ra'i mar dang /_shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dag la 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags btab ste lan lngar sbyin sreg bya'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sreg bya bar 
[\[238b.5\]]'dod pas 'bras thug po che dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_ru rta dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing ka ra bI ra dkar po'i yam sreg shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_sbyin sreg byas na sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sreg byas par 
[\[238b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/rnyed par bya ba'i don du ru rta dang /_'bru mar las 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdong la bskus nas smras na gang bslangs pa de thob par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin

[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gzhon nu sgra gcan zin dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi

[\[239b.1\]]thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin gyi rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/_/ra la ra la/_ri li ri li/_ru lu ru lu/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i

[\[240b.1\]]theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi phar gyur pa/_mar gyur pa/_skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen ma mchis pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen dang /_mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa/_

[\[240b.5\]]gyur pa zhig 'dug pa des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di bram ze brgya stong mang po dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma las bsgrags/_bshad/_bstan te/_de dag

[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]zhing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo'i gsang

[\[242a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan cig tsam brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam/_bris nas lus la bcangs sam/_mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang /_de dang nye ba'i sdig

[\[242b.1\]]ka Ta~M ka Te/_ka ro Te/_ka ro ta/_bIr+ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci bas la ma lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la/_maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te/_nad pa la nye
