[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]na mo b+ha ga ba te/_bai ro tsa nA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_sarba a dz+nyA na d+ha kA ra sha ma yi tre/_tad+ya thA/_sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/_sid+d+ha bid+d+ha ri/_b+ha ga ba ti pa raM pA ra/_kle sha d+ha pa ti/_a dz+nyA na sha 
[\[243a.2\]]ma nI sha mA ya/_sarba pA paM bi shud+d+ha d+harme ni rma la dz+nyA na go tsa re/_a saM ga tsa ri Ni pra sha ma mUrti su kha pra te sarba kle sha d+ha ba ti/_sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/_bi d+ha mA ni/_bi na shA ni bi na shA ni/_bi na shA ya bi na shA ya/_b+ha ga ba ti su ra sa bi ma la bud+d+hi/_sa 
[\[243a.3\]]ra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_su ru su ru/_sU ra sU ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_a dz+wa na ma ko Ti sa ha sra saM tsi taM karmaM A pa ra Ni k+Sha pa ya/_k+She ma ba ti bud+d+ha bi ShA ya/_pa sha brti ni pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa re/_bi she Sha ba ti/_a she Sha 
[\[243a.4\]]ma li ni/_kA ru Na go tsa re/_ma hA dz+nyA na/_a b+hi She ka ba ti/_su bi ni sh+tsi ta d+harme/_he he b+ha ga ba ti/_ma hA ka ru Ne ku ru ku ru/_bi sho d+ha ya/_ma~M sarba sa twa~M sh+tsa/_ma hA ka ru Not+se ke na sa na siny+tsA ya/_sa ma ba d+hA ya/_sa ma b+ha lA ya/_pra ro hA 
[\[243a.5\]]ye me/_ma hA ka ru Na bi dza na pa ri shud+d+ha ya/_a mo g+ha me ku ru dzI bi tan rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/_b+ha ga ba ti ma ma hA bo d+hi tsit+taM saM mU h+yed ma san+tu shud bi ti mi ka ru Ni/_bud+d+ha bo d+hi pra te/_na ra ka pre ta tir+ya ga ti duHkhe na mU la ni/_de ba ma nu Sh+ya ga ti saM pa ha na bi ga to 
[\[243a.6\]]pa kle she/_sarba bud+d+ha d+harmA pa ri pU ra Ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba 'di ni gzungs grangs med pa phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa'o/_/sdig pa dang /_las dang /_
[\[243a.7\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/_/bkra mi shis pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/_/tshe dang /_bsod nams dang /_gzugs dang /_stobs dang /_bde 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_nad med par byed pa'o/_/'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon thams cad nges par 'joms pa'o/_/gzungs 'di'i 
[\[243b.2\]]ming gzung ba dang /_thos pa dang /_brjod pa tsam gyis kyang tshe rabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad 
[\[243b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/snying rje las 
[\[243b.4\]]kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang mngon par dga' bar bya bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin dus gsum/_mtshan dus gsum du lan bdun bdun brjod na sdig pa thams cad las rnam par thar par 'gyur la/_byang chub sems 
[\[243b.5\]]dpa'i yon tan stong phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa'i dus su skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug la/_lag pa gru gsum gyi phyag rgya byas nas/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[243b.6\]]cad la dmigs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdag nyid chen po mngon du bsams nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/_yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/_de la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsam pa 
[\[243b.7\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/_bsnyen gnas blangs nas gos dkar po bgos te/_sbyin pa byas la byang 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]chub kyi sems chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba des rang gi lag gis dkyil 'khor byugs la/_me tog kha dog sna gsum gyis mchod nas tsan+dan dkar pos bdugs la/_'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag 
[\[244a.2\]]mtha' yas pa dag na mchod pa dang /_bkur sti chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsams te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a.3\]]pa'i snying po stong chen po 'bar ba 'byung ba 'di nam dga' ba chen po skyes kyi bar du brjod na/_bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug par shes shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zang zing med pa'i chos kyi longs spyod chen po'i 
[\[244a.4\]]dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/_de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyir mi ldog par skyes pa yin no/_/tshe rabs gzhan du song na yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang chen po'i 'khor los 
[\[244a.5\]]sgyur ba yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la yang sems can thams cad dga' 
[\[244a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/_gang la smras pa de 
[\[244a.7\]]de'i bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/des ci bsams pa dang /_byed du bcug pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sus kyang ngag mi gcog par yang 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang /_gzugs dang /_bsod nams dang /_lang tsho dang /_nad med pa dang /_rgyas pa 'phel bar byed do/_/bgegs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na 
[\[244b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[244b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gang zag byed pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang /_rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i de kho 
[\[244b.4\]]na rtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[244b.5\]]chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bsten pa 'di thog mar bsgrim pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blang bar bya'o/_/snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[244b.6\]{D914}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a nan+ta mu kha sA d+hA ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[244b.7\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 
[\[245a.2\]]dag btang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal te/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod song la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa 
[\[245a.3\]]brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir sdus shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo 
[\[245a.4\]]la 'dug ste/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/_bder gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag_/'jig rten khams 'dir gnas pa kun nyon cig_/deng 'dir ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs kyis/_/gang dag nyan 
[\[245a.5\]]par 'dod pa 'dir sheg shig_/de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/_de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_

[\[245a.7\]]pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'du byas te/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'du byas

[\[245b.3\]{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'dus par gyur te/_de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas

[\[246a.1\]]chen po spos kyi glang po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med

[\[247b.7\]]man+ta mu khe/_sarba twA nu ga te/_a nA ts+tshe d+ye pri ti b+ha ne/_d+hA ra NI ni d+hA ne/_d+harma ni d+hA ni/_d+harma ni d+hA na go tre/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed/_dmigs par mi byed/_dmod par mi byed/_btang snyoms su mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_rtsom par mi byed de/_de dag thob par bya ba dang /_
[\[248a.2\]]spang bar bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/_rnam par mi byed/_mngon par 'du mi byed/_mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong /_chos rnams kyi skye ba yang mi mthong /_
[\[248a.3\]]'gog pa yang mi mthong /_'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'bri bar yang mi mthong /_chos gang yang sogs par yang mi byed/_
[\[248a.4\]]'grib par yang mi byed/_'dogs par yang mi byed/_rnam par rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig sgom ste/_de sgom pa na gzugs su ma yin/_gzugs med par ma yin/_mtshan du ma yin/_mtshan med par ma yin/_dpe 
[\[248a.5\]]byad bzang por ma yin/_dpe byad bzang po med par ma yin/_rnam par shes par ma yin/_rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/_tshul khrims su ma yin/_tshul khrims med par ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[248a.6\]]du ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/_shes rab tu ma yin/_shes rab med par ma yin/_rnam par grol bar ma yin/_rnam par grol ba med par ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par 
[\[248a.7\]]ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_skye ba med par ma yin/_rigs su ma yin/_rigs med par ma yin/_rus su ma yin/_rus med par ma yin/_'khor du ma yin/_'khor med par ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/_gnas med par ma yin/_thob par ma yin/_
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]thob pa med par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa zad par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa ma zad par ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched du ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 
[\[248b.2\]]med par ma yin/_shes par ma yin/_shes pa med par ma yin/_chos ston par ma yin/_chos mi ston par ma yin/_bdag rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_gzhan rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_sems can rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_sems can 
[\[248b.3\]]med pa rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_bdag gi don du ma yin/_gzhan gyi don du ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_'dul bar ma yin/_lus rnam par dag par ma yin/_ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/_yid rnam par dag par ma yin/_spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_
[\[248b.4\]]sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_bdag gi rnam par ma yin/_gzhan gyi rnam par ma yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[248b.5\]]po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/don dam pa sgrub pas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/gcig tu nges par thob pas bsam pa thams cad 
[\[248b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes sgrub pas chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/dam pa yongs su tshol ba la 
[\[248b.7\]]mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad kyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro/_/dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 
[\[249a.2\]]nyid las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi bye brag chod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos rnams stong par dogs med cing /_/byang chub ched 
[\[249a.3\]]du spros mi byed/_/chos dbyings 'khrugs par mi byed na/_/de phyir gzungs ni thob par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bya/_/'di la gzungs ni zad pa med/_/ye shes 'byor 'di 'di lta ste/_/des na byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub 
[\[249a.4\]]sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/gzungs 'di rab tu gzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur/_/don dang tshig 'brus bskyod kun gyi/_/mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa/_/de 
[\[249a.5\]]snyed tshig rnams shes par 'gyur/_/gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba/_/rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin de la/_/thams cad rtag tu mngon du 'gyur/_/gal te sems can thams cad kyis/_/de la bskal par dogs dris te/_/
[\[249a.6\]]the tshom thams cad chad gyur kyang /_/de yi ye shes mi zad do/_/mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/_/de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_/byang chub mchog la nye ba ste/_/yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa/_/de la sems can 
[\[249a.7\]]thams cad dga'/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes/_/grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong /_/lag pa de la nye bar 'jog_/gzungs 'di 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'dzin par byed pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa/_/zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang /_/bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zla 
[\[249b.2\]]ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur/_/khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa/_/gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang /_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de la bar chad byed mi nus/_/byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du de/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur/_/gzungs 
[\[249b.3\]]kyi dam pa gang yin pa/_/de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas/_/ji ltar mdo sde bstan 'di la/_/gzungs ni so sor nges pa bzhin/_/'di las thams cad mkhyen pa bstan/_/'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang /_/mar me zhes 
[\[249b.4\]]byas nga lung bstan/_/skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong /_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing /_/mdo sde 'di la bsten pa des/_/thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam 
[\[249b.5\]]dag dang /_/nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa/_/mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur/_/de bas bag ni yod gyur la/_/zhag bdun bar du 'di sems pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis/_/de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur/_/
[\[249b.6\]]bsam bya sems par mi bsam ste/_/bsam bya min yang mi bsam mo/_/soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig_/de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur/_/dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi/_/nor la som nyi med pa ltar/_/de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur 
[\[249b.7\]]nas/_/bde ba la yang som nyi med/_/'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye/_/de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/_sems 
[\[250a.2\]]can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/_nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin te nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa 
[\[250a.3\]]yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba/_/'dod pa 
[\[250a.4\]]dri nga spang bar byos/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen/_/ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin/_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir/_/pha rol dag la phrag dog mi bya ste/_/dga' ba'i mig gis sems can bltas byas na/_/mthu che ba dang gzugs 
[\[250a.5\]]kyang mdzes par 'gyur/_/sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba/_/de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_/de ltas gang la sred par 'gyur ba spangs/_/sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur/_/gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems/_/nyin 
[\[250a.6\]]dang mtshan du chos ni btsal bar byos/_/chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag sten byed na/_/de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong /_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[250a.7\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa dang /_dben pa la gnas pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs skyed pa nyid dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa dang sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta zhing /_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]tha na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[250b.2\]]rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/_/de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya/_/zab mo'i bzod la 'dun pa bskyed nas su/_/bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/_/'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa/_/
[\[250b.3\]]shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/_/bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon dag gis chog byas te/_/mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos/_/kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa legs par rnyed/_/sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim yang spangs/_/lus dang ngag 
[\[250b.4\]]dang yid kyang yongs dag pas/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis/_/rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab min/_/dad dang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min/_/de ni byang chub ring ste gnam sa bzhin/_/de ltar rnyed pa yongs su spang bar 
[\[250b.5\]]bya/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o/_/brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pa zhes 
[\[250b.6\]]bya ba don dam par chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ba zhes bya ba byis 
[\[250b.7\]]pa'i chos rnams dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang /_skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ka zhes bya ba 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]las dang rnam par smin pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_d+ha zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[251a.2\]]la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_sha zhes bya ba zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_k+Sha zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste/_gzod ma nas 
[\[251a.3\]]zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang /_chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa khong du chud pa ste/_de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa dang 
[\[251a.4\]]po'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te gzung bar bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni 
[\[251a.5\]]don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_
[\[251a.6\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la gzud pa'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[251a.7\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya/_/mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/_/zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya/_/sems can rnams kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya/_/byang chub nye dang 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]shes rab rgya yang che/_/phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang su dag_/bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong /_/de phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'di la bslab/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang 
[\[251b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang /_de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang /_de'i las kyi 
[\[251b.3\]]sgrib pa myur du 'byang ba dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par myur du 'thob pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin no/_/de nas bcom 
[\[251b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad/_de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byang /_/spobs pa mtha' yas rnams 
[\[251b.5\]]kyang thob par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa rgya cher gyur pa/_tshad med dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[251b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[251b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]kyi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin ces bya ba mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_/de skyes nas lo bcu drug 
[\[252a.2\]]lon pa dang /_des sgo mtha' pas sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/_
[\[252a.3\]]des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis ma bsten to/_/non par ma gyur to/_/de lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dga' ba'am/_nor la dga' ba'am/_bdag la dga' 
[\[252a.4\]]bar ma gyur to/_/de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yangs la glos ma phab ste/_gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos te/_thos nas kyang nyams su blangs so/_/thams 
[\[252a.5\]]cad bzung ngo /_/gzungs nyams su blangs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de nyid las rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas 
[\[252a.6\]]de lo dgu khri 'das pa dang /_des sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di bsgrubs te/_bsgrubs nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/_/des tshe gcig po de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu bla 
[\[252a.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod do/_/des sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge slong de las thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/_de rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so/_/thos nas 
[\[252b.2\]]kyang nyams su blangs so/_/thams cad bzung ngo /_/thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa dang gzungs su gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 
[\[252b.3\]]rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/des bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so/_/mnyes par byas nas bskal pa gsum 'das pa dang /_bla na med pa yang 
[\[252b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za bar gyur 
[\[252b.5\]]na/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[252b.6\]]shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang /_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za bar gyur na/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/
[\[252b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]shA ri'i bu nga dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rangs te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 
[\[253a.2\]]ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrir 'khor ba phyir brnyil to/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa yang thos te/_thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa 
[\[253a.3\]]rnams kyi mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[253a.4\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang bar yang brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med pa yang 
[\[253a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /_chos smra ba rnams mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul 
[\[253a.6\]]bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/_bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa'am/_bsam par mi nus 
[\[253a.7\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang /_/yi ger bris dang gzung dang bklags pa yis/_/bsod nams chu po ji tsam bskyed pa ni/_/sems can 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]kun gyis shes par yong mi nus/_/de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong /_/de dag la yang dad pa bsam yas rnyed/_/mdo sde zab mo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur/_/de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/_/bla med byang chub ma reg bar du 
[\[253b.2\]]yang /_/de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang /_/gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang /_/sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/_/rjes su dran pa sngon gyi tshe rabs na/_/tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thos 
[\[253b.3\]]gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong gyur te/_/des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnams sangs rgyas/_/mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon bu/_/sngon gyi tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur/_/de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas tshe dpag med/_/
[\[253b.4\]]nga ni bskal pa bzang dang bcas yi rang /_/byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang /_/bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang /_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa/_/'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/gang gA'i 
[\[253b.5\]]klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams/_/gang gis rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin yang /_/bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thos nas rtse gcig bag yod par/_/byang chub 
[\[253b.6\]]sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung ngam/_/gzungs 'di bris shing sems pa de dag ni/_/byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sgo mtha' yas 
[\[253b.7\]]pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la/_gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad gzi brjid dang mdangs 'jug cing nyin mtshan du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]par byed do/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang /_brtan po dang /_bdag po dang /_sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang /_spyod pa'i blo gros dang /_thub dka' dang /_'jigs su rung ba dang /_gnod sbyin lag 
[\[254a.2\]]bzang zhes bya ba ste/_gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba dang /_gos shin tu gtsang ma bgo ba dang /_'chag sar 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[254a.3\]]grangs 'di yang yid la byas te/_de ltar byas na de la gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po 'di dag kyang de la sems 
[\[254a.4\]]par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang /_snang byed dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_yang dag skul byed dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[254a.5\]]rdzogs byed dang /_skar ma'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par 'gyur 
[\[254a.6\]]ro/_/gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o/_/byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba can dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos la dga' ba dang /_zab mo'i chos la 
[\[254a.7\]]bzod pa mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas kun 'gyed bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can du bya ste/_des ji ltar chung ba dang /_ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par bya na mang po 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]las lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma sum cus ni sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/_bla na 
[\[254b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag drug cus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[254b.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[254b.4\]]bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par mngon par 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bdud thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa 
[\[254b.5\]]zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gcig tu nges pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_
[\[254b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[254b.7\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes TI ka dang sbyar te slad kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]{D915}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su mu khaM nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[255a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen 
[\[255a.3\]]po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[255a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[255a.5\]]dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/_gang gis sems 
[\[255a.6\]]can rnams la snang ba bgyi bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad kyis gnod pa mi bgyi bar bsrung ba dang /_bskyab par 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste/_lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams 
[\[255a.7\]]dang /_srin po'i dbang po rnams dang /_'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa dang /_mtshon dang /_dug dang /_byad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_phar mchi'am/_slar mchi'am/_nyal lam/_
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]gnyid kyis log gam/_smyos sam/_rab tu smyos kyang rung thams cad du yang skyob par 'gyur pa de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/_ji ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang /_rtag tu 
[\[255b.2\]]srung ba dang /_yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_nad dang /_dus 
[\[255b.3\]]ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba 
[\[255b.4\]]btab par thugs su chud nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[255b.5\]]yid la zung shig dang /_sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o/_/u gu mu gu ba li ni/_ban d+ha ni/_ba la tsa ma na/_ba hu ba hu ba hu li brtA ya swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags gzhi 
[\[255b.6\]]rnams bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzrI badzrI badzrI badzrI d+ha ri/_badzrA pA Ni/_badzrI d+ha ri/_tsakra badzrI/_tsakra d+ha ri/_pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/_b+hi ri/_mu ri/_tsi ri/_a 
[\[255b.7\]]hu ri/_b+ha ga/_b+hi b+hi ri/_shi ri tra/_shi ri/_ru ru tse/_ru ru tse/_tsa ri tsa ri/_da ri tsa le/_tsu ri mu ri paN+Da re/_sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/_tad+ya thA/_ban+d+hi da/_ga ga ri Ni/_murta ni/_pra mUrta ni/_nA sha ni/_pra nA sha ni/_nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa 'di lta ste/_nA shA ni/_nA sha ni/_ban+d+ha ni/_
[\[256a.2\]]ban+d+ha ni/_ts+tshin+da ni/_ts+tshin+da ni/_tsi re mi re/_ma he ha da ni/_ba ni ba re/_kha re be re/_bi ri bi ri/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_su Sha Ni/_sha ra Ni/_ba ru ba ri Ni/_bar hU~M ye/_prah+ma tsA ri Ni/_in+d+ra ba ti/_d+hi d+hi rI ya Ni/_na mo ma he shwa ra ya ni/_r-i shi/_b+hany+dza 
[\[256a.3\]]ni bA ba dza ha ni kA la pa ti ni/_b+hu ta ba da ni/_sat+ya ga the/_so ma bA di/_so ma pra b+he swA hA/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_tad+ya thA/_ha ra ha ra ha ra hA ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_i Di ta ga Di ta/_ba di da/_a ye na/_a ri/_bany+dza ni/_ka kIrta ni/_pu tra da da hA ni/_
[\[256a.4\]]marga a b+hi ro ha ni/_hu sa ba ti/_mu pa ba di/_hi li hi li/_ya thA ba dzu ya/_ya thA ag+ni/_ya thA ba ran tsa ya thA na la ya/_ya thA badzra Na/_ya thA hr-i da ya swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

[\[256a.6\]]nga yang 'chad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer phyung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo /_/'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 
[\[256a.7\]]nas chas te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]snang bar byed pa/_mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/_dran par byed pa bshad pa legs so legs so/_/bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab bo/_legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 
[\[256b.2\]]'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[256b.3\]]kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid 
[\[256b.4\]]dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su chud par 'gyur ba dang /_lha thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ba dang /_dge bar spyod par 
[\[256b.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang /_snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa

[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/_/su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa de rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad 
[\[257a.2\]]las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka/_tsi tsi tsi tsi/_b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/_ru ru ru ru/_dzi dzi dzi dzi/_gra gra gra gra/_hri hri hri hri/_ha ha ha ha/_ma ma ma ma/_ha na ha na me/_sarba prat+yaR+thi kA/_da ha da ha me/_sarba sha 
[\[257a.3\]]tra ba/_pa tsa pa tsa me/_sarba a hi te Shi na swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos grub dam pa'i 
[\[257a.4\]]gzungs sngags gzhi rnams smras pa legs so legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog 
[\[257a.5\]]pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li tsi li swA hA/_prah+ma swa re swA hA/_prah+ma a ba su gar+b+he/_a ka la be/_pu Sha saM sta re swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang nang 
[\[257a.6\]]par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[257a.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis gzungs 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sngags gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi tsit+te/_pa ra Ni/_da mA raN+De/_dit+ta tit+tit+ti gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri sa ra ma tan+ta/_badzra tu la ni/_dz+wA la mA la li ni/_tsakra bA ka/_sha ba re sha ba re/_sha ma re sha ma re swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen

[\[257b.3\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs

[\[257b.5\]]ma mo 'phrog mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa dang /_yid la bgyid pa'i 
[\[257b.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_pi li si pa pi li/_si li/_ma hA pi pi li/_si me li si/_gu ru Ne/_gu ru gu ru Ne 
[\[257b.7\]]ma hA gu ru Ne phu swA hA/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_aT+Te phu/_baT+Te phu/_naT+Te phu/_ku naT+Te phu/_ma naT+Te phu/_muN+Da 
[\[258a.2\]]ta ha ke phu/_shri phu b+haM ge phu/_ma~M ge phu swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[258a.3\]]grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[258a.4\]]chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/_/mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi badzre/_he badzre/_hI hA/_bi si bi si/_ma hA bi si phu swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[258a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par
