[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]{D919}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ru tsi ra a~M ga yaSh+Thi nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo bi pu la 
[\[262b.2\]]bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te a sa~M khe ya/_sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza/_pra b+ha a ba b+ha se ta mUrta ye/_ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la/_a la~M ka ra d+hA ri Ne b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/_sarba lo ka a pa ya sha ma nA ya/_bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biSh+Tha/_sarba 
[\[262b.3\]]satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/_ma hA A lo ka ka raN ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi nA sha ka/_rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/_sha sa ka rak+Sha ka/_sarba a pA ya durga ti pra sha ma ka/_sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/_sarba A sha 
[\[262b.4\]]pa ri pU ra ka/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa~M b+ha na ka ra/_he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_ba ra ba ra dA ya ka/_pad+ma A lo ka sa~M b+ha ta/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka/_dza TA mu ku Ta/_a la~M kr-i ta shi rA/_ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/_sha ta badzra baiDUr+ya a la~M kr-i ta sha rI ra/_a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la 
[\[262b.5\]]a la~M kr-i ta/_pra b+ha ra Na rA dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la Shi ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa bar bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_bi nA sha ya/_bi nA sha ya/_ma hA yA~M tra kle sha ka ba TA a ba bad+d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa saM sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/_pu ru Sha pad+ma/_pu ru Sha nA ga/_pu ru Sha sA ga 
[\[262b.6\]]ra/_pu ru Sha siM ha/_bi ha/_bi ra bi ra dza/_su dAn+ta pa ri bri ta/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra shA sa yA/_pra shA sa yA/_pra d+h+wa na sA ya/_pra d+h+wan sA ya/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_bi bi ri/_
[\[262b.7\]]bi bi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na/_bi d+hu na/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_g+ha ya g+ha ya/_g+hA d+ha ya g+hA d+ha ya/_ha sa ha sa/_pra ha sa pra ha sa/_nA nA bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa nA/_ha ra ha ra/_
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]sa~M nya ra sa~M ha ra/_d+hu ru Ti/_d+hu ru Ti/_ma hA maN+Da a laM ka ra Na/_sha ta pra se ka/_a ba bA si ta ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_byang 
[\[263a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dam pa/_rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_sbyin byed ma'i bu dang /_mi'am ci dang lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/_re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen po mang pos 
[\[263a.3\]]bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/_'chang ngam/_'don tam/_klog gam/_mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/_de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lag 
[\[263a.4\]]na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes 
[\[263a.5\]]su dran par byas la/_lan bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba 
[\[263a.6\]]'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo khyad du 'phags pas 
[\[263a.7\]]bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba yang de la skye bar 'gyur/_dam pa chen po dang 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/_bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob 
[\[263b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/_tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams 
[\[263b.3\]]cad zad par byed par 'dod na/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/_dkyil 'khor de dang bcom 
[\[263b.4\]]ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos kyi bsti stang byas te de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/_des 
[\[263b.5\]]sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[263b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang /_sa dang pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs dang /_ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do/_/gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas 
[\[263b.7\]]na char 'bab bo/_/sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro/_/'bab chu dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas brjod byas 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]na sos par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bkres pa dang skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te 
[\[264a.2\]]rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na dpag tshad tshun chad mtshams gcad pa dang bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen 
[\[264a.3\]]gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D920}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi gar+b+hA lang+kA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/_
[\[264a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_bi pu la ba da na kAny+tsa nod k+Ship+ta/_pra b+hA sa ke tu mur+d+ha ne/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[264a.5\]]aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_ta d+yathA/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pra ha ra pra ha ra/_ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+hA re/_tsu lu tsu lu/_sha ta ra smi sany+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shik+te/_gu Ne gu Na ba te/_
[\[264a.6\]]sarba bud+d+ha NA ba b+ha se/_mi li mi li/_ga ga na ta le/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+thi te/_na b+ha sta le/_sha me sha me/_pra sha me pra sha me/_sarba pA pa~M pra sha ma ne/_sarba pA pa~M bi shwa d+ha ne/_hu lu hu lu/_ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he 
[\[264a.7\]]swA hA/_mU la man+t+raM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/_dza ya dza ya swA hA/_hr-i da ya~M/_o~M hu ru hu ru dza ya mu khe swA hA/_u pa hr-i da ya~M/_o~M badzra A yu She swA hA/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te/_mchod rten byas la mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/_des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng 
[\[264b.2\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/_mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon 
[\[264b.3\]]mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_lta ba log pa dang /_the tshom za ba dang /_mtshams med 
[\[264b.4\]]pa byed pa dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/_/dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas 
[\[264b.5\]]pa dang /_dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang /_mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 
[\[264b.6\]]'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig 
[\[264b.7\]]rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]{D921}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de la mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang /_cho ga 
[\[265a.2\]]ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sU k+Sha me sU k+Sha me sa me sa ma ye/_shAn+te dAn+te a sa mA 
[\[265a.3\]]ro pe a nA laM pe ta ra la be/_ya shwa ba ti/_ma hA te dzo ni rA ku le ni ra bA Ne/_sarba bud+d+ha ad+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i 'jim pa'am/_sngags bri ba'i tshe lan bdun du gdab pa'i sngags la/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_o~M badzra A yu She 
[\[265a.4\]]swA hA/_'bi 'bi'i sngags la/_oM badzrod b+ha ba ya swA hA/_tsai t+ya phor bu'i nang dang /_sa tsha'i nang du phye ma gdab pa'am/_'bru mar byug pa'i sngags la/_oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/_phyag rgya'am/_sngags gzhug pa'i sngags la/_o~M d+harma d+hA 
[\[265a.5\]]tu gar+b+he swA hA/_tsai t+ya phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la/_oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_tho bas rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/_o~M badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_tsai t+ya phor bu nas phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la/_o~M d+harma ra te swA hA/_'khor 
[\[265a.6\]]lo dang /_dbu zhu gsol ba'i snga gsal/_oM b+h+ra ma Na ye swA hA/_tsai t+ya'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sngags la/_oM su pra tiSh+Tha ta badzra swA hA/_cho ga de ltar byas na tsai t+ya btab pas bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[265a.7\]]dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bar bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]{D922}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsU Da ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 
[\[265b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 
[\[265b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa/_'jigs pa thams 
[\[265b.4\]]cad las rnam par thar par mdzad pa/_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/_mi mthun pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms 
[\[265b.5\]]par mdzad pa/_'byung po dang /_ro langs dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_mu ge dang /_mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa 
[\[265b.6\]]thams cad zlog par mdzad pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/_dug dang /_'brum phran 
[\[265b.7\]]dang /_thor bu dang /_gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gshed byed thams cad sel bar byed/_/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/_/nor dang 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa/_/bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dang /_/g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa/_/phyir zlog pa 'di brjod par bya/_/lha dang lha min g.yul bkye ste/_/brgya byin lha min rnams las pham/_/de nas rings pa kho nar 
[\[266a.2\]]ni/_/'jig rten dbang gi drung 'ongs te/_/de nas snying ni rab skrag pas/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to/_/lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang /_/ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/_/'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni/_/lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu 
[\[266a.3\]]gzigs/_/brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas/_/dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs/_/lha yi dbang po nga la nyon/_/khyod la ngas ni srung ba sbyin/_/lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes 
[\[266a.4\]]bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo /_/mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di/_/
[\[266a.5\]]bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa'am/_/'don tam 'on te klog na yang /_/de yi 'jigs pa kun med de/_/rtag tu bsrung zhing sba ba dang /_/g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/_/sdig dang rmi ngan zhi ba dang /_/bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel/_/
[\[266a.6\]]lha yi dbang po de bas na/_/gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas/_/bris te spyi bor gdags par bya/_/yid la rtag tu dran par gyis/_/g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_/'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog_/bud med rnams la bu pho skyed/_/mngal 
[\[266a.7\]]na gnas pa yongs su skyong /_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig_/'di med phyir zlog byed ces bya/_/yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed/_/lha'i dbang po phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/_lha ma yin rnams pham par byed pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung shig_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang 
[\[266b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M dza ya ka ri/_yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni bi tsi tra mu khi/_sarba mang+ga la d+hA ra Ni/_dzI mU te/_sa ha sra b+hu dze/_
[\[266b.3\]]sa ha sra ne tre/_sa ha sra shi ra se/_nA nA lang kA rA/_b+hi b+hU Shi te/_ma Ni kuN+Da la saM nA ha san+na d+he bi tsi tra mau li d+ha re/_tsan+da sUr+ya a ti re ke/_A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/_mang+ga la shi re dzI mU te/_pa bI tra kr-i ta mang+ga l+ye/_b+hU ri ma d+h+ri ka ra Ne/_tsu ru tsu ru/_
[\[266b.4\]]shwe te pa ste/_mu ru mu ru shwe te/_a ba nat+te/_hu ru hu ru/_pa bi tra mu khi/_ku ru ku ru/_tsan+d+ra mu khi/_A di t+ya pa sha brti ni/_dzam+b+ha Ni/_mang+ga la d+hA ra Ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_sarba bid+yA d+harma te/_mo ha ne/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/_sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/_rA 
[\[266b.5\]]dza tsau ra ag+ni pi Sha u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/_ka kho rda ni bA ra Ni/_o~M hi ri hi ri/_dza ya ka ri/_ba la ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_te dza ska ri/_bi bA da pra sha ma ni/_yud+d+ha ni/_bA ra Ni/_pa ra tsakra pra sha ma ni/_pa ra sai n+ya bi nA sha ni/_yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni/_bra b+hU ta be 
[\[266b.6\]]la/_ma Ni ma Ni/_ma hA ma Ni/_ma hA ma Ni/_ma NI na d+ha ri/_tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/_tri pu ra na ga ra/_bi d+han+sa ni/_ba ra sai n+ya bi dra ba ni/_sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ni sU da ni/_sarba bya d+hI nAM pra sha ma ni/_o~M tsi li mi le swA hA/_tsi le mi le swA hA/_mi 
[\[266b.7\]]li mi li swA hA/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_tsa khi li tsa khi li swA hA/_tsaN+Da li mi Ti ni swA hA/_U ra d+ha ke shi ping+ga le/_ping+ga lA k+She da d+hi mu khi swA hA/_o~M ka ra ka ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_muny+tsA pa ya/_muny+tsA pa ya/_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pra sha ma ya/_pra sha ma ya/_yud+d+hot+ta ri Na phaT/_tsit+ta ni ra ma la ka ri phaT/_a su ra nir+g+ha ta ni phaT/_dza ya ka ri phaT/_pri ti ka ra phaT/_sa ha sra shi ra se phaT/_sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/_sa ha sra ne tre phaT/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma skr-i 
[\[267a.2\]]te phaT/_sarba sha trU~M nA sha ni phaT/_sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/_pa ra tsakra ni ba ra Ni phaT/_pa ra sain+ya bi dra pa Ni phaT/_sarba kr-i t+ya/_karma sU da ni phaT/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/_sarba gra hot+sA da ni phaT/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta bi 
[\[267a.3\]]trA NA~M/_so bsta ya kA nA~M/_sa pa ri bA rA NA~M/_te dza sa~M ma ma sha rI raM/_sarba b+ha yo ba dra be b+h+yaH/_sarba yud+he b+h+ya/_sarba gra he b+h+yaH/_sarba byA d+hib+h+yaH/_sarba du skr-i te b+h+yaH/_sarba kr-i t+ya ka kho rde b+h+yaH/_sarba bi She b+h+yaH/_sarba kA ya bA ga tsit+ta bi rA d+he b+h+ya sh+tsa/_rak+Sha 
[\[267a.4\]]rak+Sha mA~M swA hA/_gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/_bsod nams thams cad sogs par byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[267a.5\]]sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/_rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/_yi ger bris pa dang /_ston pa dang /_bklags pa dang /_bzung bas bdag dang gzhan srung ba'o/_/de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang /_sbyin sreg 
[\[267a.6\]]gis yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus 
[\[267a.7\]]te gtan la phab pa//[ {D923}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha 
[\[267b.2\]]ma yin rnams las pham/_rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[267b.3\]]'das bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris las pham/_rab tu pham ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/_rab tu pham na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par 
[\[267b.4\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung shig_/ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[267b.5\]]las 'di mnos so/_/mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/_/mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa'am/_bag tsha ba'am/_spu zing zhes byed pa'am/_tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo /_/bcom 
[\[267b.6\]]ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_oM dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_dza ya bA hi ni/_shang ka ri shang ka ri/_pra b+haM ka ri/_
[\[267b.7\]]bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sarba shatrU~M/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_b+ha ga ba te/_dza ya bA hi ni/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_gra sa gra sa/_ha sa ha sa/_hU~M hU~M/_la hU~M la hU~M/_la m+bo da ri/_tri ne tre/_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]tsa tu ra bAk+t+re/_tsa tu da daMSh+Te/_tsa tur b+hu dze/_a si mu sa la/_tsakra tri shU la/_badzra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/_bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/o~M b+ha ga ba ti/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma 
[\[268a.2\]]tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_pa ra sai n+ya~M bi d+hAn+sa ya/_sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/_d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/_tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/_b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/_u lkA mu khi/_u lkA d+hA ra NI/_trai lo kya ma thA ni/_
[\[268a.3\]]bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+ya na/_bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/tsa la tsa la/_tsi li tsi li/_tsu lu tsu lu/_ka~M pa ka~M pa/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_aT+Ta hA saM/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+yan/_bdag 
[\[268a.4\]]gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/trA sa ya trA sa ya/_b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/_bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na/_sa t+ya bA di nA~M/_sa t+ye na/_bud+d+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_d+harma sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_saM g+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_sat+ya bA 
[\[268a.5\]]di nA~M/_sat+ya mA ti kra ma/_lam+bo da ri/_lam+bo da ri/_ku Ta ku Ta/_kuT+Ta kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/_kuT+TA ba ya kuT+TA pa ya/_ru dra ma nA ya/_biSh+Nu ma nA ya/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya prah+ma ma nA ya/_trai lo kya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/_sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/_sarba yak+Sha 
[\[268a.6\]]rAk+Sha sa/_ga na d+harba/_ku~M b+haN+Da/_ma ho ra ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+ya~M/_raM ga raM ga/_raM gA pa ya raM gA pa ya/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_puSh+pa mA li ni/_run+d+ha run+d+ha/_ri ti ri ti/_tsi ti tsi ti/_d+h+ri ti d+h+ri ti/_b+h+r-i ku Ti mu kha pa ra/_se na 
[\[268a.7\]]ku lot+sA da ni ka ri/_ha la ha la/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_he he/_ri Ni ri Ni/_ri Ni ma ti/_dza~M b+ha d+h+wa dze/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a ba lo ki te/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/sarba ta thA ga ta/_a ba lo ki te swA hA/_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sot+ta me swA hA/_sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/_tsan+d+ra arka bi ma le swA hA/_sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig 
[\[268b.2\]]swA hA/_lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa'am/_'thab pa'am/_rtsod pa'am/_'gyed pa'am/_gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 
[\[268b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/_mgul du btags na mi'i rgyal po dang /_skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung bar byed do/_/bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed/_dpal 
[\[268b.4\]]skyed par byed/_pha rol gyi sde spa 'gong bar byed/_bkra shis pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_grags pa dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa kun du gnas par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i 
[\[268b.5\]]dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[268b.6\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[268b.7\]{D924}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ka na ka ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[269a.2\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/_lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang /_rig 
[\[269a.3\]]sngags rnams dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang /_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang /_rig sngags 
[\[269a.4\]]dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rab tu gzhom pa dang /_rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[269a.5\]]to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/lha ma yin dang g.yul sbrad pa na rig sngags rnams dang /_gsang sngags rnams dang /_sman rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir nga 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/_sgyu thams 
[\[269a.6\]]cad rengs par byed pa/_rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/_gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_gsang 
[\[269a.7\]]sngags dang /_sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/_gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang /_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]kun du rgyu ba dang /_gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa ba 
[\[269b.2\]]dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dang /_bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas/_kau shi ka khyod kyis sems 
[\[269b.3\]]can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen mo rnam par rgyal ba chen mo zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig 
[\[269b.4\]]sngags chen mo gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+yA thA/_o~M hi ni hi ni/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_ni hi ni hi/_ni hi ra bi ni/_kAny+tsa nA pa ti/_lo kA mA te/_b+hu te/_b+hu ku ta man+t+ra/_a d+hi kr-i te/_be de be de be ta man+t+ra 
[\[269b.5\]]a d+hi kr-i te/_ha na ha na/_ha sa ha sa/_ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/_b+ha ga ba ti/_dza ye bi dza ye/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_ban+d+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_a mo g+ha shak+t+ri d+hA ra Ni/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kA Da ma mA na si/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/_stam+b+ha 
[\[269b.6\]]ya stam+b+ha ya/_b+han+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_lha'i sgyu dang /_klu'i sgyu dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang /_srin po'i sgyu dang /_nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang /_dri za'i sgyu dang /_lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang /_mi'am ci'i sgyu dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang /_
[\[269b.7\]]rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang /_rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang /_drang srong gi sgyu dang /_sems can dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang /_'byung po'i sgyu dang /_sgyu thams cad/_ra la ra la/_radz+dza radz+dza/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]d+hu ma/_rA ba rA ba rA ba na/_tsakrA nan+ta/_grAn+tha ni/_ha na ha na/_sarba bid+yA/_sha trUNA~M/_stam+b+ha ya/_bA yuM stam+b+ha ya/_sUr+yAM stam+b+ha ya/_so maM stam+b+ha ya/_ba ru NAM stam+b+ha ya/_a g+niM stam+b+ha ya/_ud+da kaM d+hi ti d+hi ti/_d+hA ra NI pA sha 
[\[270a.2\]]ha ste/_peSh+Ta ya pA sha ne/_gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang /_dgra rnams dang /_sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_'thab pa dang /_rab tu 'thab pa dang /_mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad/_ha na ha na/_da 
[\[270a.3\]]ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_ma hA mo ha ni/_b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs 
[\[270a.4\]]shig phaT swA hA/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal pa 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i sde la pha rol gyi 
[\[270a.5\]]dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so/_/lhas ma yin/_klus ma yin/_gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/_srin pos ma yin/_dri zas ma yin/_lha ma yin gyis ma yin/_nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/_mi'am cis ma yin/_rig sngags 'chang 
[\[270a.6\]]gis ma yin/_mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/_pha rol gyi dmag 
[\[270a.7\]]tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_lus la me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_rig sngags dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang /_byed 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]du bcug pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/_de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[270b.2\]]kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na bdag gi lus bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_rig sngags thams 
[\[270b.3\]]cad dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman thams cad dang /_byad thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/_/rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag 
[\[270b.4\]]tshogs gdul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/_/lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba'am/_chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa 
[\[270b.5\]]med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te bcang bar bya/_mgul du gdags par bya'o/_/yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang /_
[\[270b.6\]]g.yog 'khor dang /_sde dang bcas te dge ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor na bcings pa dang rengs 
[\[270b.7\]]par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na sgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pas zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na smra ba thams cad 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/bklag par bya/_kha ton du bya/_brjod par bya ste/_brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis byas par gyur pa dang /_gang gis bsams 
[\[271a.2\]]par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/_/srad bu btags sam/_chus bdag bsrung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i don thams 
[\[271a.3\]]cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[271a.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA la shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[271a.5\]{D925}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[271a.6\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/_a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das 
[\[271a.7\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnod pa bgyid pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/_/de las bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[271b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags don thams cad byed pa/_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 
[\[271b.3\]]byed pa/_dug thams cad 'jil ba/_mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/_rkang med dang /_rkang gnyis dang /_rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par byed pa/_dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/_nam mkha' lding dang /_sbyin byed ma'i bu dang /_
[\[271b.4\]]sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_smyo byed dang /_bram ze'i srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_ro langs dang /_bya'i gdon dang /_srul po dang /_nam gru dang /_gnon po'i gdon dang /_gnon po dang /_brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_lha'i gdon 
[\[271b.5\]]dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon dang /_log 'dren gyi gdon dang /_ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/_mdangs 'phrog ma dang /_zas su phreng ba za ba dang /_zas su spos za ba 
[\[271b.6\]]dang /_zas su me tog za ba dang /_zas su bdug pa za ba dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba dang /_zas su rnag 'thung ba dang /_zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/_rims nad thams cad dang /_rlung 
[\[271b.7\]]las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba thams cad 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zung shig_/thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a De ma De pra ma De/_pra me di ri/_go la me/_po le bo se/_mod de/_bad de/_kha rad te/_kha 
[\[272a.2\]]ra ne/_gra Na gra Ne/_gra Na pra ga Ne/_mo Ne/_pra ti mo Ni/_kA lI pra krA lI tsaN+Di/_ma hA caN+De pra ti tsaN+De/_be ge a ti ba ge/_so na/_go na/_mo hA/_pra mo hA/_mo ta pra mo TA/_nA shA ni/_pra nA shA ni/_d+ha ba nI/_pra d+ha ba nI/_ba la ga nI/_
[\[272a.3\]]pra ba la ga nI/_nr-id t+ya nI/_pra nrid t+ya nI/_kro d+ha ni/_pra ti kro d+ha ni/_ha na ha na/_bi ha na bi ha na/_sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Tan nA sha ya/_sarba a b+ha ya pra te/_bdag 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad grub par gyur cig_/de lta bas na khi di khi di/_tsum b+he/_sarba satwa hi te ra te/_na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M swA hA/_lha'i dbang po thams cad la mi 'jigs 
[\[272a.5\]]pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcings sam/_skra la mdud pa bor ram/_bzlas brjod byas sam/_yungs kar ram/_gi'u wang la lan cig sngags te bskus sam/_go cha la bsngags na mtshon 
[\[272a.6\]]gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis ma yin/_rims nad kyis ma yin/_nyin gcig pas ma yin/_nyin gnyis pas ma yin/_nyin gsum pas ma yin/_nyin bzhi pas ma yin/_mes ma yin/_gsang sngags kyis ma yin/_ro 
[\[272a.7\]]langs kyis ma yin/_dug gis ma yin/_nad kyis ma yin te/_chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub par byed do/_/sbyar 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis mi tshugs par byed do/_/pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed do/_/gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed do/_/bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed do/_/gdon thams cad phung bar byed do/_/gdon gang 
[\[272b.2\]]gis mi gtong na yang de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[272b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa thams cad la rab tu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar 
[\[272b.4\]]chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D926}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba an+ta rA ya ki bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[272b.5\]]lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ril dbang po'i brag phug na 
[\[272b.6\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur te/_tshe'i 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/_bcom 
[\[272b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_yang tshe don du gnyer ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dag gis bdud thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba/_bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams 
[\[273a.2\]]nyon cig_/tad+ya thA/_a b+ha ye/_b+ha ya bi ga te/_b+ha ya pa ri shwa d+ha ne/_a b+ha ye/_a b+ha yaM da de/_ni ru ba kliSh+Ti/_a na ku le/_a ku la ba ri sho d+ha ne/_a gra te/_a bi kalpe/_a bi kalpa ne/_ats+yu te/_shu b+he shu b+he/_
[\[273a.3\]]te dza ste dzo ba ti/_sha me u pa sha me/_ma ho pa sha me/_mai tri mai t+r+yud+d+hi te to She/_to Sha ya Ne sa t+ye/_sa t+ya dar+Shi/_a bi rud+d+he/_sa hi te/_si hi ta twe/_aR+the aR+tha sid+d+he/_a mr-i te/_a mr-i ta pa te/_ab+hI te/_badzra sat+ye/_ak+Sha ye/_ak+Sha ya pra b+he/_dran+t+ra ba re/_shud+d+he 
[\[273a.4\]]shud+d+he/_pra b+he/_a ba b+hA se/_a ba b+hA sa ba ti/_u pa yo ge/_a nut+ta re/_sa ma tsit+te/_bud+d+ha/_a d+hiSh+ThA ne/_shI le bi sho d+ha ne/_a saM har+ye/_su ni gr-i hI taM ma ra ba lA nAM/_pa ra dza yo dr-iSh+Ti ga trA NA~M/_dz+wa la naM d+harmo lkA yai/_ut+g+ha TA nAM/_d+harma ni d+ha na s+ya/_
[\[273a.5\]]sa~M gra hA NAM/_d+harma ko Sha s+ya/_kau shi ka khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi ngag ni khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba 
[\[273a.6\]]dag go/_/'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/_don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i 
[\[273a.7\]]dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_de'i tshe 'di skad du/_kho bo lha las ma gyur la/_/'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/_/kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/_/grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/'di'i mthu thams 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig_/na mo a ke tu len ge tsaN+Da na ye swA hA/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/_d+harmar+tha 
[\[273b.2\]]sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/_sarbA an+ta rA yi bi sho d+ha ni ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_
[\[273b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye 
[\[273b.4\]]shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D927}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dwA mi DA bid+yA rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[273b.5\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smyig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[273b.6\]]dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/_so sor 'brang ba/_sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig_/kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo lho phyogs 
[\[273b.7\]]na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do/_kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang /_phyogs 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/_gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/_/de nas 
[\[274a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi na d+ha re/_'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/_lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag 
[\[274a.3\]]la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[274a.4\]]ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/_'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha te bi ha te/_ni ha te/_pra t+yar+thi ke/_pra t+ya mi tre/_shud+d+he/_muk+te/_bi ma le/_pra b+hA swa re/_aN+DA re/_
[\[274a.5\]]paN+Da re/_shwe te/_paN+Da ra bA si ni/_ha ri ka ra di/_ping+ga lA k+Shi dan+ti mu khi/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par 
[\[274a.6\]]'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 
[\[274a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni mu ni/_re ri/_ma ti ma ti/_su ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_hA hA hA hA/_khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]dr-I D+ha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/_yi ger bris na de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad 
[\[274b.2\]]las thar bar bgyi'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang sman pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[274b.3\]]'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li swA hA/_prah+ma swA re swA re swA hA/_pra h+ma gar+b+ha puSh+pa sa~M sta re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/_dus ma lag par 
[\[274b.4\]]'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[274b.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ni bar NI/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_mA da na d+he/_ma ti ma ti/_ti Ti/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_
[\[274b.6\]]tsaN+Da li/_ma ta~M gi/_ba ra la ni/_hI na ma d+h+ya ma d+hA ra nI ma la ni/_da la mat+te/_tsakra pa kri/_sha pa ri sha pa ri swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/_'jigs pa thams cad las 
[\[274b.7\]]rnam pa thar par bgyid pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po chen po 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]rnam thos kyi bus/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye 
[\[275a.2\]]bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe puSh+pe/_d+harma ba ri ha ri/_Ar+ya pra sha ste/_ni ra mu k+te/_ma~M 
[\[275a.3\]]ga li/_stu te/_ta bi te swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/_'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/_tshe skyong ba/_dus ma lags par 
[\[275a.4\]]'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[275a.5\]]la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/_glog thams cad zlog pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum 
[\[275a.6\]]pa thams cad sel ba/_dug rnams mi sdug par bgyid pa/_gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung 
[\[275a.7\]]ba dang /_ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes su gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/_sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]du'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ar dze/_a ma re/_a mr-i te/_ak+Sha ye/_puN+ya par+yA ba te/_sarba pA pa pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/_Ar+ya pu N+ya so pa kI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa'am/_
[\[275b.2\]]bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/_yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/rtsa ba'i dug gam/_mche ba'i dug gam/_dbyig dug gam/_gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las 
[\[275b.3\]]byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig 
[\[275b.4\]]rten skyong ba dang /_klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang 
[\[275b.5\]]sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/_/phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang /_myos pa dang /_rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag 
[\[275b.6\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_klu'i dbang po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod

[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D928}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags 
[\[276a.2\]]pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la 
[\[276a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel 
[\[276a.4\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'ching ba gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 
[\[276a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o/_/las kun byed pa dge ba ste/_/'byung po kun gyis 'jigs pa med/_/bdud rtsi las ni 
[\[276a.6\]]bdud rtsi 'byung /_/'di ni las kun byed pa yin/_/dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste/_/rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang /_/gzhan dang dgras ni 'khor ba dang /_/rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang /_/rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang /_/
[\[276a.7\]]rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed/_/rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel/_/dug dang me ni dengs byed dang /_/rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel/_/chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul/_/rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel/_/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang /_/chos kun rab tu ston pa ste/_/'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can/_/gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms/_/gang tshe rig sngags 'di bshad 
[\[276b.2\]]pa/_/de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur/_/'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/_/rig sngags rgyal po bla na med/_/'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste/_/'jig rten gsum po kun gyis mchod/_/de nas 'jigs 
[\[276b.3\]]pa med par spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/_rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so/_/o~M ta ra ta ra/_tA 
[\[276b.4\]]re tA re/_mo ri ke/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_sUr+ya kAn+te/_he ma pra b+he/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ni/_sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/_tsa ra tsa ra/_bi Sha pra sha ma ni/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_sarba 
[\[276b.5\]]bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skri te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Shi ta/_pa ra pa ra/_pi ri pi ri/_pu ru pu ru/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_a nudz+nyA te/_Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/_pa ri pU re/_gaM gA na dI bA lu ko 
[\[276b.6\]]pa ma/_ta thA ga ta/_b+hA Shi ta/_pri yaM ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_pri ti ka ri/_shu b+ha ka ri/_pa bi tra/_ma~M ga la d+hA ri Ni/_sarba de ba tA/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba kiM na ra a d+hi Sh+Thi te/_sarba 
[\[276b.7\]]yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_prah+ma b+hA Shi te/_in+d+ra b+hA Shi te/_tsa tu ra ma hA rA dza b+hA Shi te/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya b+hA Shi te/_o~M ti ri ti ri/_tsan+d+ra kI ra Ne/_ki li ki li/_sarba sha trU~M bi nA sha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 
[\[277a.2\]]sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_sems can thams cad 
[\[277a.3\]]la phan 'dogs pa/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so/_/de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la yang 
[\[277a.4\]]bsnyad do/_/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser 
[\[277a.5\]]thub dang /_'od srung dang /_shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni bdag srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_gnyi ga srung ba dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal 
[\[277a.6\]]dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba/_srog skyong ba/_tshe sbyin pa/_lag cha rengs par byed pa/_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/_
[\[277a.7\]]dgra thams cad zlog pa/_'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/_thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/_/shud+d+he/_muk+te/_pra b+hA swa re/_shwe te/_paN+Da rA hA si ni/_sarba duSh+Ta na dzaM b+ha yA mi/_stam+b+ha yA mi/_mo ha 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]yA mi/_oM swA hA/_pa bi tre swA hA/_shwe te swA hA/_shwe te pa ta pa bit+t+re swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_tA ri Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/_sarba ka li/_ka la ha/_bi gra ha/_bi byA d+hi/_duHsop+na b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/_rtag tu le lo med 
[\[277b.2\]]par ni/_/gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa/_/de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang /_/dus kun du ni srung bar byed/_/de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/_/de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug_/ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na/_/gzi brjid grags 'chang 
[\[277b.3\]]lhan ne bzhin/_/de la gshed byed byad stems dang /_/srul po dag gis mi tshugs te/_/de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur/_/kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel/_/'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[277b.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D929}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzhan 
[\[277b.5\]]gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 
[\[277b.6\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[277b.7\]]dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtul zhugs grub pa 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dri za rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lto 'phye chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi'am ci rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[278a.2\]]srin po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig pa'i bdag po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po 
[\[278a.3\]]che'i phreng ba'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba las thams cad byed pa gtsang ma brjod par bya ste/_dag cing de bzhin bkra shis pa/_/bsod nams byed gtsang dpal yon can/_/srin po 'joms 
[\[278a.4\]]pa'i lha rnams dang /_/sems can kun gyis mi thub pa'o/_/sdig pa thams cad rab 'jig pa/_/don kun sgrub pa dpal yon can/_/gdon kun rnam par 'jig byed pa/_/rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/_/'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa/_/brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di/_/
[\[278a.5\]]dug dang gshed byed 'jig byed pa/_/me dgra rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_/gshed byed gdon dang ro langs dang /_/rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang /_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las/_/kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad/_/rtag 
[\[278a.6\]]tu bdag la bsrung bar mdzod/_/nyin gcig pa yi rims nad dang /_/nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum dang /_/nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang /_/mi bzad rims las 'di srung byed/_/dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang /_/kha zas bzhin du 'ju bar 
[\[278a.7\]]'gyur/_/gang gi mngal na mi chags dang /_/gang gi bu pho 'chi ba yang /_/rin po che yi phreng ba 'dis/_/de dag myur du 'tsho bar byed/_/nor 'dod pas ni nor rnams 'thob/_/dpal 'dod pa yang dpal 'thob 'gyur/_/'thab cing 'gyed dang 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]g.yul ngor yang /_/myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin/_/sems can rnams la gnong gzigs nas/_/'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa/_/rin chen phreng zhes bya ba yi/_/rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha na ka ri/_bi pu la ka ri/_
[\[278b.2\]]dza ya ka ri/_yaSh+Ti ka ri/_pri d+hi ka ri/_A yurda de/_puN+ya dA ri/_a la k+Sh+mA pra sha ma ni/_d+ha na d+ha n+ya/_bi brta ni/_shrI ka ri/_sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra pA sha brti ni/_me d+hA dza na ni/_pu tra dza na ni/_pa ri ba rA bar+d+ha ni/_A yurda de/_pri ti ka 
[\[278b.3\]]ri/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_a mo g+ha shak+ti/_kany+tsa na mA le/_gra ha sau mya ka ra Ni/_sarba ka li ka la ha/_bi gra bi byA d+ha/_pra sha ma ni/_pa ra cekra ni bA ra Ni/_pa ra sai n+ya/_stam+b+ha ni/_tsit+ta ni ra ma lI ka ra NI/_sarba pA paM pra sha ma ni/_
[\[278b.4\]]sarba kA la biSh+Ta nA sha ni swA hA/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_tu ru tu ru swA hA/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_sarba de ba a nu dz+hi te swA hA/_sarba nA ga saM rak+Shi te swA hA/_o~M ni ri ni ri phaT/_ha na ha na phaT/_da ha da ha phaT/_pa tsa pa tsa phaT/_gang dag bdag la 
[\[278b.5\]]sdang bar sems pa dang /_gnod par sems pa dang /_sbyin sreg byed pa dang /_byad byed pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa dang /_byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT swA hA/_ag+hiM stam+b+ha yA mi be Shi shU trUM u da kaM tsau rA na/_sarba duSh+Ta na 
[\[278b.6\]]sarba pra t+yar+thi ka/_pra t+ya man+t+ra/_staM b+ha yA mi/_dzaM b+ha yA mi/_mo ha yA mi/_phaT phaT swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba/_/rin chen phreng gis rnam par brgyan/_/las kun byed dang de bzhin du/_/rtag tu srung ba byed pa 'di/_/'gro ba'am 
[\[278b.7\]]yang na ci yang rung /_/de dag 'ga' zhig bris te 'chang /_/srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog_/sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab par yang /_/kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dge/_/mi gang gtsang sbrar byas nas su/_/
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]rig sngags 'di bris 'chang ba dang /_/bklags dran shes rab can de la/_/'jigs pa kun du mi 'byung ngo /_/cho ga bzhin du klog 'chang na/_/gsang ba po kun rtag tu srung /_/yongs su skyong bar byed par 'gyur/_/rtag 
[\[279a.2\]]tu rgyal bar byed pa ste/_/dper na rin chen phreng ba yis/_/mgo bo brgyan na mdzes pa ltar/_/de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes/_/gang zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang na/_/de yi gdon rnams rnam par 'jig_/nad kyis btab 
[\[279a.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/_/de yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur/_/sems can kun la phan phyir dang /_/bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/
[\[279a.4\]]lha yi dbang po rnams dang ni/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung /_/de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad/_/dge ba dang ni nor rnams 'phel/_/sdig pa rnams kyang byad par 'gyur/_/rmi 
[\[279a.5\]]lam ngan nyes byas pa yis/_/grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni mu ni mu ni ri/_ma ti ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[279a.6\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/_'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_
[\[279a.7\]]zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D930}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_dza ya bA hi ni/_
[\[279b.2\]]dza yot+ta ri/_ka la ka la/_ma la ma la/_tsa la tsa la/_tsa la tsa la/_k+ShiN k+ShiN/_sarba karma A ba ra NA ni me sarbA dz+nyA dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti sa ha sra brte/_sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki ti tsak+ShuHshro tra g+h+ra Na dzi hwA kA ya ma no bi dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_phu ru phu ru/_
[\[279b.3\]]su ru su ru/_phu rA phu rA/_pra phu rA pra phu rA/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/_a b+hA ba swA hA/_sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi 
[\[279b.4\]]sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas stong gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par 
[\[279b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[279b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa phan yon tshad med pa dag 'byung ngo /_/stong 'gyur 
[\[279b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D931}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA Sh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA ra NI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi 
[\[280a.2\]]thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[280a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+hA re d+hA ra NI/_rat+na ko Te/_a b+ha 
[\[280a.4\]]ya kalbe/_kalbe ni/_ga Ne a nan+ta kalbe/_a mr-i ta kalbe/_hu tA sha re/_a nan+ta mu khe/_a nan+ta tsak+Shu sa mut+ga te/_o~M b+ha swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_sangs 
[\[280a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can 
[\[280a.6\]]dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs 
[\[280a.7\]]pa mtha' yas pa dang /_skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/_zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/_sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[280b.2\]]na maHsarba bid+yA/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pA da swA hA/_'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D932}]@#/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[280b.3\]]stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M mu ni d+harme/_saM gra ha d+harme/_a nu gra ha d+harme/_bi mu k+tid+harme/_sA ra a nu gra ha d+harme/_bai shra ba Na pa ri brta 
[\[280b.4\]]na d+harme/_sarba kAr+ya pa ri pra ma Na d+harme/_sa man+tA nu pa ri brta na d+ha rme swA hA/_o~M pradz+nye shru ti smr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/_d+hIHd+hA ra NI swA hA/_o~M pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ba la swA hA/_'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 
[\[280b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[280b.6\]{D933}]@##/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M pradz+nyA pradz+nye/_pradz+nyA a pa b+hA se/_pradz+nyA ba lo ka ti sarba d+harma an+d+ha 
[\[280b.7\]]kA ra bid+ha ma ni/_sid+d+he su sid+d+he/_sid+d+h+yan+tu mAM b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba dz+nyA na san+d+ha ri/_b+ha ga ba ti bats+tshe la/_pra sa ra d+he ha sta ma ma su ka ra/_sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_kaM pa kaM pa/_pA la pA la/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ba ra ba ra/_gardza gardza/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga ba ti mA bi 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]laM ba swA hA/_'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[281a.2\]]so//[ {D934}]@#/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M hrIHshru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yai/_sarba 
[\[281a.3\]]durga te shwa d+ha ya/_rA dzA ya swA hA/_'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang zlog go/_/las kyi sgrib pa dang /_ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_'phags pa 
[\[281a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D935}]@#/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs/_'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[281a.5\]]lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo d+harma kA ya/_saM b+ho ga kA ya/_nirmA Na kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dA na pA ra mi tA/_shI la pA ra mi tA/_k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA/_bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/_d+h+ya na bA ra mi tA/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_sarba d+harma shUn+ya 
[\[281a.6\]]tA swA hA/_'di bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ltas ngan 
[\[281a.7\]]pa thams cad kyang mi sdig go/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D936}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na ma s+t+wai b+ha 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ga ba ti dA nA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/_tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_ma hA ka nA da ma kA nAM/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_shI la pa ri pUr+Na sha rI yai shI laM me/_sAd+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_ki na tiSh+Ta saM buMd+d+ho 
[\[281b.2\]]b+ha ga ba na d+harma s+ya/_sa mA dz+nyA nA pa ya ti swA hA/_bzod pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/_a tsin+ta go tsar+ya/_na mo k+ShA na ti yai ba hu b+hiHta thA ga ta na b+hu ta ko Ti b+hi ba ri ba ra ti ta yai rak+Sha ku ru tu ru tu ru sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_
[\[281b.3\]]shAkya mu ni sarba ta thA ga tA nAM a pa ri mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa ro dz+nyA nA pa ya ti swA hA/_brtson 'grus kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM ma tsi na t+ya bi shA ya nA/_na ma stu te b+ha ga ba te bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/_bIr+ya na 
[\[281b.4\]]ku ru bIr+ye bIr+ye/_ma hA bIr+ya ta thA ga ta/_sarba dz+nyA nA pa ya ti swA hA/_bsam gtan gyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro/_/namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M bi ma le/_ni ra ma le/_d+h+yA ne d+h+yA ne/_d+h+yA na pri ye 
[\[281b.5\]]hU~M phaT/_shes rab kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/_a pa ri mi ta dz+nyA na go tsa rA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA yai/_dz+nyA nAM ne ku ru ku ru bi gA na ta thA ga ta s+ya/_
[\[281b.6\]]sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_hi hi hi hi/_dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA hU~M hU~M phaT/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D937}]@#/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i snying 
[\[281b.7\]]po 'di lan cig thos pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba tA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_da sha pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra kA nAM hAM/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur pa'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]{D938}]@#/_/'di lan cig brjod pas byams pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_kA ru Ne/_kA ru N+ya tsit+ta mut+pA da ya/_b+ha ga ba ti sarba b+ha yaM me nA sha ya swA hA/_'di lan cig brjod 
[\[282a.2\]]pas snying rje thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba sa tra pri ye hU~M mu di te swA hA/_'di lan cig brjod pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_a tsin+t+ya bi shA nI/_o~M tu ru tu ru 
[\[282a.3\]]traM/_hu lu hu lu/_mu lu mu lu swA hA/_'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyoms thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/_a nu ga te o~M ku ruM gi ni swA hA/_tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[282a.4\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D939}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M mu ni d+harme/_saM gra ha d+harme/_a nu gra ha d+harme/_bi muk+ti d+harme/_sa dA A nu gra ha d+harme bai shra ba Na pa ri brti ta d+harme/_sarba kAr+ya 
[\[282a.5\]]ba re pra ma Na d+harme/_sa ma tA pa ri brtan d+harme swA hA/_o~M pradz+nye shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye d+hIHd+har NI ye swA hA/_'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs 
[\[282a.6\]]rdzogs so//[ {D940}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M n+thAM/_na maHsarba bud ng+hA nAM/_o~M mA~M/_b+hU~M mU~M/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+hU~M/_'di bzung bas 'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dri ba dang klog pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[282a.7\]]'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D941}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/namaHsa man+tA budz+nyA naM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_oM ki Ni ki Ni/_ta thA ga ta/_ud b+ha ba 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]shAn+te bar de/_ut+ta ma ut+ta ma/_ta thA ga ta/_ud b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di bzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo thams cad rdzogs par bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 
[\[282b.2\]]'khor dang dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D942}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra 
[\[282b.3\]]ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M d+hu na d+hu na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_'di bzung bas 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[282b.4\]{D943}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M pi shu ne swA hA/_'di bzung na 'phags pa rma bya chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so//_//
[\[282b.5\]{D944}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_'di bzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags 
[\[282b.6\]]ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D945}]@#/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o/_/tad+ya tha/_o~M pad+me pad+me de bai/_hi ne 
[\[282b.7\]]hi ne hi ne/_tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/_hu le hu le hu le/_yu le yu le yu le/_pa le pa le pa le/_mu~M ts+tshi da na de/_b+hi na de b+han dz+we/_man de bra ma de/_di na ka ra swA hA/_blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed na/_lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_nam 
[\[283a.2\]]mkha' lding mo'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci mo'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen mo'am/_dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_'byung po'am/_'byung mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za 
[\[283a.3\]]mo'am/_gnon po'am/_gnon mo'am/_brjed byed dam/_brjed byed mo'am/_srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_phra man pho'am/_phra man mo'am/_mdangs 'phrog pho'am/_mdangs 'phrog mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus 
[\[283a.4\]]srul mo'am/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 
[\[283a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
